texts.en: Veronica is a responsible and hard working woman. Her job lies in lending her services as a domestic, a job of much effort and sacrifice. She has the support of her husband who works as a mechanic because he feels happy since together they have forged goals and have achieved them. Her discomfort at this time is the arrival of winter for which she wants to invest this loan in the purchase of  framing, blocks, iron, cement, sand, gravel and welding and start the work raising the roof of her humble home avoiding water leakage and, at the same time,  her family getting sick due to the downpours that they see in wintertime. In the long term, her goals are to continue improving her house with the sole goal of one day - not very far off - seeing it completely constructed and that her two children are able to enjoy a better living conditions.

loans.use: to raise and repair her roof.

loans.name: Olivia Del Carmen

texts.es: Olivia a sus 47 años de edad continua con su negocio de pulperia que ya hace catorce años lo ha venido dirigiendo e invirtiendo en el mismo para contribuir al bienestar de los suyos que ha sido su primordial objetivo. Su esposo quien es carpintero le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Siendo Afodenic una puerta al desarrollo para su negocio acude una vez mas a la institucion que con gran afecto la acogio y le ha otorgado el privilegio de ser sujeta de credito. Con este su quinto ciclo de credito se propone comprar productos para su negocio que ayuden a que su inventario cada dia crezca y sea mas apetecido por su clientela realizando asi las compras de granos basicos en quintal de arroz, frijoles, azucar, maiz, harina, bidon de aceite, productos embotellados como lo es la gaseosa, jugos, refrescos y algunos cosmeticos todo esto con el objetivo de poder mantener su clientela al ofertar una variedad de productos, siendo los de mayor consumo en nuestro diario vivir.
texts.en: Olivia, at 47 years of age, continues with her grocery business which she has already been managing for 14 years and investing in the same to contribute to the wellbeing of her children who have been her overriding objective. Her husband who is a carpenter helps her with the home expenses. She approached Afodenic, being a gate to development for her business, which welcomed her with great affection and has granted her the priveledge to be the subject of a loan. With this, her fifth loan, she proposes to buy products for her business that help her inventory grow each day and be more desirable to her customers, making purchases of basic grains in quintals of rice, beans, sugar, maize, flour, oil, bottled products like soda, juice, refreshments and some cosmetics. All of this with the objective of being able to maintain her customers by offering a variety of products, being those of greatest consumption in our daily lives.

loans.use: to purchase various products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase Omnilife natural products.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 26-year-old married man from Gaza. He owns a small plot of land on which he raises rabbits. He has five years of experience in this activity, and this month he obtained a Startup Youth Loan from Ryada to begin working independently.

Mohammad works with his wife and one other employee on their new farm, and they have big dreams for the future. Through this loan and hard work, they hope to increase their stock of rabbits so that they can begin to work with distributors. Mohammad and his wife are working to increase their family income and improve their standard of living. The purpose of this loan is to buy an incubator and rabbit enclosures.

Ryada's Startup Loan is exclusively for borrowers who are beginning new enterprises, not for existing projects. To qualify, a borrower must show a clear business plan and realistic potential for success. The borrower must also invest their own money and resources into at least 50 percent of the startup enterprise. Ryada believes strongly in the potential of these borrowers and grants them a three month grace period to help them get their business off the ground.

loans.use: to buy an incubator and rabbit enclosures for his farm.

loans.name: Sofía

texts.es:
Sofía, de 45 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y cordial, y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Está separada del padre de sus hijos, vive en su casa propia en compañía de sus 3 hijos; Marvin de 24, Karen de 22 y Marlon de 10 años de edad; además de un nietecito de 2 añitos.

La actividad que realiza es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad, para eso cuenta con una bodega que instaló en su propia vivienda, acondicionando un espacio donde acomodó su mercadería. Inició hace más de 4 meses este negocio con un préstamo bancario, pero el negocio principalmente lo atiende su hija, pues ella tiene un empleo donde brinda servicio de limpieza a un banco de su localidad. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable, pues sus productos son de primera necesidad y tienen salida a diario, dando una rotación constante a su capital. Además, con su trato y amabilidad, ella y su hija han sabido ganarse la preferencia de sus vecinos.
Antes de empezar con su actividad, no tenía problemas económicos, pero sí los deseos de generar un ingreso adicional para mejorar su economía y darle una ocupación a su hija, viendo esta oportunidad en su barrio, ya que no hay bodegas en la zona. 
Por tanto, viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo, tiene deseos de continuar con el negocio y aumentar su stock de mercadería. 

Éste es el préstamo número 3 con la institución MFP. Está contenta de saber que contará con el apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Por tanto se compromete a ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas, como en los créditos anteriores, de esa manera tener acceso a otros créditos en el futuro.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de abarrotes en general para surtir su negocio, así sus productos serán variados y estarán disponibles para la venta.
texts.en:
Sofía, 45, is a hardworking and enterprising woman who, in addition to being nice and friendly, is very eager to get ahead.  She is separated from the father of her children and lives in her own house with her three children, Marvin who is 24, Karen who is 22 and Marlon who is 10 years old.  She also has a granddaughter who is two years old.  

Sofía works selling groceries staples in a store located in her home.  She set up a space where she could accommodate her merchandise.  She started this business more than four months ago with a bank loan.  Her daughter mainly looks after the store since Sofía has a job providing cleaning services to a bank in her town.  She considers her business quite profitable since her products are staples and people need to buy them every day, giving her capital a constant rotation.  Additionally, with their kindness and good treatment, she and her daughter have earned the preference of their neighbors.   

Before starting this store, she did not have financial problems, but she wanted to generate additional income to improve her financial situation and give her daughter a job.  She saw an opportunity in her neighborhood, since there were no bodegas in that area.  Seeing the good results that she is having, she wants to continue with the business and increase her stock of merchandise.  

This is her third loan with MFP.  She is happy to know that she will have the financial support to advance her business.  She promises to be responsible with her payments, as she has been with her previous loans, so that she will be able to have access to other loans in the future.  

With the loan requested for 1500 nuevos soles, she will purchase groceries to stock her store, so that her products will be varied and ready to be sold.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to stock her store.

loans.name: Wilson Aroldo

texts.es:
Wilson es un hombre muy trabajador, con el fruto de su trabajo poco a poco ha ido saliendo adelante y sobre todo apoyando a su familia, su vivienda se ubica en el distrito d e Parcona, este distrito se caracteriza porque en él se desarrolla la agricultura, también se caracteriza por la amabilidad de sus pobladores. A Wilson le gusta hacer deporte y uno de sus pasatiempos favoritos es jugar futbol con sus vecinos y amigos de su barrio, y también en ocasiones aprovecha para comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Ceviche”. El solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería Mecánica”.

Con todo el entusiasmo que lo caracteriza Wilson trabaja en su negocio como chofer de taxi, él le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el dia; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y hay mucha necesidad de movilizarse de los pobladores de su barrio.

Wilson está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo, como revisión del motor del vehículo, de esta manera el manejara un vehículo en optimas condiciones y podrá conducir con mayor seguridad tanto para los clientes como para él; así el podrá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una flota de Taxis”.
texts.en:
Wilson is a very hard-working man. With the fruit of his work gradually he has been getting ahead and, above all, supporting his family. His house is located in the district of Parcona. This district is known because in it agriculture is developed. Also, it is known for the friendlyness of its population. Wilson likes to play spots and one of his favorite pastimes is to play football with his neighbors and friends in his neighborhood and also, on occasion, he takes advantage of eating one of his favorite dishes, which is the delicious "Ceviche." He only completed high school but he would have liked to study Mechanical Engineering.

With all of the enthusiasm that he is known for, Wilson works in his business as a taxi driver. He dedicates around 10 hours daily to his job and he can attend to almost 40 customers a day. He believes that his business is going well because he is very friendly with the customers and there is a big need for people to get around in his area.

Wilson is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since, thanks to the help that they have provided, he will be able to perform general maintenance to his car, such as revision of the vehicle engine. In this way, he will drive the car in optimal conditions and be able to drive with greater safety, as much for his customers as for him. He will be able to continue working to make his greatest dream come true: have a fleet of taxis.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia es una mujer muy alegre de 38 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su hijo Julián de 12 años, a quien le brinda amor y mucho cuidado desde que se separó con su esposo.
Su negocio es la venta de comestibles en la tienda que tiene en su casa, ella es perseverante en la actividad que realiza y está constante en su tienda. Considera que es una labor que le da tiempo para su hijo y los deberes de su hogar y con la que puede ser independiente. Lleva 13 años vendiendo abarrotes, verduras y lo necesario para las amas de casa. Sus clientes acuden a su puesto por la buena atención que Lidia les brinda, es por ello que siempre tiene ingresos económicos con los que puede solventar los gastos de su hijo. Su mayor prioridad es incrementar de productos su negocio para subir sus ventas.

Éste es su crédito número 11 con MFP, se siente contenta por seguir teniendo este apoyo económico, y siendo así podrá continuar con su trabajo. En su banco comunal es una socia que no duda en dar su opinión para las actividades.
Con los 3,500 nuevos soles que solicita comprará arroz, azúcar, conservas, carne, entre otros.
texts.en:
Lidia is a very happy 38 year old woman. She lives in her own house along with her son, Julian, who is 12, to whom she provides love and much care since she separated from her husband.

Her business is selling food in the shop she has in her house. She is perseverant in the activity she performs and is always in her shop. She considers that it is a job that gives her time for her son and her home chores and with which she can be independent. She has 13 years experience selling groceries, vegetables, and whatever is necessary for housewives. Her customers comer to her shop for the good service that Lidia provides. It is due to this that she always has economic income with which she can pay expenses for her son. Her greatest priority is to increase the products of her business in order to increase sales. 

This is her 11th loan with MFP. She feels happy to continue having this economic support and being able to continue with her work. In her community bank, she is a member who does not hesitate to give her opinion about work. With the 3,500 new "soles" that she is requesting, she will buy rice, sugar, preserves, meat, among other items.

loans.use: to increase merchandise.

loans.name: 3.14. 153.thiệu Khánh Group

texts.en:
Hoa  has a service business tailor-made. She is requesting a loan to purchase machines to do tailor-made and clothing repair service.

Hoa is 53 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the 3.14. 153.Thiệu Khánh solidarity group, which consists of 6 members. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with 2 dependents

This is Hoa's  first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Hoa has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Hoa hopes for her business to do well, to buy land of her own, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase machines to do tailor-made and clothing repair service.

loans.name: Dativa De La Concepcion

texts.es: La señora Dativa mujer trabajadora y responsable hace ya treinta y cinco años que se desempeña como Tecnica-Quirurjica en uno de los hospitales situado dentro de uno de los departamentos  de nuestro pais Nicaragua. Madre de dos hijos ya profesionales por lo que dice sentirse mas que feliz pues uno de sus objetivos era ver un dia convertidos a sus hijos en personas que sean util a la sociedad. Su esposo quien es Ingeniero Civil es de gran apoyo para ella ya que siempre han compartido gastos asi como tambien sueños que con la ayuda de Dios y la micro-financiera han podido alcanzarlos. Y quien mejor que su señor esposo para saber precios y dirigir este nuevo proyecto que se propone con este prestamo  el cual es llevar a cabo la construccion de servicio higienico haciendo uso de los siguientes materiales de construccion: cemento, arena, piedrin, hierro, estribos, bloques, laminas de zinc, inodoro, lavamanos, mangueras flexibles, tubos, puertas, ceramica, azulejo entre otros. Obteniendo con esta instalacion mejores condiciones de salud y evitando asi muchas enfermedades producto a la mala higiene.
texts.en:
Dativa is a hard-working and responsable woman.  She has worked for 35 years as a surgical technician in one of the hospitals within one of the departments in our country, Nicaragua.

She has two children, who are professionals.  She says that she feels more than happy about this.  One of her objectives was to one day she her children become useful people to society.  Her husband, a civil engineer, is a great support for her because they have always shared the expenses and also their dreams.  With God’s help and the micro loan they have been able to achieve them.

Who better than her husband to know prices and to direct this new proposed project with this loan?  The project is to carry out the construction of a bathroom by making use of the following construction materials:  cement, sand, gravel, iron, struts, concrete blocks, zinc sheeting, toilet, sink, flexible hoses, pipes, doors, and ceramic tiles, among others.

This installation improves health conditions and avoids a lot of illnesses that are due to poor hygiene.

loans.use: to install a bathroom.

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es:
Lucía tiene 64 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Víctor, de 70 años, y sus dos queridos hijos; Anderson de 20 y Dina de 32 años; quienes dependen aun de sus padres.
Ella es una mujer que a pesar de su edad no impide que siga laborando en la actividad que más le gusta: cultivar y cosechar sus plantas cacao. Actividad que realiza hace más de 43 años con la ayuda de su esposo y de sus hijos. Esta labor es muy trabajosa, pero ya con todo el tiempo de experiencia se le hizo fácil, pues es lo que mejor sabe hacer. Las cosechas que obtiene en su temporada las llevan a comercializar a los centros de acopio, quienes les pagan muy bien por los frutos de cacao. 

Éste es su crédito número 7 con MFP y agradece por la confianza que le brindan. Además, se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago; al igual que reconoce el empeño de sus compañeros de banco comunal, en el cual se siente contenta porque son personas solidarias. 
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles que solicita realizará el mantenimiento de sus cultivos de cacao, por lo que comprará fertilizantes y abono.
texts.en:
Lucía, 64, lives in her own house with her husband Victor, 70, and their two children, Anderson, 20, and Dina, 32, who still depend on their parents.  

She is a woman whose age does not stop her from continuing to work at the activity that she most enjoys: cultivated and harvesting her cacao plants.  She has done this work for more than 43 years with the help of her husband and children.  This work is very hard, but with the entire length of her experience she finds it easy, since it is what she knows how to do best.  She sells her harvests at collection centers, where they pay very well for cacao.  

This is her seventh loan with MFP and she is thankful for the confidence they provide.  She promises to be on time with her payments.  She also recognizes the hard work of the other members of her community bank, where she is very happy because they are supportive people.  With the 2000 nuevos soles that she is requesting, she will purchase fertilizer and manure to maintain her cacao plants.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Empeñoso y activo, es Luis, de 23 años de edad. Está separado de su pareja y de su pequeño hijo Diego de 2 años; a quien a pesar de todo, le brinda amor y todo su apoyo para seguir adelante.

Su labor es labrar la tierra y cultivar plantas de cacao que le son muy rentables. Esta labor la realiza desde hace 5 años, normalmente lo hace solo, pero en los tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros para que le ayuden a extraer de forma más rápida los granos de cacao. 
Con el tiempo desea en ampliar su parcela para cultivar más plantas de cacao y café, y así obtener mayores ingresos económicos. Pero su prioridad ahora es incrementar su producción de cacao.

Éste es su tercer crédito con MFP, por ello agradece el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir con sus objetivos. Además, le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque sus integrantes son personas responsables. 
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles que ahora solicita comprará plantitas de cacao para cultivar en su terreno agrícola.
texts.en:
Luis, 23, is hardworking and active.  He is separated from his partner and his son Diego, who is two years old.  In spite of everything, he gives him love and all of his support to grow. 

His work is tilling the land and cultivating cacao plants, which are very profitable.  He has done this work for five years.  Normally he works alone, but during harvest time, he has the support of day laborers, who help him harvest the cacao beans more quickly.  In time he hopes to expand his land to cultivate more cacao plants and coffee, so that he can earn more income.  His priority now is increasing his cacao production.

This is his third loan with MFP, and he is thankful for the financial support that he receives to continue with his objectives.  He is also glad to be a part of his community bank because the members are responsible people.  With the 3000 nuevos soles that he is requesting, he will purchase cacao seedlings to plant in his fields.

loans.use: to purchase cacao plants.

loans.name: Paula Del Socorro

texts.es: Paula es una señora con metas a futuro. Su profesion ha sido la docencia mas de dieciocho años desempeñandola. su esposo mes a mes recibe una pension por ser el ya jubilado, y juntos esperan hacer las mejoras a su vivienda. Pues gracias Afodenic han logrado la mayor parte de construcción de su casa. Siendo este su quinto ciclo de credito el cual será para el comienzo de un muro en la parte de atrás de la casa, ya que en el invierno las correntadas le inundan su patio de agua y quiere mejorar esta condición evitando malas higiene, lo que espera cerrarlo por completo a la largo plazo ya que su capacidad de pago es poca y tiene que a sumir otros gastos. Para ello necesitara comprar bloques, cemento, piedras canteras, alambre de amarre, estribos, clavos, tablas, piedrin, arena, hierro entre otros y asi empezar la obra. Expresa que alcanzando otros proyectos mas en la infraestrcutura de su vivienda se sentira complacida ya que esta inviertiendo para el futuro de sus hijos y demas familiares.
texts.en:
Paula is a woman with goals for the future.  She has been a teacher by profession, and she has been doing that for 18 years.  Her husband receives a pension for being retired.  Together they hope to make improvements to their house.

Thanks to Afodenic they have managed to do the greatest part of the construction on their house.  This is her fifth loan cycle, and it is to start a wall in the part that is in back of the house.  In winter the torrential rains flood her patio with water.  She wants to improve this condition and avoid poor hygiene.  

She hopes to completely close the wall in the long term.  Her capacity to pay is small, and she does have to assume other expenses.  She will need to buy concrete blocks, quarry stone, wire, buttresses, nails, boards, gravel, sand, and iron, among others.

This way the work can start.  She says that she will be happy to complete other projects on the infrastructure of her house.  They are investing in the future of their children and the rest of the family.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
Maura una mujer muy alegre de 32 años, vive junto a Wilmer, de 34 años, en su casa propia y con sus tres hijos, a quienes les brindan mucho amor.

Ella y su pareja se dedican a la agricultura, gracias a ello se compraron una camioneta, con la que ahora su esposo hace servicio de transporte de pasajeros a diferentes localidades desde muy temprano por la mañana. Mientras tanto, Maura está al pendiente de sus hijos en su casa, pero los fines de semana se dirigen a su parcela donde tienen plantas de cacao. 
Hace 12 años que Maura aprendió sobre el cultivo de cacao, y hace 3 meses que su esposo lleva laborando como la camioneta. Sus planes a futuro son de lograr que sus hijos sean profesionales y tengan una mejor calidad de vida. 

Éste es su crédito número 4 con MFP y está muy contenta de saber que cuenta con un apoyo financiero; así se siente segura de avanzar con su y trabajo. Por otro lado, se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es una socia activa y responsable.
Con el préstamo que solicita comprará repuestos para su carro, y con lo poco que le sobrará echará abono a su parcela.
texts.en:
Maura, 32, is a happy woman who lives with Wilmer, 34, in their own house with their three children, to whom they give a lot of love.  

She and her partner work in agriculture, and thanks to that work, they purchased a van.  Her husband provides transportation to passengers to different areas starting very early in the morning.  Maura takes care of the children at home, but on the weekends they go to their plot of land where they have cacao plants.  It has been twelve years since Maura learned about cultivating cacao, and her husband has been driving the van for three months.  Her future plans are for her children to become professionals and have a better quality of life.  

This is her fourth loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support so that she feels secure in advancing with her work.  She promises to make her payments on time.  In her community bank, she is an active and responsible member.  With the loan requested, she will purchase parts for her vehicle and with the little remaining, she will purchase fertilizer for her land.

loans.use: to purchase parts for her van.

loans.name: Delky

texts.es:
Delki tiene 29 años, es una mujer  trabajadora y con muchas ganas de progresar, además es amable y cordial con las personas. Vive con Javier, quien se dedica al transporte y es padre de sus dos hijos; Natali y José  de 4 y 2 años respectivamente. Juntos habitan cómodamente en la casa que compraron con mucho esfuerzo.

Su actividad es la venta de productos comestibles (bebidas y abarrotes) en una bodega que implementó en su casa, donde atiende muy amablemente  a sus clientes, que en su mayoría son sus vecinos. Inició hace más de 4 años con un préstamo del banco, más sus ahorros, comprando en pequeñas cantidades, y viendo la acogida que tenía su negocio decidió continuar y hasta el momento realiza sola la atención al público. Considera que su negocio es rentable por las ganancias que le deja, pues le permite mantener a su familia y reinvertir. 
Decidió empezar con su negocio por la necesidad de contar con un oficio y tener ingresos económicos para apoyar a su pareja a mantener a su familia, y en un futuro desea convertirse en una próspera empresaria. Por tanto, y viendo los resultados que sigue teniendo, desea aumentar el stock de sus productos y ver crecer su negocio.

Éste es su segundo préstamo con la institución MFP. Por tanto se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en el crédito anterior, y de esa manera tener un buen perfil crediticio y acceso a otros créditos en el futuro.
Con el monto solicitado, de 2000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio como; bebidas gasificadas, abarrotes en general y otros, buscando precios bajos por sus compras en volumen, así mantener un stock disponible para la venta.
texts.en:
Delky is a 29-year-old hard-working woman, is eager to make progress, and is friendly and cordial with people.  She lives with Javier, who makes a living through transport and is the father of their two children: Natali and José, who are 4 and 2-years-old respectively.  Together they live comfortably in the house that they bought with great effort.

Her work is selling food products (drinks and groceries) in a small store set up in her home where she very kindly serves her customers, most of which are her neighbors.  She began it more than four years ago with a bank loan, plus her savings, buying in small quantities.  Seeing the reception that her business had she decided to continue, and so far she carries out the attention to the public alone.  She considers her business to be profitable based on the earnings it leaves her, since it allows her to support her family and reinvest.   She decided to start her business by needing to have a job and to have financial income in order to help her partner support their family.  In the future she wishes to convert it into a thriving enterprise.  Therefore, seeing the results that she continues to have, she wants to increase her stock of products and see her business grow.

This is her second loan with the MFP institution.  Therefore, she promises to complete her payments, as with the previous loan, and thus have a good credit profile and access to other loans in the future.  With the amount she has asked for, 2000 nuevos soles, she will invest in the purchase of merchandise for her business, like carbonated drinks, general groceries, and other items; seeking low prices for her bulk purchases and thus keeping inventory available for sale.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise.

loans.name: Juaquina

texts.es:
Juaquina tiene 41 años, está casada con Rafael, con quien tiene 3 hijos; de 21, 17 y 11 años. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicada en una comunidad nativa de Chanchamayo.
Se dedica a la agricultura, actividad que aprendió con sus padres y perfeccionó con su esposo. 
Ella llegó hace 25 años a esa comunidad y desde entonces formó su propia familia. Joaquina es natural de la sierra sur del Perú, es ahí donde aprendió las labores del campo.
Es una mujer de carácter fuerte, la vida le puso muchos obstáculos que la deprimieron, pues sus 2 hijas mayores tienen problemas de salud, la mayor sufre de epilepsia y la otra de sordera. Pero Juaquina logra afrontar cualquier situación con amor y cuidados. 
Los productos que siembra son: cacao, café, plátanos, achiote y frutas cítricas de todas las variedades. “En mi producción me va bien, estos meses se cosecha naranjas, café y cacao”, menciona. Los compradores llegan hasta la comunidad para adquirir los frutos frescos.  
Para el futuro, Juaquina espera mejorar y ampliar su producción de café y cacao, para ello adquirirá nuevas plantitas y fertilizantes.

Pertenece al banco comunal “Las Rositas de Ubiriki” en MFP, se siente respaldada al tener socios responsables y solidarios, por lo que compromete en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas.
Con el dinero que ahora solicita podrá comprar fertilizantes para sus cultivos de plátanos y para el pago del personal que contratará para quitar la maleza de sus plantas.
texts.en:
Juaquina is 41 years old and is married to Rafael, with whom she has three children aged 21, 17 and 11 years.  They live together in their own home, located in an indigenous community in Chanchamayo.

Juaquina works in agriculture, an activity that she learned with her parents and has perfected with her husband.  She came to this community 25 years ago and since then has formed her own family.  Juaquina is originally from the sierra in the south of Peru, which is where she learned to work the fields.

She is a woman with a strong character.  Life has put may obstacles in her way which have depressed her, as her two older daughters have health problems: the oldest suffers from epilepsy, and the other one from deafness.  However, Juaquina has been able to face any situation with love and care.

The products that she grows are cocoa, coffee, plantains, achiote and all varieties of citrus fruits.  "Things are going well for me with my production, in these months we are harvesting oranges, coffee and cocoa", she mentions.  The buyers come to her community to acquire fresh fruit.

In the future, Juaquina hopes to improve and expand her production of coffee and cocoa, by acquiring new seedlings and fertilizers.

Juaquina belongs to the "Las Rositas de Ubiriki" communal bank, which is part of MFP.  She feels supported by the united and responsible members, and so promises to make her repayments punctually.

With the money that she is currently requesting, she will be able to purchase fertilizers for her plantain crops, and will be able to pay the personnel she hires to remove the weeds from her plants.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and hire laborers.

loans.name: Mwarandu

texts.en:
Mwarandu is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya. He is married and has nine children. He owns a retail shop which has been in operation for the last six years. He started the business with his personal savings. Despite all the progress he has made in the previous years, Mwarandu decided to join Milango upon invitation from his friends to access credit.
He is applying for a loan of 73,050 Kenya shillings to purchase retail products e.g. water, juices, bread, flour etc. He aspires to start supplying other fast moving goods in the future.
Mwarandu believes that the extra income from this loan will help him pay for his children’s school fees. The challenge he needs to overcome is the high cost of inventory and price fluctuations.

loans.use: To purchase retail products e.g. water, juices, bread, flour etc.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy lives in the coastal town of Likoni, Kenya. She is married and has two children. She has a green grocery stall. It is a business that has provided support and income for the entire family for a long time. She started off 13 years ago using the savings she had accumulated by selling ground nuts and popcorn before acquiring enough capital for the current business.

Nancy admits the business faces the challenges of high prices and price fluctuations. She has therefore decided to ensure efficiency in the selling process. She is applying for a loan of 21,100 Kenyan shillings to purchase a weighing machine to help with the sale of the produce. The additional income will help her purchase more items and also pay for her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase a weighing machine to help with the sale of produce.

loans.name: José Carlos

texts.es: José Carlos  de sesenta y seis años de  edad vive junto a su hija en casa propia, el posee un bazar donde vende todo tipo de artículos, en mucha variedad como peluches, plásticos, juguetes, papel decorado entre otros, su negocio está ubicado  en un lugar estratégico frente a una iglesia y seguido de un comedor, en la zona transita mucha gente es por eso que últimamente se hecho de más clientela, José procura que todos los productos que comercia sean de primera calidad para así venderlos a precios accesibles, además el servicio que ofrece es excelente siempre está a la orden de lo que necesite la clientela; él es un hombre honesto, responsable pero sobre todo trabajador, sabe que cuando una meta es demasiado importante, hay que poner todos los esfuerzos en lograrla, para José es importante mantener y abastecer el negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar peluches, papel decorado, listones, juguetes, plástico, etc. Su negocio es muy rentable y le traerá buenas ganancias por eso tiene la seguridad que así podrá saldar su financiamiento y al mismo tiempo podrá regalarle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
José Carlos is 66 years old and lives with his daughter in his own house. He owns a bazaar where he sells all types of items, having a large variety of stuffed animals, plastic toys, games, wrapping paper, and other items. His business is located in a strategic location in front of a church and by a cafe in an area where lots of people pass by and this is why he has so many customers.

José makes sure that all the products that he sells are of the best quality and he sells them at a good price, and also the service that he offers is excellent and always according to the needs of his clients. He is an honest man, dependable but above all a hard worker, knowing that when a goal is all important that one must put forth total strength in order to obtain it.

For José it is important to maintain and supply the business which is why he is asking Integral for a  loan in order to buy stuffed animals, wrapping paper, ribbons, games, plastic toys, etc. His business is very profitable and brings in good profits and because of this he feels it is likely that he will be able to pay off his loan while giving his family a good life.

loans.use: to buy stuffed animals, wrapping paper, ribbons, games and plastic toys.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is a resident of Likoni, Kenya. She is a married lady and has been farming for two years. The area has continued to supply food to the residents of the coast every season. She started farming with a small parcel of land and has now grown to a larger farm.

The season has begun and Hellen is applying for a loan of 21,100 Kenyan shillings to purchase seeds and fertilizers for the farm. The challenges are the seasonal climate and high cost of inputs, but this will be overcome as the process has begun at the right time. She desires to save additional income for future developments and also to increase the acreage of her farm.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for the farm.

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma is a farmer living in the coastal area of Likoni. He carries out tree farming. The challenge has been the seasonal climate which at times is too harsh whenever the rains fail. The area is currently receiving enough rain. This is a fertile area and has also been the source of food for many parts of the coast.
 
As the rainy season has begun, Juma is applying for a loan of 10,650 Kenyan shillings to purchase farm inputs like seeds and fertilizer. His overall goal is to purchase dairy animals. 

Juma is married and has been in the business for ten years. He believes additional income will help him supply other family needs.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs like seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina started off with about 20 seedlings but her farm has now grown to over 200 seedlings every time. She has been planting the seedlings and selling some to neighbors. She is applying for a loan of 10,650 Kenyan shillings to purchase tree planting materials, e.g., seeds and the bags.

Amina is a resident of Likoni, Kenya. The region is quite fertile and supports food production and farming in general over the rainy season. She is married and has been in the business for over ten years. Her ambition is to acquire a vehicle for transporting the seedlings. Due to the challenge of the seasonal weather, Amina hopes to also diversify into poultry keeping.

loans.use: to purchase tree planting materials, e.g., seeds and the bags.

loans.name: Isolda Adilia

texts.es: Isolda de 28 años de edad, casada cuenta con su propio negocio una pulperia que administra hace ocho años, el cual ha venido invirtiendo con ganancias y prestamos a plazos que Afodenic ha otorgado en cuatro ciclos. Hoy en dia cuenta con el apoyo de su señor esposo quien labora como operador en una de las zonas franca de nuestro pais. Con este su quinto ciclo de credito se proyecta hacerle una re-inversion a su micro-negocio y de esta manera comprar una gama de productos para obtener mejores ventas como: arroz, azucar, frijoles, harina, maiz, gaseosas, carnes, refrescos, golosinas, utiles escolares, entre otros siendo los  de mas demanda. Como planes es seguir creciendo para el bienestar comun de la familia y que junto Afodenic espera lograrlo para un porvenir mejor.
texts.en:
Isolda, age 28, is married and has her own business, a general store.  She has been managing the store for eight years, and she has been investing her earnings and loans through Afodenic through four loan cycles.   Today she counts on the support of her husband; he works as an operator in one of the free-trade zones in our country.

With this fifth loan cycle she plans to reinvest in her small business.  She will buy a range of products in order to improve sales.  She will buy things that are in the most demand like rice, sugar, beans, flour, corn, soft drinks, meat, beverages, candy, and school supplies, among others.

Her plans are to continue growing for the family’s well-being.  Together with Afodenic she hopes to do so in order to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy various products for her store.

loans.name: Gilbert

texts.en:
Gilbert has been running a retail shop for four years. He got the initial capital after selling off his plot. Price fluctuations, inflation and inadequate capital to purchase stock are his major challenges. His business goal is to expand his business into new markets. Gilbert wants a loan to buy general merchandise such as rice and sugar to sell.

Gilbert is a 42-year-old businessman, married with three children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. His personal goals are to educate his children to university level, build a permanent house for his family, and buy a car to transport his commodities to his customers.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as rice and sugar to sell.

loans.name: José Aníbal

texts.es: José Aníbal de treinta y nueve años de edad vive en casa familiar, el posee un taller donde repara bicicletas, vende repuestos y además posee una venta de chatarra,  su negocio está ubicado cerca de la localidad donde reside ya tiene varios años y él se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en el ámbito, hace poco tiempo tubo una baja en la venta y reparación del negocio y ahora que ha aumentado su clientela no quiere dejar pasar la oportunidad de aumentar las ganancias pues sabe que su trabajo es de primera calidad y todo es a precio razonable; José es un hombre servicial, trabajador pero sobre todo humilde, que está dispuesto a superarse, piensa que su más grande secreto para llegar al éxito es la dedicación y el amor a su labor, es así como  se decide solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar repuestos de bicicleta , chatarra, etc. José Aníbal tiene la capacidad de mantenerse al día con su pago, y al mismo tiempo darle a su familia una mejor  vida.
texts.en:
José Aníbal, 39, lives in a home with his family. He owns a shop where he repairs bikes, sells parts, and also sells scrap metals. His business is located near the town where he lives, and he has several years experience in the field. Awhile back, he had a drop in sales and repairs at his business and now he has increased his customer base. He does not want to miss this opportunity to increase profits. He knows that his work is of the best quality and everything is reasonably priced. 

José is a helpful and hard-working man, but above all, he is humble and prepared to better himself. He believes that the greatest secret to achieving success is dedication to and passion for one's work. For this reason, he decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL. This loan will allow him to buy bike parts, scrap, etc. José Aníbal is capable of keeping up with the payments, and at the same time giving his family a better life.

loans.use: buy tires, chains, oil, seats, brakes, etc.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: María Elena habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia. Ella y su compañero de vida se dedican  a la agricultura desde hace mucho tiempo. Cada año repiten la misma actividad de sembrar, cultivar y luego vender  parte de su cosecha para poder cubrir el resto de necesidades de su hogar. María es una mujer increíble la cual se dedica tanto de las tareas del hogar como de las del campo, las cuales consisten en cultivar los principales granos básicos del país como son: Maiz y Frijol. Esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingresos ya que es la activad que por muchos años les ha permitido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  María se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable, luchadora y carismática. Sus vecinos dan buenas referencias tanto de su trabajo como su personalidad. De acuerdo  a lo anterior a decidido acercarse a esta institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar un crédito que le permita invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, et.) para comenzar la siembra y para continuar alquilando el terreno ya que no cuenta con uno propio. Espera que con la ayuda de Dios y de esta institución pueda lograr su sueño de continuar dando a su familia el pan de cada día y algún día poder ofrecerles mejores oportunidades de vida.
texts.en:
María Elena lives in her own home with her family. She and her life partner make a living through agriculture and have done so for many years. Every year, they repeat the same activities of planting, cultivating, and then selling part of their harvest to cover the remaining needs of their household. María is an incredible woman who works on both household chores and those in the fields, which consist of cultivating the main basic grains of the country, which are corn and beans. This activity is her main source of income, since this is what has allowed her to bring bread to the table for many years.

María is characterized as being a hard-working, responsible, determined, and charismatic woman. Her neighbors give good references to both her work and her personality. Due to these characteristics, María has decided to become involved with this institution, INTEGRAL, to request a loan that will allow her to invest in buying agricultural supplies (seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, etc.) to begin planting and to continue renting land since she does not have her own land. She hopes that with the help of God and this institution, she will be able to achieve her dream of continuing to give her family their daily bread and to some day be able to offer them better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce is 45 year old married woman with 5 children living in Bundibugyo,Uganda. She is a cattle trader.  She started by selling three cows in a month but now sells twelve cows. She faces the hardships of price fluctuation and inflation. Her dream is to educate her children to higher tertiary institutions and her business goal is to own a ranch. Joyce wants a loan to buy cows for sale.

loans.use: to buy cows for sale.

loans.name: Mwamini

texts.en: Mwamini is a 44 year old business woman with eight children living in Bundibugyo,Uganda. She has been selling second hand clothes. She started the business from the proceeds of cocoa sales, a business she still has. Her major problem is inadequate capital to purchase stock.  Mwamini wants a loan to buy second hand clothes for sale. She plans to build a permanent house and another goal is to move her business to a more permanent location.

loans.use: to buy second hand clothes for sale.

loans.name: Edison

texts.en:
Edison is a 45 year old married man with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda.
He has a retail shop that has allowed him to provide basics for his family. Price fluctuations, inadequate capital to purchase stock and theft are the main hardships he faces. Educating his children and building permanent home are his personal goals and his business goals are diversifying his business to include farming and hiring employees to help expand the business. Edison wants a loan to buy merchandise such bread,cooking oil and salt for sale.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such bread,cooking oil and salt for sell.

loans.name: Ryabatenga Twimukye Tukore Group

texts.en:
Amanya, who is squatting in the photograph, is a 36-year-old married man who lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He is a member of the abovementioned group where each person guarantees the other in accessing a loan. He has personal goals of educating his children, building a permanent house and buying a car. Amanya has been a farmer for the last 15 years after starting with ten local breeds of goats. Currently he has 20 rare breed goats.
Amanya faces the hardships of price fluctuations, seasonal weather variations and inadequate capital to purchase drugs for the animals. His vision is to diversify his business to include cattle rearing, buying land to grow crops, and hiring employees to help him expand his business. Amanya intends to use his loan to buy drugs to vaccinate his goats and pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy drugs to vaccinate his goats and pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Zephanuss

texts.en: Zephanuss is a 44-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been selling beers and sodas for six years and he acquired capital from farming. The hardships he faces are price fluctuations, inflation, inadequate capital to purchase stock and high taxes. His personal goals are to educate his children, build a permanent house, and buy a car. His business goals are to diversify his business, move his business to a more permanent location, and expand his business to new markets. Zephanuss is requesting a loan to buy sodas and beers for resale.

loans.use: to buy beers and sodas for resale.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: José Luis de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene muchos años de experiencia en el ámbito de la agricultura y sabe bien cuando es el mejor tiempo de cosecha, el terreno esta acto para la siembra y muy cercano a su vivienda, tiene mucha clientela pues el maíz y frijol que comercia después de dicha cosecha, es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precio accesible además  siempre está al servicio de las personas que solicitan su producto; José Luis es un hombre emprendedor, muy seguro de lo que quiere lograr para su futuro, sabe que con constancia y dedicación lograra llegar al triunfo, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a integral un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, etc. José Luis tiene mucha confianza que su trabajo le dará la liquidez suficiente para pagar su deuda, mantener el negocio y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Luis, 44, lives with his life partner and children.  He grows corn and beans.  He has many years of experience in the area of agriculture and he knows well the best time to harvest.  His plot of land is suitable for planting and very close to his house.  He has a lot of customers because the corn and beans he sells after the harvest are of very good quality and he sells them at affordable prices.  In addition, he is always at the service of the people who request his product.

José Luis is an enterprising man.  He is very certain of what he wants to achieve for his future.  He knows that with perseverance and dedication he will manage to triumph.

This is why he decided to ask Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, insecticide, etc.

José Luis is very confident that his job will give him sufficient cash to pay his debt, support his business, and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, and insecticide.

loans.name: Efrena

texts.en:
Efrena is a 50-year-old married woman. Four of her children still go to school and are under her care. Her husband is a farmer.
Efrena sells gasoline to her community. She earns 5000 PHP per month from her business. Efrena also helps her husband grow rice crops on their land. She does her best to support her family. She is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers and more gasoline to sell. In the future, she hopes her family’s standard of living will improve.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and more gasoline to sell.

loans.name: Herson Baldemar

texts.es: Herson Baldemar de 21 años de edad, habita en casa familiar junto con sus padres y hermano. Él se dedica  al comercio de medicinas naturales y populares cerca del mercado central de la zona donde él habita. Es muy conocido en la zona como un hombre trabajador y responsable.  Tanto él como su familia son personas de negocios,  todos se dedican  a la actividad del comercio lo cual les permite trabajar unidos para lograr mejorar su situación y alcanzar un mejor estilo de vida, ya que viven en condiciones  humildes las cuales cada vez se ponen más difíciles y  la situación económica no es nada fácil,  por lo que necesitan trabajar más duro para lograr mantenerse en marcha con su negocio y poder seguir persiguiendo los frutos de sus esfuerzos.  Como todo hombre emprendedor ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito que le permita invertir en su negocio en la compra de medicamentos al por mayor como: vitaminas, pomadas para hongos, desparasitantes, medicamentos para la gastritis, jabones naturales, etc. para aumentar su inventario y poder cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado ya que solo de esta forma podrá mantenerse a flote en el mundo del comercio y podrá seguir persiguiendo los beneficios que hasta el momento le han permitido colaborar con los gastos de su hogar que cada vez son mayores.
texts.en:
Herson Baldemar, 21, lives in the family home with his parents and brother.  He sells natural and popular remedies near the central market where he lives.  He’s very well known in the area for being a hardworking, responsible man.  He and his family are businesspeople; they all work in commerce which allows them to work together to improve their situation and attain a better lifestyle since they live in humble circumstances which become more difficult every day; the economic situation is not at all easy which is why they have to work even harder to manage to keep their business afloat and continue to seek the fruits of their labors.

Like all enterprising men he’s decided to approach this institution to request this loan that will make it possible for him to invest in his business purchasing larger amounts of medicine like:  vitamins, antifungal pomade, deparasitizers, gastritis medicine, natural soaps, etc. to increase his inventory and be able to meet increased market demand since this is the only way he will be able to stay afloat in the world of commerce and be able to continue seeking profits which to date have allowed him to contribute towards household expenses which are greater all the time.

loans.use: to buy natural remedies.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe tiene 45 años de edad, y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar que está conformado por su esposo de 43 años, el cual tiene un empleo como vigilante, y sus tres hijos de 17, 12 y 11 años. Ella se dedica al comercio desde hace varios años. Posee una tienda la cual ha logrado establecer con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación. Además de su tienda también atiende  otros negocios como la venta de pupusas y de panes. En fin vale la pena recalcar  que es una mujer muy emprendedora y trabajadora que no se cansa de trabajar ya que para ella lo más importante es que sus hijos tengan mejores condiciones a las que ella y su esposo han tenido. Todo esto la motiva a trabajar más duro ya que con el salario de su esposo como vigilante  no es suficiente para cubrir los gastos del hogar que cada día son mayores. En su tienda hay variedad  de productos tales como: azúcar, sal, golosinas, aceite, frijoles, pan, sardinas, etc. El mantener su negocio surtido le permite atraer a muchas personas a solicitar sus productos ya que siempre encuentran lo que buscan y reciben un buen trato por parte de la señora Guadalupe. Como toda mujer emprendedora a tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de mercadería al por mayor como: frijoles, aceite, sardinas, azúcar, sal, pan, condimentos y de mas productos que son atractivos para los clientes. Tiene plena confianza que con su trabajo, la ayuda de Dios y de esta institución logrará su sueño de dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida diferentes a las que tienen actualmente.
texts.en:
Guadalupe, 45, lives in a house she owns with her family group composed of her forty-three year old husband who works as a watchman and their three children who are 17, 12 and 11 years old.  She’s been a merchant for several years.  She has a store she’s managed to establish with much effort and dedication.  In addition, she also has other businesses like selling ‘pupusas’ [stuffed corn griddle cakes] and bread.  It’s worth stressing that she’s a very enterprising, hardworking woman who works tirelessly because what’s most important to her is that her children have better conditions than what she and her husband have had.

All this has motivated her to work even harder because her husband’s watchman’s salary is insufficient to cover all household expenses which are higher every day.  She stocks a variety of products in her store like sugar, salt, snacks, oil, beans, bread, sardines, etc.  Keeping it well-stocked allows her to attract many people who request her products and always find what they are looking for and get good service from Guadalupe.

Like all enterprising women, she’s made the decision to ask INTEGRAL for this loan to invest in her business; she will purchase merchandise at wholesale like beans, oil, sardines, sugar, salt, bread, condiments and other products that are attractive to customers.  She has full confidence that with her work and with help from God and this institution she will reach her dream of giving her family better living conditions that are different from the ones they have now.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en: Elisa is a farmer from San Miguel, Bohol. She is 42 years old and is a married woman with 3 children ages 12, 18 and 21. Elisa primarily grows rice crops to sell. She works hard to provide for her family’s basic needs and send her children to school. She has requested a loan to purchase certified seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs. Elisa hopes to achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Emilene

texts.en: Emilene is a married woman with 3 children ages 14, 22 and 26. She and her husband are both farmers. They grow rice crops to sell. Emilene’s family depends on their income from farming. Emilene does her best to keep their farm productive. She has applied for a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies. Emilene hopes for this loan to help increase their harvest. In the future, she hopes to become a successful farmer.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.en:
Felicitas is a married woman with 5 children aged between 8 and 25 years. Her husband is a farmer.

Felicitas is a food vendor. She makes rice cakes, banana cue, and other delicacies that she sells to her community. She earns 3000 PHP per month with her business. She requested a loan to purchase ingredients such as rice, flour, bananas, and cooking oil. In the future, Felicitas hopes to have a progressive business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as rice, flour, bananas, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Walter Ramiro

texts.es: Walter Ramiro habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su madre la cual es pensionada. Él se dedica a los negocios desde hace mucho tiempo. Posee una pequeña librería en la cual también vende recargas de teléfono y presta el servicio de fotocopiadora.  Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener activo su negocio por mucho tiempo y es lo que le ha permitido ir sobresaliendo y ayudando con los gastos del hogar. Por el momento no posee otra fuente de ingresos más que la de su negocio y la pensión de su madre. El señor Walter es un hombre emprendedor ya que no deja pasar ninguna oportunidad de negocios. Es un hombre de metas ya que cuando se propone hacer algo lo hace de la mejor manera hasta que lo logra. Es muy importante mencionar que tiene muy buenas referencias por parte de su vecinos los cuales expresan estar muy satisfechos con el servicio que el ofrece ya en su negocio siempre encuentran lo que buscan a los precios más accesibles. Como todo hombre visionario ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio para lo cual solicita el apoyo de esta institución ya que no posee los recursos económicos necesarios para hacerlo por su medios. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito para invertir en la compra de de productos de librería como: cuadernos, papel bond, papel de colores, calculadoras, borradores, colores y variedad de productos que sean atractivos para los clientes.  Tiene muchas esperanzas que de esta forma podrá aumentar sus ganancias y logrará mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su madre.
texts.en:
Walter Ramiro lives in his own house with his retired mother. He’s been a businessman for many years; he runs a small bookshop where he sells telephone cards and also has a photocopier. Through much effort and dedication he has managed to keep his bookshop going for a long time. The income from it has allowed him to get ahead and helped him with household expenses. At the moment he has no source of income apart from the bookshop and his mother’s pension. 

Señor Walter is an enterprising man who lets no business opportunity pass him by. He’s a man who likes a challenge, and when he sets himself a task, he does it in the best possible way until he succeeds. It should also be noted that Walter has very good references from his neighbours who say they are very satisfied with the service he provides since they find the best prices in his store. 

Like all forward-looking individuals, Walter wants to invest in his business, so he is seeking a loan from this institution as he doesn’t have enough money of his own. He plans to use the loan to buy merchandise for his store such as notebooks, computer paper, coloured paper, calculators, erasers, crayons, and anything else his customers might like. Walter has great hopes that these purchases will bring in more money so that he can improve his own and his mother’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, computer paper, coloured paper, calculators, erasers, crayons etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medicine.

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es: Ana Cristina habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo de 23 años y su pequeña hija de 1 año y medio.  Ana es una mujer ejemplar la cual cada día se levanta muy temprano para poder cumplir con sus tareas del hogar y luego salir a hacer su recorrido en las diferentes áreas de la zona donde habita para ofrecer sus productos. Trabaja muy duro ya que siempre está pensando en la forma de colaborar con la economía del hogar ya que los ingresos de su esposo no son suficientes para cubrir todas las necesidades del hogar que cada vez son mayores. Cabe recalcar que su esposo trabaja como albañil y muchas veces no tiene trabajo ya que tiene que esperar a que salgan proyectos de en los que él puede prestar sus servicios por lo que no cuenta con un salario fijo. Para Ana lo más importante es que su familia este bien y que pueda disfrutar de mejores condiciones a las que ella ha tenido. Todo esto la obliga a trabajar muy duro y a buscar la forma de hacer crecer su negocio. En base a lo anterior a tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir como: blusas, faldas, vestidos, pantalones y de mas artículos que puedan satisfacer y atraer a más clientes. Confía que a partir de esta decisión logrará   incrementar sus ganancias y podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Cristina lives in a house of her own with her family group composed of her 23-year-old husband and year-and-a-half old daughter.  Ana is an exemplary woman who rises very early every day to do her household chores and then go out to various areas around where she lives offering her products.  She works very hard and is always thinking of ways to help with the family economy since her husband’s income is insufficient to cover all household expenses which are higher every day.  It’s worth stressing that her husband works as a bricklayer and often is out of work because he has to wait for projects to happen that he can offer his services to so he does not have steady income.

For Ana, the most important thing is that her family we well and able to enjoy better conditions than she’s had.  All of this compels her to work very hard and to find ways to make her business grow.  Based on the above, she’s made the decision to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to invest in the business buying a variety of clothes like blouses, skirts, dresses, pants and other items to attract more customers and meet their needs.  She trusts that based on this decision she will succeed in increasing profits and be able to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Gabina

texts.en:
Gabina is a widow from San Miguel, Bohol. She has 5 children. 

Gabina runs a sari-sari store business and earns 4000 PHP per month. She sells various items such as eggs, canned goods, sugar, and toiletries. Gabina’s income goes to her covering her family’s basic needs and school expenses. She hopes to earn better and be able to sustain her family. 

Gabina requested a loan to purchase 3 containers of oil, 2 containers of soy sauce, and 3 sacks of sugar. Gabina hopes for her sales and profitability to increase.

loans.use: to purchase 3 containers of oil, 2 containers of soy sauce, and 3 sacks of sugar.

loans.name: Clara Aurora

texts.es: Clara vive en Duran, tiene 53 años de edad. Clara se dedica a la venta de fritada en carretilla. Su negocio lo inicio cuando su esposo la abandono junto a sus hijos. Gracias a ello le pudo dar estudio y seguridad. En la actualidad sus hijos son mayores de edad e independientes. En la actualidad tiene otro compromiso y con él realiza la venta. No tiene horario establecido ya que recorre varios puntos de la ciudad. Clara nos cuenta que su preocupación es su salud, ya que el calor que produce preparar la fritada hace que tenga inflamaciones las cuales resultan dolorosas. Con el crédito comprar carne, colas y verduras para la preparación de la fritada. Su sueño es poder alquilar un local para su negocio.
texts.en:
Clara is 53, and lives in Duran. Clara sells fritada from a food cart (fritada is a traditional Ecuadorian dish whose main ingredient is fried pork). She started her business when her husband abandoned her and her children.  

Thanks to it, she was able to provide education and security. Now her children are adults and independent. Currently she is in another relationship, and she carries out sales with this person. She doesn't have fixed hours, as she travels to various points of the city. 

Clara tells us that she worries about her health, as the heat produced in the preparation of the fritada causes her inflammation that can be very painful. 

With the loan she will buy meat, soft drinks and vegetables, for preparing fritada. Her dream is to be able to rent a permanent location for her business.

loans.use: To buy meat, soft drinks and vegetables.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana Gloria de 49 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está constituido por su esposo y su pequeña nieta de 3 años de edad.  Junto con la ayuda de su familia se dedica a la elaboración y venta de variedad de dulces los cuales los comercializa en el interior de su hogar. Decidió dedicarse a este negocio en vista que los ingresos percibidos por el trabajo de su esposo no logran cubrir los gastos de las principales necesidades de su hogar los cuales cada día son mayores. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura razón por la cual  no cuentan con una fuente de ingresos fija ya que la agricultura es por temporada por lo que no hay un ingreso seguro de manera mensual. Por todo lo anterior  la señora Ana trabaja duramente  ya que siempre está pensando en la forma de ayudar con la economía de su hogar. Cuenta con la ventaja de que es muy conocida en la zona y muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su trabajo y de su persona.  Todo esto le ha permitido tener éxito en la venta de sus deliciosos y frescos dulces artesanales que cada día prepara y pone a la venta. En vista de todo lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de presentarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito e invertir en los insumos necesarios como: leche, azúcar, coco, tamarindo, papaya, etc. para la elaboración de los deliciosos dulces que con mucho amor realiza en cariedad de coco tamarindo, papaya y leche. Confía en Dios y en esta institución que con su trabajo y dedicación logrará alcanzar su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Gloria is 49 years old and lives in her own home that was built by her husband.  She lives with her entire family, including her small granddaughter who is 3 years old.  With the help of her family, she makes and sells a variety of sweets from her home.  She decided to start this business because her husband's income was not covering the household expenses, which seemed to grow every day.

Her husband works in agriculture, but he does not earn a steady income because agriculture is seasonal work.  For this reason, he does not have a reliable monthly income.  Therefore,  Ana works hard and is always thinking of ways to further help support her household.

She has the advantage of being very well-known in her region, and many people give her good personal and work references.  All of this has enabled her to be successful in selling her delicious and fresh handmade sweets.  She prepares them every day and then sells them.  

She decided to seek a loan so that she can invest in the necessary ingredients for her sweets, such as milk, sugar, coconut, tamarind, papaya and milk.  She trusts in God, this institution, and that with her work and dedication she will be able to reach her objective of improving the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, coconut, tamarind, papaya, etc.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a married woman with 5 children aged between 4 and 20 years. Jocelyn and her husband are both farmers. They grow rice crops to sell. 

Jocelyn works hard to keep their farm productive. She applied for a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers. She hopes to achieve an abundant harvest. She also hopes to have sufficient income to expand their business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Francisco Alexander

texts.es: Francisco Alexander tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa familiar junto con su madre e hijo. Él se dedica a la venta de leche la cual extrae todas las mañanas de sus vacas.  Este trabajo lo adquirió por tradición dado que en el pasado su familia se dedicaba a esta actividad y fue así como ahora él es el encargado del negocio.  Esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingresos y es así como han sobrevivido por mucho tiempo ya que viven de la agricultura y del cuido de ganado bobino (vacas) del cual extraen la leche que día a día ponen a la venta. Francisco es un hombre muy trabajador y luchador el cual es muy conocido en la zona por ser  muy responsable, honesto y solidario. Gracias a su carisma ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas los cuales cada día lo prefieren más ya que es uno de los pocos que ofrece su producto a los precios más accesibles para todos. Ha estado pensando en la forma de hacer crecer su negocio dado que se ha dado cuenta que la situación económica cada vez es más crítica y necesita buscar la forma de sobresalir de esta situación ya que cada vez la situación es más difícil.  Es por esta razón que solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en  compra de ganado bobino (vacas) para poder tener una oferta más grande en la venta de leche. Confía que obtendrá resultados positivos que le permitirán mejorar su  situación económica y su calidad de vida y la de su familia la cual es muy humilde.
texts.en:
Francisco Alexander is 22 years old and lives in his family's home with his mother and son.  He sells milk from his own cows, which he milks every morning.  This work was handed down to him, as his family did this work in the past, and he is now in charge of the business.  This work is his primary source of income and the way in which his family has survived for a long time.  They depend on caring for the cows and milking them every day so that they can sell the milk.

Francisco is a hard-working man and milk vendor, and he is well-known in the region because he is responsible, honest, and supportive.  Thanks to his charisma, he has earned the confidence of many people that choose to buy his milk every day.  He is one of the few vendors that offer milk at reasonable prices for everyone.

He has been thinking about how to grow his business as he has realized that the economic situation is always becoming more critical.  He needs to search for a way to survive this situation, as the situation is always more difficult.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of cows so that he will be able to offer more milk to his customers.  He is confident that he will have positive results that will enable him to improve his economic situation and the quality of life of his family, who are all very humble.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica a la venta del cultivo de maíz y frijol es un negocio muy rentable si se sabe manejar, Gerardo tiene veinte años de experiencia en el ámbito de la agricultura, hace poco comenzó su siembra pero no logro terminar y ahora que empieza la temporada de lluvia quiere avanzar de nuevo, todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es único la clientela siempre queda satisfecha; Gerardo es un hombre trabajador, honrado humilde pero sobre todo perseverante , mira la vida como la oportunidad de invertir en lo que se desea, es por eso que se decidió en solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizantes,  herramienta, etc. Gerardo tiene toda la esperanza que si trabaja duro no fallara su idea, además Gerardo cuenta con el respaldo del cultivo de café, el que le genera un ingreso suficiente a fin de poder responder por sus obligaciones económicas, es así como esperá darle a su familia una vida en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
56-year old Gerardo lives with his wife and children. He earns his living by growing and selling maize and beans. It’s a profitable business if you know how to do it--and Gerardo has 20 years of experience in the field. 

He recently started planting his crops but hasn’t finished yet. Now that the rainy season has started he wants to get going again. All that he sells is of first-rate quality and at good prices. With good service thrown in, his customers are always satisfied. 

Gerardo is a hardworking, honest, and humble man but always determined too. He sees life as an opportunity to be seized. For this reason he decided to approach INTEGRAL for a loan so he can buy maize and bean seeds, fertilizer, tools etc. He hopes that if he works hard, his goals will be reached. He also grows coffee as a back up; this generates enough income to meet his financial obligations. In these ways he hopes to provide his family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy maize and bean seeds, fertilizer, and tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Helena Emperatriz

texts.es:
Helena, vende productos de revistas y enchape de oro, es una mujer ama de casa, vive con su esposo y un hijo, ella tiene 6 años en el negocio de la venta de cosméticos  y enchape.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mas prendas enchapadas, y productos de  belleza como maquillajes, labiales, cremas para mejorar y enriquecer el negocio con la disponibilidad de productos para atender la demanda de los clientes, este préstamo le ayudara a mejorar  sus ventas y poder incluir nuevos productos como la ropa.
Su objetivo es ampliar el negocio, crecer y tener la oportunidad de ofrecer un nuevo rubro a los clientes, con la intensión de obtener más ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Helen sells catalog products and gold-plated jewelry items. She is a housewife, and lives with her husband and a son. She has been in the business of selling cosmetics and jewelry for six years.

She is applying for a loan to buy more plated jewelry and beauty products such as make-up, lipsticks and creams, in order to improve and enrich the business through the availabilty of products to meet customer demand.

This loan will help her improve her sales and enable her to include new products such as clothing.

Her objective is to expand the business, to see it grow and have the chance to offer a new product line to her customers, with the aim of earning more income for her family.

loans.use: To buy more plated jewelry and beauty products.

loans.name: Jose  Manuel

texts.es: José  es una persona  trabajadora y  muy responsable  la cual día  con día se  esfuerza  por  brindar  a  su  familia  lo mejor  en  la vida, el se  acerco a la institución ya  que  desea  acondicionar  su  hogar, en este  momento  requiere enjarrar  y  pintar  su  casa,  ve  en  el crédito la  posibilidad de   brindar  a su  esposa  e  hijos  una  excelente  estabilidad   por lo  que  se  encuentra  muy  contento.
texts.en:
José is a hardworking, very responsible person who puts in a big effort every day to provide the best he can for his family. He has approached this institution for a loan as he wishes to improve his house which he wants to plaster and paint.

José sees a loan as a way to provide his wife and children with greater stability--and for this he is very happy.

loans.use: to plaster and paint the outside of his house

loans.name: Ma. Lourdes

texts.en: Ma. Lourdes is a farmer from San Miguel, Bohol. She is 34 years old and is a married woman with seven children aged between 2 and 14 years old. Ma. Lourdes grows rice crops on her land. She earns 3500 PHP per month doing this farming. She needs additional capital to fund her farm. She plans to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies. Ma. Lourdes hopes that through farming, her family will have a more stable living.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Mayshell

texts.en: Mayshell is 21 years old and married. She is involved in farming. She grows rice crops on her land and sells her harvest to rice traders. She earns about 8000 PHP per month doing this farming. She needs additional funding to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies. Mayshell hopes for an abundant harvest. She plans to start a sari-sari store business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tools.

loans.name: Basilia

texts.en:
Basilia is a 34-year-old married woman with 3 children. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store business in Talibon, Bohol. Basilia sells various items like coffee, sugar, detergent, soap and canned goods. Her income goes toward her family’s daily needs and there is usually nothing left to replenish her inventory. She applied for a loan hoping her sales and profitability will increase. She plans to purchase canned goods, toiletries, and rice to sell. 

Basilia hopes for her business to grow so she can continue supporting her family.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, toiletries, and rice to sell

loans.name: Divina

texts.en:
Divina is 41 years old and is a married woman with 2 children ages 9 and 14. She has been in the business of raising hogs for 3 years. She earns 6000 PHP per month with this business. 

Divina requested a loan to purchase additional pigs and feed. She hopes to have a stable business in the future to help sustain her family, especially her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase additional pigs and feed

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 22 years old and is a married woman with a 4-year-old child. Her husband is a farmer.

Mary Jane raises hogs for a living. She has been in this business for a year now and earns 2000 PHP per month. Mary Jane does her best to take care of her family and help provide their needs. She requested a loan to purchase additional pigs and feed. Mary Jane hopes for her business to grow in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional pigs and feed

loans.name: Iris Emili
