texts.es: Iris  es  una joven  responsable  y  muy trabajadora  , la  cual  trabaja  en una  fabrica  de la  ciudad   y   por  las tardes  atiende  una  tienda  de  abarrotes,  estos trabajos  le permiten   generar  ingresos  para  contribuir  con los  gastos  de  su   casa,  nos  comenta  que  afortunadamente   el  numero  de  clientes  a  aumentado considerablemente  es por ello que   requiere  de  nuestra  ayuda  para   realizar  la  compra  de  mercancía  ya  que nos  comenta  que desea  tener   disponible  los productos para  cuando  se los requieran, agradece  el  apoyo  brindado para  la realización de  su  proyecto.
texts.en: Iris is a responsible, hard-working young woman and works in a factory in the city.  In the afternoons she manages a grocery store.  These jobs enable her to earn an income and contribute to her household expenses.  Fortunately, the number of her customers has considerably increased.  Therefore, she needs our help so that she can buy merchandise for the store.  She hopes to provide the products that her customers request.  She is thankful for the support so that she can carry out her project.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plaster and paint the exterior walls of his home.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is 56 years old and a married woman with children. She lives in San Miguel, Bohol with her family.

Narcisa has been involved in farming for 20 years. She grows rice crops to sell. Some of her harvest is also used for family consumption. Narcisa works hard to improve her business and sustain her family. She applied for a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs. Narcisa hopes for her business to prosper.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es: José Manuel, tiene la edad  de 41 años, está casado,  vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal como son el abono y plaguicidas entre otros. El tiene una propiedad ya sembrada de café y necesita asistirla para esta próxima cosecha y así obtener de ella el máximo de ganancias. El tiene como meta aumentar sus ganancias y darle a su familia cada día una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José Manuel is 41, married, and lives with his wife and three children, who are his greatest priority. With the loan he intends to buy supplies for maintaining his coffee plantation, such as fertilizer, pesticides and other products. 

He has a piece of land already planted in coffee, and needs to maintain it for the next harvest, and this way earn the maximum profit from it. His goal is to increase his earnings, and each day provide his family with better well-being and quality of life. 

This is the first loan he has received from Fudecosur. He had not had other loans from regular banks previously, but Fudecosur has offered him the loan on easier terms and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To maintain his coffee plantation.

loans.name: Arminda

texts.es: La Sra. Arminda tiene 26 años y es soltera con 1 hijos que tiene la edad de  2 añitos, ella se dedica a la venta  de pollos en su puesto de venta se encuentran en uno de los mercados de la localidad de El Torno. Este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Arminda  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de un Frízer que le hace falta para conservar la carne de pollo,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital para la compra frizer. La Sra. Arminda enfrenta retos en su negocio que son crecer en clientela y va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar  la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Arminda is 26 years old, single, and has a two-year-old child. She sells chickens from a vending stall at one of the markets in the town of El Torno. This loan is her second cycle with Emprender.

Sra. Arminda will use this loan to purchase a freezer since she lacks the means of preserving the chicken meat. Her reason for requesting this loan is that she lacks the capital required to buy a freezer. Sra. Arminda faces challenges in her business, such as growing her customer base. By utilizing the benefits of this loan, she will be able to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy firewood wholesale.

loans.name: Dolores Moncerrate

texts.es: Dolores vive en isla Trinitaria sector sur urbano de Guayaquil. Tiene 45 años y se dedica los quehaceres domésticos. A parte de esto también vende productos por catalogo el cual realiza entregando revistas a sus clientes. Dolores nos cuenta que su día es muy movido, de 10 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde realiza quehaceres domésticos y en su tiempo libre incluidos fines de semana a la venta de sus productos. En su trabajo no presenta mayor dificultad aunque el invierno si es un problema ya que se deterioran las calles y le imposibilita su labor. Es soltera pero tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 15 años de edad los cuales están en el colegio fiscal. Con el crédito va a adquirir cosméticos para la venta. En el futuro espera mejorar sus ingresos ya que desea ampliar su casa y ayudar en la universidad a sus hijos.
texts.en: Dolores lives in the Trinitaria island, urban site at the south of Guayaquil.  She is 45 years old and works doing housework for others, she also sells products by showing catalogs to her clients.  Dolores tells us that her day is really busy, from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m. she does housework and during her free time including weekends she sells products.  She doesn't see major difficulties in her job, however winter is a problem because the streets are in bad shape and it makes her job harder.  She is single but has two children ages 17 and 15, they are both in school.  With the loan she will buy cosmetics to sell.  In the future she hopes to improve her income because she wishes to expand her house and help her children go to university.

loans.use: to buy lipstick, mascara and powders.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ponciana

texts.en: Ponciana raises hogs for a living. She lives in San Miguel, Bohol with her family. Her husband is a rice farmer. Ponciana wants to help provide for her family’s basic needs. She works hard to keep her pigs healthy and in good selling condition. She requested a loan to purchase additional piglets and feeds. She hopes to be able to elevate her family’s standard of living in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets and feed.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is a married woman with five children ages between 17 and 28 years old. She and her husband are both farmers. They grow rice crops for family consumption and selling. Rebecca’s husband mainly manages their rice farm. She runs a small sari-sari store to supplement their family's income. She requested this loan to purchase fertilizers and more merchandise to sell. Rebecca hopes for her earnings to improve so she that can sustain her children’s college educations.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and more merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Anabella

texts.en: Anabella is from Trinidad, Bohol. She is 39 years old, married and has two children ages 5 and 10. She and her husband run a fishing business. Her husband operates their fishing boat to catch fish and then she sells his catch at the market. Anabella is requesting a loan to purchase a boat engine. This will help their business immensely. Anabella hopes to have sufficient income to sustain her family and her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase a boat engine.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is a fish seller from Bien Unido, Bohol. She is 54 years old, married and has six children ages between 13 and 29 years old.

Carmelita has been selling fish for 10 years. She earns 6000 PHP per month doing this business. She has applied for a loan to buy a weighing scale, ice, salt and more fish to sell. Carmelita hopes to have a successful fishing business in the future. She also hopes for her children to have bright futures.

loans.use: to buy a weighing scale, ice, salt and more fish to sell.

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.en:
Felicidad is 59 years old and is a married woman with four children. Her husband is a fisherman.

Felicidad sells fish for a living. She sells fresh and dried fish. She also runs a small sari-sari store to help augment her income. Felicidad works hard to sustain her family. She also wants to be able to help her community. She lives in the island where drinking water is not readily available. She plans to start selling purified water soon.

Felicidad will use this loan to purchase more fish and merchandise to sell. She hopes to achieve her goals in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more fish and merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Piñafrancia

texts.en:
Piñafrancia is 59 years old. She is a married woman with seven children aged between 12 and 30 years. Her husband is a farmer.

Piñafrancia has been raising hogs for three years. She earns 2,000 PHP each month with this business. Piñafrancia works hard to supplement her family's income. She has applied for a loan to buy piglets and feed. She hopes to become a successful businesswoman in the future.

loans.use: To buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en: Rosita raises hogs for a living. She is 64 years old. She said that she wants to support her family and hopefully her grandchildren as well. Rosita earns 10,000 PHP each month from raising and selling hogs. She requested a loan to purchase more pigs to raise. She hopes to have a stable business and a happy family.

loans.use: To purchase more pigs to raise

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ana, es comerciante de verduras, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos, todos dependen de ella, su trabajo en el comercio de la verdura lo realiza en el mercado, donde compra en bodega los frutos frescos para poder vender.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de verduras, como las papas, plátanos, tomates, cebollas, chiles, esto le ayudara a surtir el negocio y mejorar su disponibilidad para los clientes, así podrá tener mejores ventas.
La aspiración de Ana es que a través del negocio pueda mejorar sus condiciones de vida, pues quiere crecer para esta mejor con su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is a vegetable merchant. She lives with her husband and her four children, all of whom are dependents. Her work of selling vegetables is conducted at the market where she buys fresh produce from the grocers so that she can sell these products.

Ana is requesting a loan in order to buy vegetables such as potatoes, bananas, tomatoes, onions, and chili peppers. This will help restock her business and improve the availability of products to her customers. As a result, she will have better sales. Ana aspires to use her business to improve her living conditions and experience growth so that she can provide the best for her family.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, bananas, tomatoes, onions, and chili peppers.

loans.name: Jesrail

texts.en: Jesrail is 22 years old and still single. He is a fisherman and supports his family financially. He is also saving for his future family. Jesrail earns 8000 PHP per month doing this fishing. He hopes to start raising hogs to supplement his income. He applied for a loan to purchase fishing nets, hooks and piglets. Jesrail hopes to experience progress in his life.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets, hooks and piglets.

loans.name: Lucita

texts.en: Lucita sells fish for a living. She is 51 years old, married with 7 children aged between 9 and 27 years. Lucita earns 6000 PHP per month with her business. She works hard to improve her earnings and be able to provide for her family’s basic needs. Lucita applied for a loan to buy salt, ice and more fish to sell. She hopes to have a successful fishing business in the future.

loans.use: to buy salt, ice and more fish to sell.

loans.name: Silverio

texts.en: Silverio is a 55-year-old fisherman from Talibon, Bohol. He supports his family through his fishing. He earns 7,000 PHP each month. He works hard to improve his income and be able to provide for his family’s needs. He applied for a loan to purchase fishing nets, hooks, and lead weights. Silverio hopes for his family’s life to improve.

loans.use: To purchase fishing nets, hooks, and lead weights

loans.name: Nallivis

texts.es: A Nallivis le fue muy bien con su anterior credikiva, porque compró víveres en mayor volumen que fue vendiendo rápidamente y ganando dinero también. En la actualidad invertirá su nuevo credikiva en abarrotes, cárnicos y productos alimenticios para vender aun mas y aumentar su capital de trabajo. Así mismo comprará una lavadora para fortalecer su otro negocio de alquiler de maquinarias para lavar, que también está creciendo.Esta inversión tendrá éxito, porque conoce el mercado, la hace en una época de gran movimiento comercial y especialmente sobre el potencial de clientes que cada día se acercan para acceder a uno de sus servicios.  Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: " Mucha gracias por seguir apoyando a personas que como yo no tenemos recursos, pero estamos saliendo adelante, con el apoyo de personas como ustedes. "
texts.en: Nallivis did very well with her previous Kiva loan, she bought groceries at wholesale that she sold quickly making money along the way.  Now she will invest her Kiva loan in groceries, meat and other food itesm to sell even more and increase working capital.  She will also buy a washing machine for her other business where she rents washers, business that is also growing.  This investment will be succesful because she knows the market and she is investing at a time with lots of commercial activitiy especially with the amount of potential customers that each day come to use one of her services.  Her message to Kiva lenders is as follows: "Thank you for continuing to support people like me who have no resources but are getting ahead with the support of people like you".

loans.use: to invest in groceries, meat and other food products. In addition she will buy a washer for her other business of washing machine use rental.

loans.name: Eulalia Bengolita

texts.es: Eulalia es madre soltera, tiene 34 años y vive con su familia en Playas. Hace 4 años empezó con la venta de cosméticos, productos de bazar y joyas en el sector. Fue una decisión acertada ya que tiene acogida en el barrio. Su trabajo lo realiza de lunes a sábados de 9 am a 5 pm el domingo le gusta descansar y pasar con sus hijos. Hasta hoy no ha tenido ningún inconveniente en su trabajo por lo que da gracias a Dios. Tiene 3 niñas que asisten a la escuela fiscal. Con el préstamo va a comprar mercadería como joyas, cosméticos, peluches, papel de regalo etc. En un futuro le gustaría mejorar su vivienda ya que es de caña. Suerte Eulalia.
texts.en:
Eulalia is a single mother, 34 years old, who lives with her family in Playas. Four years ago in her neighborhood she began selling cosmetics, the products often found in a bazar, and jewelry. It was a smart decision since Eulalia is well known in her barrio. She works Monday through Saturdays from 9:00 am until 5:00 pm. On Sundays she likes to rest and spend time with her children. Until now, Eulalia has suffered no complications in her work. For this she gives thanks to God. 

Eulalia has 3 daughters who attend the local public school. With this loan, she will purchase merchandise, including jewelry, cosmetics, hair decorations, gift wrapping paper, etc. In the future, she would like to make improvements on her home, since it is made of canes. Good luck, Eulalia!

loans.use: to buy jewelry, cosmetics, hair decorations and gift wrapping paper.

loans.name: Lilia Sidelina

texts.es: Lilia es una joven bachiller emprendedora. Actualmente vive en Duran en la casa familiar. Tiene una tienda de abarrotes la cual heredo de su madre quien empezó desde muy joven. Como tiene muchos años goza de bastante clientela. El negocio lo administra sola empezado su labor desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 11 de la noche. Como es soltera y no tiene hijos puede atender hasta esa hora sin ningún problema. La única dificultad que presenta es en el transporte ya que lo utiliza bastante al momento de realizar las compras ya que son diarias. Con el préstamo va a comprar arroz, azúcar, harina, granos, materiales de aseo y limpieza, etc. En el futuro desea que su negocio prospere así poder ampliarlo.
texts.en: Lilia is a young, hardworking school-leaver. She currently lives in Duran in her family home. She inherited a grocery store from her mother, who started it when she was very little. As the shop is very established, it has a good customer base. Lilia runs the business alone, starting work at 7am and finishing at 11pm. As she is single and does not have any children, she can work this late without any problems. The only difficulty that arises is transport, which she uses every day to do her shopping. With the loan, Lilia is going to buy rice, sugar, flour, grains and cleaning materials. She hopes that her business prospers so that in the future she can expand it.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, flour, grains and cleaning materials.

loans.name: Abdurahmon

texts.ru: Абдурахмон женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Имеет большой богатый опыт в скотоводстве и более 21 года занимается купле- продажей скота. Данный бизнес является основным источником дохода в их семье. Последние годы было тяжело в его бизнесе, цены на корма были высокими, с помощью и поддержке своей семьи он не продал свой скот. Сейчас в этом году он планирует расширить место содержания скота и увеличить их поголовье. Абдурахмон хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота и корма для них с целью пополнения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Abdurahmon is married and has three children. He is very experienced at animal husbandry and has been selling livestock for more than 21 years. This business is his family's main source of income. Recent years have been difficult ones for his business; feed prices have been high, and with the help and support of his family he has managed to hold on to his livestock. This year he plans to expand his livestock facilities and increase the number of animals. Abdurahmon would like to obtain a loan to buy livestock and feed to replenish his working capital.

loans.use: To buy livestock and feed for them

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is a resident of Likoni, Kenya. He is a farmer who has carried out tree and fruit farming for the last ten years. He started the process on a half an acre plot and has seen the business grow to two acres. The business has been a source of help to his family and after being introduced to Kiva partner Milango by his friends, he is applying for a loan of 10,650 Kenyan shillings to purchase seeds and fertilizers.
Omar believes the extra income from this loan will help meet his family's needs. Owing to the challenges attributed to seasonal weather, Omar has an ambition to purchase a motorcycle as an additional source of income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Pekwe

texts.en:
Pekwe is a resident of Likoni, Kenya. She is married and has been carrying out the business of tree and animal farming for the last ten years. She started off with one goat and then gradually increased the number of stock, which enabled her to purchase a parcel of land on which she carries out her current activities.
Pekwe is applying for a loan of 10,650 Kenyan shillings to cultivate the land and also purchase an ox plough. The challenge in the area is the seasonal weather but she has great plans for the future, which she intends to achieve through the loan, including the setting up of a retail shop from the additional income from this loan.

loans.use: to cultivate the land and also purchase an ox plough.

loans.name: Purity

texts.en:
Purity lives in Likoni, Kenya. She is a married mother of one child and has been running a beauty salon business for two years. She received the capital to start the business from her husband.
Purity was introduced to Kiva partner Milango by her friends and is applying for a loan of 31,500 Kenyan shillings to purchase salon stock, e.g. braids, cosmetics, hair relaxers etc. The challenge in her business is the high cost of stock, and Purity intends to overcome this by saving the additional income from the loan and upgrading the type of equipment in her business. Her future ambitions include setting up a beauty training college and building her own business premises.

loans.use: to purchase salon stock, e.g. braids, cosmetics, hair relaxers etc.

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es: Luis tiene 43 años y vive en El Fortin. Su negocio lo empezó hace 3 años cuando compro un vehiculo e inicio la destribucion de medicamentos. El trabajo lo realiza de lunes a sábado de 7 de la mañana hasta las 7 de lo noche. Su esposa Karina vende productos de belleza y tambien le ayuda en el negocio. Les ha ido muy bien y no se les a presentado ningún tipo de inconvenientes. Tiene 2 hijos de 16 y 8 años que asisten a la escuela fiscal. Con el crédito comprara inventario en medicinas para mejorar sus ventas. Su meta futura es ayudar a sus hijos en la estudios.
texts.en: Luis is 43 years old and lives in El Fortin. He started his business 3 years ago when he bought a vehicle and began distributing medicine. He does this from Monday to Saturday from 7 am to 7 pm. His wife Karina sells beauty products and also helps him with his business. They have been doing very well and no problems have come up. He has 2 children who are 16 and 8 and attend public school. With the loan he will purchase medicine inventory to improve his sales. His future goal is to help his children with their education.

loans.use: to purchase medicine

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis es de Quevedo. Tiene 27 años está soltero y no tiene hijos. Actualmente se encuentra estudiando la universidad ya que le gustaría ser maestro. El negocio lo aprendió de sus padres quienes lo motivaron a invertir su dinero comercializando frutas. En la actualidad el negocio lo atienden solo desde las 7am hasta las 5 pm. El préstamo la va a utilizar en la compra de productos como sandia, naranjas y un extractor de jugos industrial. Espera aumentar sus ventas para arreglar un poco su casa que es de caña y terminar sus estudios
texts.en: Luis is from Quevedo. He is 27 years old, single, and has no children. Right now he is studying at the university because he wants to be a teacher. He learned his business from his parents who motivated him to invest his money in selling fruit. Now he attends to his business from 7 am until 5 pm. He will use the loan to buy products such as watermelons, oranges and an industrial juicer. He hopes to increase his sales to fix up his house a little, as it is made of cane, and also to finish his studies.

loans.use: watermelons, oranges, and an industrial juicer

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Hilola

texts.ru: Хилола трудолюбивая и добрая девушка. Она живет со своей тетей. Отец Хилолы погиб, когда ей было всего 3 года. Мать оставила их и уехала в Узбекистан, а они остались  на иждивении тети. Хилола порядочная и добросовестная девушка, её мечта обучить своего братика и сестренку, для этого она уже 2 года усердно работает и зарабатывает для своей семьи. Она продает постельное белье, платки и женскую одежду. Хилола хотела бы получить займ для покупки платков, постельное белье и женскую летнюю одежду для расширения своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Hilola is a hard-working and kind young woman. She lives with her aunt. Hilola's father passed away when she was only 3 years old. Her mother left them and went to Uzbekistan, and they remained in the care of their aunt. Hilila is an honest and conscientious person, and her dream is to train her little brother and sister, and for two years she has been diligently working towards this and has been earning money for her family. She sells bedclothes, shawls, and women's clothing. Hilola would would to obtain a loan to buy shawls, bedclothes, and women's summer clothing in order to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy merchandise in order to expand her business

loans.name: Diana Eugenia

texts.es: Diana vive en Quevedo con su familia. Tiene 26 años y es madre soltera. La tienda de víveres la inicio gracias a la ayuda de su hermana quien le prestó el capital inicial, al principio fue duro ya que empezó con poco inventario. Poco a poco su negocio ha ido dando resultado con lo cual ahora es más grande y esta surtido. La tienda la maneja sola desde la 6 de la mañana que empieza su rutina hasta la noche. Diana nos cuenta que fue su mejor decisión ya que le a permitido cuidar a sus hijos y darles la seguridad económica que necesitan. Tiene 5 hijos menores que estudian en la escuela fiscal. Con el préstamo en D-Miro va a comprar víveres, arroz, azúcar, granos, vitrina. Su sueño es tener su casa propia ya que vive con sus padres así mejorar su economía para ayudar a sus hijos en los estudios.
texts.en:
Diana lives in Quevado with her family.  She is 26 years old and is a single mother.  She started a general store thanks to help from her sister who lent her the initial capital.  At the beginning it was hard since she started with very little inventory.  Little by little her business has been getting better and now it is larger and better stocked.  She manages the store alone from six in the morning when her routine starts until night.  

Diana tells us that it (starting the store) was her best decision, since it has permitted her to care for her children and give them the economic security that they need.  She has five minor children who study in the public school.  

With the loan from D-Miro, she will buy supplies, rice, sugar, grains and a display case.  Her dream is to have her own house since she lives with her parents and to improve her finances to help her children in their studies.

loans.use: víveres, arroz, azúcar, granos, vitrina

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Maria Rebeca

texts.es: Maria es madre soltera. Vive en Suburbio y tiene 47 años. Su historia tiene sus inicios hace 8 años donde abrió su tienda tras renunciar a su trabajo. Maria nos cuenta que antes trabajaba como empleada domestica en una casa familiar. Con mucho agradecimiento indica que el apoyo para iniciarla se lo debe a la Sra para la que trabajaba ya que ella tiene una tienda. Aunque vive con su hijo el negocio lo atiende ella sola desde la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. En su negocio no a tenido mayores dificultades, en lo personal si ya hace poco su papa se encontraba enfermo y tenía que cerrar para cuidarlo. Todos sus hijos ya son independientes pero el último vive con ella y asiste a la universidad. Actualmente le va muy bien su negocio prospera y con el préstamo comprara mas víveres, pollos. Su meta es aumentar su casa construyendo un segundo piso.
texts.en: Maria is a single mother. She lives in Suburbio and is 47 years old. Her story started 8 years ago when she opened her store after quitting her job. Maria tells us that before she worked as a maid in a family home. With many thnaks she indicates that the support to get started she owes to the woman she worked for since she had a store. Although she lives with her son she attends to the store from morning until 10 o'clock at night. She hasn't had major problems with her business, but she has in her personal life. Her father was sick a little while ago and she had to close her business to take care of him. All of her children are on their own but the younest one lives with her and goes to college. Right now her business is prospering and with the loan she will buy more grocery items and chicken. Her goal is to enlarge her house by building a second floor.

loans.use: to buy grocery items and chickens.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Katty Juliana

texts.es: Katty es una joven emprendedora de 28 años, es soltera y no tiene hijos por el momento. Vive con sus padres en la Ferroviaria 1 sector periurbano de Duran.  Nos cuenta que su empeño en superarse es lo que la motiva día a día en su negocio, aprendió la venta de ropa con su madre quien se dedica al mismo negocio. Su horario de trabajo es de lunes a domingo todo el día. Como es mujer le preocupa la delincuencia ya que por lo general siempre lleva dinero o mercadería y tiene que transportarse en bus. Con el crédito piensa comprar de contado blusas para así obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en: Katty is a young entrepreneur who is 28 years old, she is single and has no children for now. She lives with her parents in the Ferroviaria 1, peri-urban sector of Duran. She tells us that her determination to improve is what drives her everyday in her business. She learned about the sale of clothes with her mother who also does that for a living. She works from Monday to Sunday all day long. Since she is a woman she is concerned about delinquency as she usually always carries money or merchandise and has to travel by bus. With the loan she wants to buy blouses in cash so that she can get higher profits.

loans.use: to purchase blouses for sale

loans.name: Narcisa Del Consuelo

texts.es: Narcisa empezó su tienda porque le gusta mucho el comercio. Con un pequeño capital que invirtió y poco a poco la ha ido incrementado. Es soltera por lo que ella administra el negocio. Como sus productos de venta son de primera necesidad y carne abre de lunes a domingo desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Vive en Fortin donde tiene su casa propia y vive junto a sus 2 hijos quienes asisten a la escuela. Narcisa nos comenta que este tipo de negocio es apropiado para ella ya que así puede cuidar de sus hijos. con el préstamo va a comprar aceite, azúcar, arroz, carne, verduras con esto espera que aumenten sus ventas ya que su negocio es el sustento diario de su familia.
texts.en: Narcisa started her business because she really likes commercial activities. She invested a small amount of capital and little by little she has been increasing it. She is single which is why she runs the business herself. Because she sells convenience store items and meat, she opens from Monday to Sunday from 7 am to 9 pm. She lives in Fortin where she has a house of her own and lives together with her 2 children who go to school. Narcisa tells us that this kind of business is appropriate for her since it allows her to take care of her children. She will use the loan to purchase oil, sugar, rice, meat, vegetables and she hopes sales will increase with this, since she supports her family with this business.

loans.use: to purchase oil, sugar, rice, meat and vegetables for her store

loans.name: Nancy Dominga

texts.es: Nancy tiene una reparadora de calzado en Fortín donde brinda servicio de reparación y confección. Su negocio lo inicio gracias a un préstamo con el cual compro maquinaria y materia prima. De eso ya 8 años y con el tiempo se a dado cuenta que fue una excelente inversión ya que su negocio es rentable. Actualmente son sus hijos quienes le ayudan, el negocio abre de lunes a viernes de 8 a 5 de la tarde. Nancy tiene 40 años está soltera y vive con sus 3 hijos quienes asisten a la escuela fiscal. Con el crédito a comprar suelas, hebillas, clavos con esta espera aumentar sus ventas para poder terminar su casa.
texts.en: Nancy has a shoe repair business in Fontín, where she provides shoe repair and shoemaking services.  She started her business thanks to a loan that she used to purchase equipment and raw materials.  This was 8 years ago, and over time she has realized that it was an excellent investment, as her business is profitable.  Her children help her, and the business is open Monday to Friday from 8am to 5pm.  Nancy is 40 years old and single.  She lives with her 3 children who attend school.  With this loan she will buy soles, buckles, and nails which she hopes will increase her sales so she can finish building her home.

loans.use: to purchase soles, buckles, and nails.

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es: Martha tiene 35 años, está separada y tiene 1 hijo. Vive en Suburbio zona periurbana de Guayaquil. Inicio su negocio vendiendo artículos de bazar en su casa, actualmente tiene año y medio y obtiene buenas ganancias. Como su negocio lo mantiene en casa ahí vende y cuando puede recorre el barrio ofertando sus productos por catálogos. Como no tiene horario definido le beneficia ya que puede atender a su hijo de 7 años cuando regresa de la escuela. El préstamo lo va a invertir en la compra de mercaderías, crema, perfumes, maquillaje. Con esto espera agrandarlo para tener mayores ingresos y brindarle seguridad a su hijo.
texts.en: Martha is 35 years old and she has a son.  She lives in the suburbs of Guayaquil.  She started her business selling assorted items from her home.  The business is 1.5 years old and she makes good money.  Since her business is in her home, she does her sales there.  When she can, she travels through the neighborhood selling products from catalogs.  She does not have a fixed schedule, which works well so she can take care of her 7-year-old son when he returns from school.  She will use this loan to purchase merchandise such as creams, perfume, and makeup.  She hopes to have better income and provide security for her son.

loans.use: to purchase creams, perfume, and makeup.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Verelisa Maribel

texts.es: Verelisa (quien prefiere que la llamen Maribel) es de Playas. tiene 37 años y se dedica a la venta de ropa. El negocio lo inicio hace 12 años empezando con la venta de manera ambulante. Poco a poco reunió un capital con el cual alquilo un local en la bahía de la cuidad donde exhibe mejor su mercadería. El negocio lo maneja sola pero de vez en cuando le ayuda su hija, su día empieza a las 8 de la mañana y termina a las 7 de la noche. Al momento nos indica que no tenido ningún problema ya que el lugar es tranquilo. Su esposo se dedica a la venta y elaboración de zapatillas y sus 5 hijos van a la escuela. El préstamo lo empleara en la compra de blusas, pantalones, trajes de baño. Su aspiración es ampliar su negocio, mantenerlo surtido y ayudar a sus hijos en los estudios.
texts.en: Verelisa (who prefers to be called Maribel) is from Playas.  She is 37 years old and sells clothing.  She started her business 12 years ago selling door-to-door.  Bit by bit she saved up capital and rented a shop near the bay of the city, where she can better display her merchandise.  She manages her business alone, although her daughter sometimes helps her out.  Her day starts at 8am and ends at 7pm.  She tells us that she hasn't had any problems with her business since the location is calm.  Her husband makes and sells slippers, and their 5 children attend school.  This loan will be used to purchase blouses, pants, and bathing suits.  Her goal is to expand her business, keep it stocked, and help her children with their education.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, pants, and bathing suits.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Sonnia Marlene

texts.es: Sonnia tiene 40 años es de Playas donde tiene un gabinete de belleza unisex. Nos cuenta que desde niña le gustaba por ese motivo cuando pudo se inscribió en cursos para aprender. Hace 11 años abrió su local que lo administra con su hija quien sigue sus pasos. Ella atiende solo en las tardes ya que la mañana la emplea dando clases de belleza en el colegio de la ciudad. El negocio lo abren desde las 8 hasta la 6 de la tarde de lunes a sábado. Su esposo es maestro albañil y sus hijos estudian en la escuela. El préstamo lo invertirá comprando tintes, esmaltes. Su meta futura es ampliar su negocio y comprar también maquinas exfoliantes para el cutis.
texts.en: Sonnia is 40 years old.  She is from Playas, where she has a unisex beauty salon.  She tells us that she has always liked doing hair so when she could she took classes to learn how.  Eleven years ago she opened the salon which she manages with her daughter, who is following in her footsteps.  She works at the salon only in the afternoon because in the morning she teaches beauty school classes at the city college.  The business is open from 8am to 6pm, Monday through Saturday.  Her husband is a master builder and her children attend school.  This loan will be used to purchase dyes and nail polish. Her goal is to expand her business and to purchase equipment to do skin exfoliation.

loans.use: to purchase dyes and nail polish.

loans.name: Luis Remberto

texts.es: Luis Remberto vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol ya que son sus más grandes fuentes de ingreso. Después de cada cosecha, los vende a diferentes comerciantes que son fieles compradores porque saben que las siembras de Luis son de primera calidad y siempre les da precios accesibles, además es muy servicial con toda su clientela, Luis es un hombre entregado a su  labor dispuesto siempre a aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presenta, sin dejar pasar ningún detalle para al final del camino lograr el éxito; en su última cosecha perdió casi el 80% de su producción quedándose sin ganancias y atrasando un poco sus pagos, debido a un fenómeno tropical, es así como decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita invertir en una nueva cosecha y comprar semillas de maíz y frijol, insecticida, fertilizantes etc., para poder sacar adelante su deuda. Luis tiene toda la seguridad que siendo perseverante y con mucha responsabilidad lograra salir adelante y regalarle a así familia un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Luis Remberto lives with his life partner and their son. He works as a farmer, specifically cultivating corn and beans since those are the strongest source of income. After each harvest he sells to different merchants, who are loyal buyers because they know that Luis's crops are of the highest quality and are always affordable. He is very attentive to his customers. Luis is a man who is dedicated to his work, always looking to take advantage of opportunities that present themselves and not overlooking any detail, with the ultimate goal of achieving success. 

In his last harvest he lost almost 80% of his production as a result of a tropical storm, leaving him without any profit and a little behind on his payments. Because of that he decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to invest in a new harvest and buy corn and bean seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, etc, so that he can pay off his debt. Luis feels totally sure that by persevering and being responsible he will be able to get ahead and give his family a better future.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Luis Geovanny

texts.es: Luis tiene 57 años. Hace 20 años está casado con Ercilia con quien tiene  1 hijo de 17 años de edad. Su esposa Ercilia es ama de casa y en su tiempo libre le ayuda en el negocio. La tienda la inicio en un principio porque no había un lugar por su sector en el cual comprar víveres, por este motivo y la atención que brinda tiene gran acogida. En la actualidad atiende de 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Su mayor preocupación es la temporada de invierno por las inundaciones que dañan sus productos y la delincuencia. Con el préstamo piensa comprar más productos como: arroz, azúcar, aceite, colas, leche, queso, víveres, agua etc. Su sueño futuro es comprar una camioneta que le serviría para aumentar su negocio.
texts.en: Luis is 57 years old.  He has been married to Ercilia for 20 years and they have one son who is 17 years old.  Ercilia is a housewife, and in her free time she helps with the business.  He opened his store initially because there was no shop in the area to buy groceries.  For this reason, and the great customer service he provides, the business does well.  He works from 7am to 9pm.  His greatest challenge is the winter season, due to the floods which damage merchandise, and delinquency. With this loan he will purchase more products such as rice, sugar, oil, colas, milk, cheese, groceries, water, etc.  His dream for the future is to purchase a truck that he can use to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil, colas, milk, cheese, and other groceries.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
Blanca, solicita un nuevo préstamo, para invertirlo en el negocio, comprara más pan dulce y francés, para aumentar la disponibilidad, este préstamo le ayudara para tener el dinero y realizar compras periódicas y así poder vender a sus clientes.
El efecto que le dio el préstamo anterior fue mejorar el negocio, aumentando los productos, esto le ayudo a que sus clientes no desertaran, manteniendo hasta hoy una condición estable con sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Blanca applies for a new loan to invest in her business. She will buy additional pastries and French bread (baguettes) to increase her inventory. Thanks to this loan she will have enough cash to proceed to the regular purchases she must make in order to sell bakery goods to her customers.

Her previous loan was taken out to expand her inventory and thus improve her business. It prevented her customers from leaving her and helped her to keep her income stable up to this day.

loans.use: to buy pastries and French bread.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
Doña consuelo de 54 años de edad, es madre soltera y vive en una colonia suburbana de San Pedro Sula junto a sus dos hijos.
Doña consuelo tiene dos años de dedicarse a la elaboración y venta de tortillas de maíz, anteriormente vendía verduras en forma ambulante y miro que en su colonia podía hacer este tipo de negocio de tortillas que es más rentable.  La materia prima que es la harina de maíz la compra al crédito y la paga cada 8 días, por eso decidió solicitar un préstamo por 4,000.00 Lempiras para comprarla de contado y trabajar bien, además compra la leña que utiliza para cocinar las tortillas.
Durante estos dos años le ha ido bien con las ventas, ella piensa contratar a una persona que le ayude a vender en motocicleta para expandir su negocio y con las ganancias poder ayudar a sus nietos y mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Consuelo, age 54, is a single mother, and she lives with her two children in a suburban neighborhood in San Pedro Sula.

Consuelo has been making and selling corn tortillas for two years.  She previously sold vegetables in an itinerant manner.  She saw that in her neighborhood she was able to carry out this type of tortilla business, which is more profitable.

She buys the raw material, corn flour, on credit, and she pays every eight days.  That is why she decided to request a loan for 4,000 lempiras to buy for cash and to work well.  She will also buy firewood to use to cook the tortillas.

During these two years the sales have gone well for her.  She is thinking of hiring a person to help her sell on a motorcycle in order to expand her business.  With her earnings she will be able to help her grandchildren and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy corn flour to make tortillas and firewood to cook the tortillas.

loans.name: Elsi De Jesús

texts.es: Elsi de Jesús de treinta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia. Ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como cereales, leche, pan, huevos entre otros, su negocio está ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico por la zona donde reside, dicho lugar es muy concurrido de personas, lo que ha hecho que cada día Elsi tenga más demanda en su tienda, la clientela la prefiere porque vende productos de primera calidad a precios muy accesibles además quien la visita queda satisfecho con el buen servicio, las ganancias diarias que obtiene son muy favorables, pero quiere aumentarlas para obtener un poco más de liquidez; Elsi es una mujer perseverante, alegre y muy responsable, piensa que la carrera hacia el éxito no la gana el que empieza primero, si no quien llega al final, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, productos instantáneos, bebidas, golosinas, pan dulce,  medicina, etc. Elsi de Jesús tiene la certeza que podrá mantener el negocio y ser constante con cada pago de su financiamiento,  además tiene fe que así podrá llevar al hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Elsi de Jesús is thirty-seven years old and lives with her life partner in a house of her own. She has a store where she sells items such as cereal, milk, bread and eggs among others. Her business is located in a very strategic place because of the area it is in. That area is usually crowded which has caused Elsi to have a higher demand at her store every day. Customers prefer to buy from her because she sells high quality products at very affordable prices. Also, people who visit her store are very pleased with the service provided. The daily profit she makes is very favorable, but she wants to increase it in order to gain some more cash flow. Elsi is a persevering, cheerful and very responsible person. She thinks the race to success is not won by the one who starts in the first place, but by the one who gets to the end. This is why she decided to request INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy basic grains, ready-to-eat products, soft drinks, candy, sweet bread, medicine, etc. Elsi de Jesús is confident she will be able to keep the business running and be constant with every repayment of her loan. Also she has faith in the fact that this will allow her to bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, ready-to-eat products, soft drinks, candy, sweet bread, medicine, etc.

loans.name: María Licida

texts.es: María Licida de sesenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos quienes le ayudan en el gasto del hogar, ella tiene una venta  de tortillas y es muy conocida, pues vende las tortillas más ricas y calientitas del lugar, su negocio está ubicado cerca de un colegio por lo tanto tiene mucha clientela pues a la salida de los estudiantes los padres aprovechan llevar el complemento de sus comidas, todo lo elabora con material de primera calidad y lo vende a precio accesible además el servicio es el más rápido, las ganancias promedio diarias de María son bastante favorables pero sabe que podrían aumentar si invierte un poco más en materia prima; María es una mujer trabadora y siempre aprovecha las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que en su vida no ha tenido problemas si no millones de retos, este negocio es su más grade meta es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano, aceite, etc. María tiene la seguridad que así como en financiamientos anteriores podrá responder a cada una de los pagos, y además tiene fe que con ardua labor podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Licida, 74, lives with her partner and their children who help them with household expenses. Maria sells tortillas and is very well known because she sells the most delicious hot tortillas in the area. Her business is located near a high school, which means she has a lot of customers since the student's parents have them bring tortillas home after school to complement their meals. She makes everything with good quality ingredients and sells it at an affordable price. In addition, the service is quick. 

Her daily profits are good but she knows that they could increase if she invested a little more in ingredients. Maria is a hardworking woman and always takes advantage of opportunities that present themselves. She thinks that, in her life, she hasn't had any problems, only millions of challenges. 

Growing her business is her biggest goal, and for that reason she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn in bulk, propane, oil, etc. Maria is sure that, as with previous loans, she will be able to make all her payments. She also has faith that with hard work she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk, propane and oil.

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru:
Назгул  35 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Назгул  на протяжении 10 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 5,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Назгул  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  3 коровы, 8 лошадей и 15 овец. Продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 10,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Назгул  обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойных коров, что позволит ей увеличить надои.  Доходы от кредита Назгул  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Nazgul is 35 years old, married, and has 4 children. For the past 10 years Nazgul has been raising livestock. She launched her business with 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work Nazgul's farm now has three cows, eight horses, and 15 sheep. Sale of milk and dairy products earns her about 10,000 som (KGS) per month.

To further develop her business Nazgul came to Bai Tushum and Partners for a 100,000 som (KGS) loan to buy dairy cows and thus increase milk production. She plans to use the profit earned through this loan to further expand her livestock herd.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru: Дилбар замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 5 лет она занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Она начинала свой бизнес с продажи сметаны и молока, затем постепенно расширяя бизнес добавила другие новые ассортименты продуктов. Муж помогает ей в ведении бизнеса. Дилбар хочет расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль.  От полученной прибыли она намерена провести свадьбу своей дочери. Дилбар хотела бы получить займ для покупки продуктов с целью пополнения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Dilbar is married and raising two children. She has worked in grocery sales for over five years. She began her business by selling sour cream and milk, then gradually expanded by adding new items. Her husband helps run the business. Dilbar would like to grow her business and earn a good profit. She intends pay for her daughter's wedding from this profit.  She would like to receive a loan in order to buy goods with the goal of increasing her working capital.

loans.use: To buy foods in order to increase her working capital

loans.name: Yolanda Elizabeth

texts.es: Yolanda Elizabeth vive junto a sus hijos, ella posee una  tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, pan, huevos, jabón entre otros, este negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia y es con el que sostiene su hogar, es muy conocida en la zona pues tiene la tienda más surtida, donde sus clientes encuentran todo lo que necesitan con productos de primera calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, como toda buena comerciante Yolanda siempre obtiene buenas ganancias al final del día, pero necesita invertir más para que el negocio prospere; es una mujer muy trabajadora con grandes expectativas para el futuro, piensa que la confianza en sí mismo es la base clave para alcanzar los objetivos, se ha decidido a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, pan, golosinas, condimentos, bebidas, jabones, productos que son mas demandados y no cuenta con ellos o su inventario es muy pequeño. Yolanda está segura que su negocio tiene liquidez para saldar cualquier responsabilidad económica, y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una vida con mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Yolanda Elizabeth lives with her children.  She has a store where she sells basic needs products like rice, beans, bread, eggs, and soap, among others.  This business is located in her house, and it is through the business that she supports her household.  

The store is very well-known in the area; it is the best stocked store in the area.  Her customers find everything they need.  Her products are the best quality, and the prices are quite accessible.  Like all good merchants, Yolanda always has good earnings at the end of the day.

However, she needs to invest more in order for her business to prosper.  She is a very hard-working woman with great expectations for the future.  She thinks that self-confidence is the key to achieving those objectives.  She has decided to request a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, bread, candy, condiments, and soap.  These are the products that are most in demand, and she does not have them or her inventory is very small.

Yolanda is sure that her business has the liquidity to pay for any financial responsibility.  At the same time, she has faith that she will be able to give her family a life with better opportunities.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, bread, candy, condiments, and soap.

loans.name: Kholbi

texts.ru: Холби замужем и имеет одного сына. Она трудолюбивая и целеустремленная женщина и она уверена в своем успехе. Муж водитель, сын земледелец, а Холби занимается откармливанием и продажей скота. В этом году она увеличила поголовье скота. У неё есть пастбище для скота и имеет достаточно корма на их содержание, поэтому она решила закупить скот и пасти их до поздней осени.
texts.en: Kholbi is married and has one child. She is a hardworking and dedicated woman, and assured of her own success. Her husband is a driver and her son a farmer. She works with feeding and selling livestock. This year she increased her number of animals. She has a pasture for livestock and has enough feed to keep them, so she has decided to buy animals and feed them until late autumn.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Yanira Del Carmen

texts.es: Yanira del Carmen de treinta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa ambulante en toda la zona del cantón donde reside, vende en variedad camisas, pantalones, vestidos, faldas, trajes entre otros, para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene mucha clientela y ha aumentado aún más la demanda, pues las mismas personas la recomiendan con otras porque saben que lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y vende a precio accesible, además el servicio es siempre hasta la puerta de su casa, quiere surtirse de nueva ropa y novedosa para aumentar las ventas y al mismo tiempo sus ganancias; Yanira es una mujer emprendedora dispuesta a superarse, piensa que los caminos más largos y más duros son en la meta los más satisfactorios,  ha tenido otros financiamientos y es de excelente paga  es por eso que se decidió de nuevo a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor, Yanira se siente capaz de saldar una nueva deuda y al mismo tiempo darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Yanira del Carmen is thirty-seven years old, lives together with her life partner and her son. She sells clothes door-to-door for a living all around the canton area where she lives. She sells a variety of shirts, pants, dresses, skirts and suits among others, for women, men and children. She has a large number of customers and has further increased the demand because her own customers recommend her to other people because they know what she sells is of a very good quality and she sells it at an affordable price. Also, the service is right to the door of their homes. She wants to stock up with new and original clothes in order to increase sales and at the same time her profit. Yanira is an entrepreneurial woman who is willing to outdo herself. She thinks the longest and hardest paths are the ones that are the most satisfying when the goal is reached. She has had other financing and she is excellent with repayments this is why she decided to ask INTEGRAL again for a loan that will allow her to buy clothes at wholesale. Yanira feels capable of paying off a new loan and at the same time provide her family with a better life quality.

loans.use: to purchase clothes at wholesale

loans.name: Mavlonberdi

texts.ru: Мавлонберди добрый и трудолюбивый семьянин, на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Мавлонберди начинал свой бизнес с продажи мелкого рогатого скота. Постепенно расширил свой бизнес  и увеличил поголовье скота. Его семья поддерживает его в бизнесе. Мавлонберди хочет расширить свой бизнес. Он хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Mavlonberdi is a good and hardworking family man with one child. He began his business with the sale of small livestock, and has gradually expanded the business and grown his herd. His family supports him in his work. He wants to expand his business, so he would like a loan to buy cattle in order to move toward that goal.

loans.use: To buy cattle in order to expand his business

loans.name: Rizomahmad

texts.ru: Ризомахмад добрый и трудолюбивый семьянин, на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве, а Ризомахмад уже более 5 лет занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции, таких как арбуз, дыни и репчатый лук. У него семья большая, дети взрослые, ему надо думать об учебе своих детей. Ризомахмад обращается в ИМОН Интернешнл впервые, чтобы получить займ и расширить свою площадь земли для посева, чтобы получить побольше прибыли. Ризомахмад запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и оплаты рабочих за  труд.
texts.en: Rizomahmad is a good and hardworking family man who is raising four children. His wife works for a farming co-op, and Rizomahmad has been farming for over five years, growing crops such as watermelon, melons, and onions. He has a large family and his children are getting older, so he needs to think about their education. Rizomahmad turned to IMON International first for a loan to expand his acreage for planting in order to earn a larger profit. Rizomahmad is asking for a loan to buy mineral fertilizers and to pay workers.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Mayra Beatriz

texts.es: Mayra Beatriz de veinticinco años de edad vive junto a sus padres y sus hermanos, ella posee una panadería en el lugar de su residencia y vende pan en variedad dulce y salado, tortas, pastelitos, quesadillas, cachitos entre otros, tiene mucha clientela pero en estos últimos meses el pan no le ha alcanzado para cubrir toda la demanda, ya que las personas la buscan cada vez más por el delicioso sabor del pan, saben que está elaborado con material de primera calidad y lo comercia a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Mayra es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora ama su labor, siempre aprovecha las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que no hay que rendirse siempre hay que luchar por los sueños, su meta es aumentar la producción para satisfacer las necesidades de los clientes es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina, azúcar, dulce, leche, bandejas etc. Mayra ya ha tenido otros financiamientos y es de muy buena paga y está segura que responderá con la misma responsabilidad esta vez, además sabe que así podrá regalarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mayra Beatriz, 25, lives with her parents and siblings. She has a bakery in her home and sells savory and sweet breads, cakes, empanadas, cheese bread, rolls and other things. She has a lot of customers but lately she hasn't been able to make enough bread to meet her demand, because people are coming more and more for the delicious taste of her bread. They know that it's made with high-quality ingredients and she sells it at affordable prices, and also provides excellent service. Mayra is a very friendly and hardworking woman who loves her job. She always takes advantage when opportunities present themselves, and she thinks that you can't give up but have to keep fighting for your dreams.

Her goal is to increase production to satisfy her customers' needs. For that reason she decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy flour, sugar, brown sugar, milk, trays, etc. Mayra has had other loans before and pays on time. She is certain that she will be equally as responsible this time, and she knows that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, brown sugar, milk and trays.

loans.name: Carlota De Jesus

texts.es: Carlota de Jesús de sesenta y un años de edad vive en casa propia sóla, ella quiere realizar  una mejora a su vivienda pues ya tiene muchos desperfectos, tejas quebradas, goteras y además también necesita piso, es una vivienda muy sencilla en una zona rural. Es una mujer con moral impecable muy responsable y dispuesta a aprovechar la oportunidad de tener un hogar digno para ella y su familia; Carlota es una mujer muy trabajadora, tiene una crianza de gallinas y es muy rentable, además ya es pensionada, quiere realizar su sueño de arreglar su casa, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tejas, piso, cemento, herramientas entre otros. Esta segura que podrá saldar el financiamiento y tiene fe que podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida al vivir en condiciones mas dignas.
texts.en: Carlota de Jesús is 61 years old and lives alone in her own home.  She wants to make improvements to her house as it has many problems, such as broken tiles and leaks.  It also needs a floor.  Her home is very simple and located in a rural area.  This woman has impeccable morals, is very responsible, and is willing to take advantage of the opportunity to have a worthy home for herself and her family.  Carlota is very hardworking.  She raises hens, which is very profitable, and she receives a pension.  She would like to achieve her dream of fixing up her house.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase tiles, a floor, cement, and tools.  She is sure that she will be able to make her payments and has faith that she will have a better quality of life when she lives in better conditions.

loans.use: to purchase tiles, a floor, cement, and tools.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María Magdalena de veintisiete años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, ya tiene varios años de experiencia siempre obtiene muy buenas cosechas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y siempre a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente, quiere aumentar la siembra en el terreno pero le faltan insumos para poder hacerlo; María es una mujer enérgica, trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que hay que permitirse soñar para poder ver los sueños convertidos en realidad, su más grande meta es ampliar el negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, cumas etc., sus ingresos le dan la seguridad de que podrá ir pagando el financiamiento y esta alegre porque podrá regalarle a su familia una vida con mejores oportunidades de desarrollo.
texts.en: María Magdalena is 27 years old and lives with her life companion and their children in their own home.  She grows corn and beans, and has a number of years of experience.  She always has good crops, and has many customers because all of her products are of good quality, she offers accessible prices, and she provides excellent service.  She wants to increase her crop but doesn't have the ingredients to do so.  María is a very energetic and hardworking woman, with a great desire to get ahead.  She believes you have to let yourself dream in order for those dreams to become reality.  Her biggest goal is to expand her business which is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to purchase corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and machetes. Her income provides her with the security that she will be able to make her payments, and she is happy because she will be able to provide her family with a life of better opportunities for growth.

loans.use: to purchase corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and semilla de maíz y frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, and machetes.

loans.name: Dora Odilia

texts.es: Dora Odilia de sesenta y un años de edad, vive junto a sus nietos, ella posee una tienda donde vende toda clase de artículos de primera necesidad como cereales, leche, pan, jabón entre otros, es muy conocida en la zona pues tiene el negocio más surtido y con los productos de mejor calidad a precios accesibles, además las personas siempre regresan porque el servicio es inigualable siempre están a la orden de lo que necesitan, este último mes surtió menos la tienda por falta de liquidez y no logró abarcar la demanda que sus clientes hacen de sus productos; Dora es una mujer dedicada a su labor y muy responsable y está preocupada por el negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, pan, golosinas, bebidas, huevos, jabón, etc. Ella sabe que de esta forma tendrá la capacidad de pagar el crédito y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida más digna.
texts.en: Dora Odilia is 61 years old.  She lives with her grandchildren.  She has a store where she sells all types of basic items such as grains, milk, bread, and soap, among others.  She is well known in the area because she has the best stocked business and the best quality products at reasonable prices.  People also come back because she offers the best service and she always has what they need.  This last month she did not stock her store as much because she did not have enough money, and she wasn't able to meet the demand her customers had for her products.  Dora is very dedicated to her work, very responsible, and worried about her business.  This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will let her purchase basic grains, bread, candy, drinks, eggs, soap, etc.  She knows that she will be able to pay off the loan and she will also be able to provide her family with a better life.

loans.use: to purchase grains, bread, candy, drinks. eggs, soap.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel  de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive con su compañera de vida sus hijos y su nieta; él se dedica a la agricultura, cultivo de maíz y frijol, en una zona de alto nivel de agricultura tiene muchos años de experiencia en este rubro y siempre trata de obtener las mejores cosechas para satisfacer a sus clientes, las personas lo prefieren porque lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios bajos además tiene el mejor servicio de la zona, este trabajo le deja muy buenas ganancias por eso quiere invertir más para aumentar su liquidez; Miguel es un hombre emprendedor, luchador y muy humilde, piensa que el mejor secreto en tu trabajo es la constancia y la responsabilidad solo así se obtienen grandes éxitos, él quiere cumplir su meta por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, insecticida, herramientas, etc. Miguel tiene la seguridad que podrá pagar el financiamiento y sabe que la inversión le traerá buenas ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Miguel Ángel is 51 years old.  He lives with his life partner, their children, and his granddaughter.  He works in agriculture, growing corn and beans in a very rural area.  He has many years of experience in this field and he always tries to have the best crops in order to satisfy his customers.  People prefer him because his products are top quality and he sells them at low prices. He also provides the best service in the area.  This work provides good earnings and for this reason he wants to invest more in order to improve his liquidity.  Miguel is an entrepreneurial man, a fighter, and very humble.  He thinks that the secret to his work is consistency and responsibility, which are requirements for great success.  He wants to achieve his goals so he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow him to purchase corn and bean seeds, insecticide, and tools, etc.  Miguel is sure he will be able to make his payments and knows that this investment will bring good returns in order to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds for corn and beans, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for her child’s school fees.

loans.name: Beja

texts.en:
Beja is a married man living in the coastal town of Likoni, Kenya. He is a farmer, a trade he has run for over 10 years. Beja has six children who have drawn their livelihood from this business. He was introduced to Milango by an employee and decided to join in order to access credit.

He is applying for a loan of 10,650 Kenya shilling to purchase seeds and fertilizers for his farm. The area is quite productive and produces food for the entire region during the rainy seasons.

The challenges facing his business are the seasonal weather and the high cost of transportation from the middlemen who buy the produce from him to take to the nearby markets. Beja’s ambition is to purchase a vehicle to supply the farm produce in the future.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers for his farm.

loans.name: Máxima

texts.es:
Máxima es una mujer trabajadora de 34 años, vive junto a Filemón, de 35 años, en una casa alquilada, junto a sus tres hijos, quienes son el motivo de sus esfuerzos.
Desde hace 14 años se dedica a la agricultura, ella junto a su esposo se levantan muy temprano para ir a la chacra donde producen cacao, pues es el producto que más ganancias le genera para el sustento de su familia. 
Lo que más le gusta de trabajo es hacerlo con mucha dedicación, ya que así producen mejor sus cultivos, y considera que lo más difícil es tener que cargar los sacos de su cosecha desde su chacra hasta su localidad.
Sus planes a futuro son de poner tener una tienda de abarrotes, pero por lo pronto desea mantener fértiles a sus cultivos.

Éste es su tercer crédito con MFP, en su banco comunal se siente contenta por trabajar con personas que la apoyan y comparten experiencias.
Con los 3,500 nuevos soles que ahora solicita comprará abono y fertilizantes químicos para esparcir en su parcela.
texts.en:
Maxima is a hardworking woman who is 34 years old. She lives with Filemon, who is 35 years old, in a rented house together with their three children, who are the inspiration for their hard work.
 
For 14 years she has worked in agriculture. She and her husband get up very early to go to the small farm where they produce cocoa, which is the product that generates the most income to support her family. 

Her favourite thing about working is really dedicating herself to what she is doing, since in this way she can increase her harvests. The thing she finds most difficult about her work is carrying the sacks from harvest from the farm to the town. 

Her future plans are to have a grocery store, but at the moment she hopes to maintain her crops fertile. This is her third loan with MFP. In her communal bank she feels happy working with people who support her and share their experiences. She is now asking for 3,500 nuevos soles to buy manure and chemical fertilisers to spread over her land.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Ana Veronica

texts.es: Ana Verónica de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida; ella se dedica a la venta de ropa ambulante en toda la zona donde reside, además 2 veces por semana sale a vender a otros lugares cercanos,  vende en variedad para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene ropa muy novedosa le gusta estar a la vanguardia y adelante de la competencia, posee pantalones, vestidos, camisas, faldas entre otros, tiene mucha clientela porque saben que ella  solo comercia con ropa de primera calidad y saben que la vende a precios bajos, su servicio está a la orden del día hasta la puerta de su casa;  Ana es una mujer entregada a su labor, ama lo que hace siempre está dispuesta a superarse cada vez más, piensa que hay que hacer lo que se puede y con el mayor esfuerzo hasta llegar al final, el éxito, Las ganancias promedio de Ana le han permitido solicitarle a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor ya que ha estimado que podrá pagar sus mensualidades. Tiene la confianza que de esta forma podrá seguir pagando el financiamiento y al mismo tiempo dándole una vida digna a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Veronica, 35, lives with her partner. She sells clothing door-to-door all over the town where she lives. Twice a week she leaves to go sell in other nearby towns. She sells a variety of clothing for women, men and children. She has very unique clothing and likes to be on the cutting edge, ahead of the competition. She has pants, dresses, shirts, skirts and other things. She has a lot of customers because they know that she only sells good quality items and at low prices. She is always at the service of her customers. 

Ana is dedicated to her work and loves what she does. She is always ready to overcome each challenge. She things that you have to do what you can with as much effort as possible in order to be successful. Her profit average has allowed her to ask INTEGRAL for a loan to buy clothing in bulk, since she has estimated that she will be able to make her monthly payments. She is confident that she will be able to pay her loan and also provide a good life for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing in bulk: pants, dresses, skirts and blouses.

loans.name: Hassani

texts.en:
Hassani is a farmer living in the coastal town of Likoni, Kenya. He is married and has four children. He has been in the business for over 10 years. Hassani started farming on a quarter-acre farm and has seen his business grow through the purchase of land. Now he carries out the business on two acres of land. 

His tree farming is a profitable business due to the demand for charcoal and building materials around the coastal towns. He is applying for a loan of 10,650 Kenya shillings to purchase tree seeds and fertilizers.

Due to the periodic water shortages, Hassani hopes to acquire a water pump to irrigate the land and plant vegetables during the dry season. He plans to achieve this by saving the additional profits obtained by this loan.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Loise

texts.en:
Loise is a married business lady living in Likoni, Kenya. She carries out farming on her three-acre piece of land. This has been a source of income for her family for the last 10 years. Upon learning of Milango from her friends, Loise joined the group in order to acquire a loan.

She is applying for a loan of 10,650 Kenya shillings to purchase seeds and fertilizers. During the rainy seasons, the area produces a lot of food for the farming population.

Loise hopes to open a retail shop in the near future to supplement the family income due to the shortcomings during the seasonal weather in the farming business. She also aspires to purchase an ox plow from the additional profits from this loan.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en:
Mwaka is a resident of Likoni, Kenya. She is a married farmer. Mwaka lives in an area that is quite productive and produces high yields during the planting seasons. She was introduced to Milango by her friends and is applying for a loan of 5,450 Kenya shillings to purchase seeds and fertilizers for her farm.

Her trade began over 10 years ago on a one-half-acre piece of land. She now has two acres of land from the consistent and tireless process of farming. The only challenge Mwaka has witnessed over the period is the seasonal weather with poor yields in the absence of adequate rainfall. 

Mwaka’s ambitions are to purchase a pickup truck to transport produce and provide an education to her children from the additional profits from this loan.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers for her farm.

loans.name: Abdurasul

texts.ru: Абдурасул трудолюбивый и добросовестный семьянин. В течении нескольких лет она занимается изготовлением лепешек и их реализации. Его лепешечный цех находится на центральном рынке города. Он хочет увеличить доходы бизнеса и от полученной прибыли намерен улучшить свои условия проживания. Он собирается купить кухонные приборы для лепешечного цеха. С этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 5000 сомони.
texts.en: Abdurasul is a hardworking and honest family man. Over the past several years he has been baking and selling flat bread. His bread shop is in the city's central market. He wants to increase his business's output and use the profit earned to improve his living conditions. He plans to buy kitchen appliances for his shop.  To move toward that goal he is asking for a 5000 somoni loan.

loans.use: To buy kitchen appliances

loans.name: Sanavbar

texts.ru: Санавбар трудолюбивая и заботливая жена. Её муж бизнесмен. Более 6 лет Санавбар занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Она хочет расширить свой бизнес  и увеличить ассортимент продуктов. Кроме того она имеет дополнительный доход от продажи молочных продуктов. Она хочет приобрести кухонные приборы для приготовления пищи и переработки молока, так как у неё есть 2 дойной коровы. С этой целью она запрашивает займ в размере 5000 сомони.
texts.en: Sanavbar is a hardworking and caring woman. Her husband is a businessman. Sanavbar has been in the grocery business for the past six years. She wants to expand her business and widen her inventory. She earns additional income by selling dairy products. She would like to buy kitchen equipment for food preparation and milk processing, since she has two dairy cows. With that goal she is asking for a 5000 somoni loan.

loans.use: To buy kitchen appliances

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia tiene 40 años, es una mujer trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Vive con Miqueas, quien se dedica al comercio. Fruto de esta unión tienen 2 hermosos hijos; Jordin de 18 y Pablito de 6 años de edad, a quienes quieren mucho, habitando cómodamente su casa propia.

La actividad que ella realiza es el alquiler de pequeños lotes. Cuenta con un terreno propio y extenso, viendo la oportunidad de negocio y buscando darle uso, notó la necesidad de los productores de carbón de contar con un espacio dónde elaborar su producto; entonces decidió habilitarles el acceso cobrando peajes y guardianía.
Inició hace más de 5 años y hasta el momento lo realiza ella sola y cuenta con alrededor de 50 inquilinos. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable, debido a la demanda que tiene y por la ubicación cercana a la zona de aserraderos, de donde traen la leña necesaria para elaborar el carbón. Le gusta su negocio, ya que le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual poder solventar los gastos de su hogar y las necesidades de sus menores hijos, quienes son su motivación de seguir progresando. Por lo contrario, lo que no le gusta es cuando llueve muy seguido, pues se malogran las vías de acceso, reduciendo sus ganancias; pero aun así logra ser rentable. Por tanto, tiene planes de seguir y acondicionar un espacio para hacer un recreo turístico.
