Éste es el segundo préstamo que tiene con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero para seguir con su negocio y avanzar con sus planes. Además, se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas como en el crédito anterior.
Con el monto solicitado, de 3500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de materiales como tuberías y otros para el mantenimiento de las redes de agua interna, para brindarles un buen servicio a sus inquilinos.
texts.en:
Silvia is 40 years old, a hard-working woman and eager to get ahead. She lives with Miqueas, who works in commerce. Fruit of this union they have two beautiful sons; Jordin who is 18 years old and Pablito who is six years old, whom they love very much, inhabiting comfortably in their own house.

She makes a living of the rent of small plots of land. She owns an extensive area of land, which she wanted to give it a use and she noticed the need for coal producers to have a space where to prepare their product, then, she decided to give them access and charge them tolls and security. It started over five years ago and so far she has been working alone and has about 50  tenants. She regards hers business as quite profitable one, due to the demand that has and the location close to the area of sawmills, where bring the firewood needed to develop the coal. 

She likes her business because it gives her an income, which allows her to pay her household expenses and the needs of her minor sons, whom are her source of motivation to get ahead. What she does not like is when it rains constantly because it spoils the access roads, reducing the earnings but still manages to be profitable.  Therefore, she plans to continue her business and add a space to do a tourist recreational area. 

This is the second loan has with the field partner MFP, is grateful for the financial support to continue with her business and move forward with her plans. In addition, she promises to pay her payments punctually as in her previous loan. With the amount requested, 3500 new soles, she will purchase materials such as pipes and other for the maintenance of the water networks, to provide them with a good service to their tenants.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as pipes and other for the maintenance of the water networks

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.ru: Чамшед женат и на воспитании имеет  двоих детей. Жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Более 12 лет Чамшед занимается выращиванием мелкого и крупного рогатого скота. Последние годы были сложными для содержания скота, особенно зимовка, корм для скота был очень дорогим.  Чтобы кормить скот ему пришлось продать несколько голов скота, чтобы купить корм на содержание остального скота. Сейчас он планирует пополнить место проданного скота, чтобы восстановить свой бизнес. С этой целью Чамшед запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Jamshed is married and is raising two children. His wife works for a farming co-op. Jamshed has been raising small and large livestock for over 12 years. Maintaining the animals has been difficult for the last few years, especially during winter as feed for the livestock has been very expensive. He had to sell several of his animals in order to buy feed for the remaining ones. Now he is planning to fill the place of the sold animals in order to revive his business. To achieve this goal Jamshed is asking for a loan in order to buy animals and expand his business. He hopes for your help and generosity.

loans.use: To buy cattle in order to expand his business

loans.name: Rigoberto Antonio

texts.es: Rigoberto Antonio, de sesenta y un años de edad vive junto a su tío y sus hijos; él se dedica a la venta de verdura ambulante, como tomate, cebolla, papa, chile verde entre otros, vende en todos los alrededores de la localidad donde reside y algunas veces sale hacia otros pueblos, tiene muy buena clientela y saca muy buenas ganancias todos los días, las personas saben que lo que comercia es fresco de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además tiene un servicio inigualable; Rigoberto es un hombre trabajador y muy visionario, siempre está a la expectativa de cumplir sus metas, una de ellas es surtir su negocio a fin de aperturar una zona de clientes mas grande, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verdura por mayor, tomate, cebolla, papa, chile verde etc. Don Rigoberto es de muy buena paga tiene una moral impecable y es un hombre responsable de su familia es por eso que tiene la confianza que esto le ayudara a darles  una vida más completa.
texts.en:
Rigoberto Antonio is 61 years old. He lives with his uncle and his children. He is a traveling salesman who works selling tomatoes, onions, potatoes, green chilies, and other items. He sells all around the town where he lives and sometimes sells in other villages. He has a very good clientele base and makes a good profit every day. People know that what he sells is fresh and of good quality and he sells it at good prices and furthermore his service is unrivaled.

Rigoberto is a hardworking man who is a visionary. He is always eager to meet his goals. One of them is to supply his business in order to cover a larger area of clients, and this is why he is asking for a loan through Integral to permit him to buy wholesale vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, potatoes, green chilies, etc. Rigoberto has good wages, has impeccable morals and is a dependable man from a good family and this is why he has confidence that this will help to give him a more complete life.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, potatoes, and green chilies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, pants, underwear, T-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Abduvali

texts.ru: Абдували женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. С детства любил заниматься скотоводством. Отец купил ему  одну дойную корову, и на сегодняшней день, у него в обороте 2 дойной коровы, и два теленка. Абдували хочет расширить свой бизнес и обращается за помощью к вам. Он мечтает создать свою собственную ферму и надеется, что его мечта сбудется. Абдували запрашивает займ для покупки 2 голов крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Abduvali is married and has a child. He has loved to raise animals since he was a child. His father bought him a dairy cow, and today he owns two dairy cows and two calves. Abduvali wants to expand his business and is looking to you for help. He dreams of starting his own farm and is hoping that his dream will come true. Abduvali is asking for a loan to buy two head of cattle.

loans.use: To purchase of cattle

loans.name: Makhkam

texts.ru: Махкам женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. За последние 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. У него богатый опыт и он хорошо справляется со своим делом. Сейчас Махкам успешно развивает свой бизнес и имеет хорошие условия для содержания скота. С прибылью он намерен сыграть свадьбу своего сына. В бизнесе помогает сын. Махкам запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу поддержку и щедрость.
texts.en: Makhkam is married and is raising two children. For the past 10 years he has been buying and selling livestock. He has a wealth of experience and runs his business well. Makhkam is successfully developing his business and is well set up for keeping livestock. He plans to use his profit to pay for his son's wedding.  His son helps with the business. Makhkam is asking for a loan for the purchase of livestock, with the goal of increasing his turnover capital. He hopes for your support and generosity.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es: Martha Alicia habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su madre de 53 años y sus dos hijas de 5 y 7 años, una de las cuales se encuentra estudiando.  Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace mucho tiempo. Ha logrado establecer una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia  la cual ha sabido acomodar de  tal forma que parezca atractiva para los clientes. Ella y su familia son personas  muy conocidas en la zona ya que gracias a su carisma y buenas relaciones con los demás han sabido ganarse la confianza de muchos. Martha es una mujer ejemplar ya que es muy trabajadora, emprendedora y responsable.  Ella y su familia viven en condiciones muy humildes y poco a poco van sobresaliendo con el poco dinero que  logran percibir por el negocio y otros ingresos que su madre logra recaudar con la venta de algunos artículos. Es así como poco a poco van saliendo adelante. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito ya que quiere invertir en mercadería para surtir su tienda de tal forma que pueda tener la capacidad de cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de productos de tienda como: arroz, frijoles, golosinas, detergente, pan, papel, sardinas, macarrones, sal y de más artículos que ayuden a mejorar la situación de Martha y de su familia.
texts.en:
Martha Alicia lives in her own home with her family which consists of her 53 year old mother and her two daughters who are 5 and 7 years old, one of which is a student. She has had a store for some time. She established a small store in her home which she has known how to fix up in such a way that appears attractive to customers. She and her family are very well known people in the area and thanks to her charisma and good relationships with others she has earned the trust of many.

Martha is an exemplary woman and a very hard working entrepreneur who is reliable. She and her family live in very humble conditions and little by little they are getting ahead with the little money that they manage to receive through the business and other earnings that her mother brings in selling some items. This is how little by little they are getting ahead.  She has made the decision of applying for a loan because she wants to invest in merchandise in order to supply her store so that she can have the ability to cover the increasing market demand. She will invest the money from the loan in the purchase of products for the store such as rice, beans, sweets, detergents, bread, paper, sardines, macaroni, salt and other items to help improve the situation for Martha and her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sweets, detergents, bread, paper, sardines, macaroni, salt, etc.

loans.name: Moussa

texts.fr: Monsieur Moussa vit au Sénégal. Il  s’active dans le secteur de la couture depuis 1987. Grace aux revenus que lui procure son activité, il soutient sa famille dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne. Elle consacre 12 heures de la journée à son activité. Ses principales responsabilités  au sein de la famille consiste a payer les frais de scolarités des enfants, améliorer les conditions alimentaires de la famille et épargner de l’argent. Il et membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC, et sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour acheter des  machines a coudre dans l’intention d’élargir d’avantage son activité d’ici quelques années.
texts.en:
Mr. Moussa lives in Senegal. He has been active in the clothing sector since 1987. Thanks to the revenues his business brings in, he supports his family by managing the day-to-day expenses. He devotes twelve hours a day at work. His main responsibilities within the family consists of covering his children schooling costs, improving the family's food situation, and saving money. 

Mr. Moussa is a member of a U-IMCEC branch office and is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs for buying sewing machines with the intention of further enlarging his business a few years from now.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Mboudaye Sine Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois est créé depuis le 16/10/2010 et compte actuellement 33 femmes qui habitent toutes le même village ayant comme activité  principale le petit commerce de détails et se partageant de valeurs sociales communes.

Madame Mayé est une femme mariée âgée de 62 et mère de 3 enfants et un petit fils qui lui est confié.
Mayé s'active dans le commerce de de produits divers (huile de palme, sucre, savon en poudre etc..)

Grâce a son nouveau crédit elle va se procurer de la marchandise pré-cité; 20 litres d huiles de palme 50 kilogramme de sucre en poudre 25 kilogramme de savon en poudre.

Les bénéfices réalisées lui permettront de payer des habits des fournitures scolaires a ses enfants, mais également de renforcer ses épargnes au niveau du banc villageois.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created on October 10, 2010 and currently comprises 33 women who all live in the same village. They have the same primary work in small-scale retail commerce, and they share common social values. 

Ms. Mayé is a 62-year-old married woman. She is the mother of three children, and she has a grandson entrusted to her. Mayé is active in the commerce of a variety of goods (palm oil, sugar, powdered soap, etc.)

Thanks to her new loan, she is going to acquire the previously cited merchandise:  20 liters of palm oil, 50 kg of powdered sugar, and 25 kg of powdered soap. 

The profits made will enable Mayé to pay for her children's clothing and school supplies and also to bolster her savings at the banc villageois.

loans.use: to buy palm oil, sugar, and powdered soap.

loans.name: Mamadou Bamba

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou Bamba  habite dans une banlieue sénégalaise. Il est célibataire mais constitue un véritable soutien pour sa famille. Il s’active depuis plus de 12 ans dans le secteur de la menuiserie. Ce menuisier ébéniste consacre 13 heures de temps de la journée à son activité. Il est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de sa zone d’habitation et sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de bois qui lui servira a fabriquer des meubles qui seront destinés a la vente. L’accroissement de ses revenus lui  donnera l’opportunité de diversifier sont activité pour ainsi se lancer a l’élevage. Son objectif final est de parvenir à améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille et a long terme acheter une maison.Sonreve est de devenir un grand homme d'affaire.
texts.en:
Mr. Mamadou Bamba lives in a Senegalese suburb. He is unmarried but is virtually the head of household for his family. He has been active in the furniture-making sector for twelve years. This fine carpenter devotes thirteen hours of time each day at his work. 

He is a member of the U-IMCEC branch office in his residential area and is requesting a loan of 400,000 francs for buying wood to make furniture destined for resale. 

The growth of his revenues will give him the chance to diversify his business and thus to get started in the raising of livestock. His final goal is to achieve an improvement in his family's food situation and, in the long term, to buy a house. His dream is to become a major businessman.

loans.use: to buy wood for purposes of his furniture-making business.

loans.name: Keur Diawly Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois est créé le 9 avril 2011 il est composé de 34 femmes travailleuses et habitant le même village; l'embouche et le petit commerce constituent leurs principales activités. A noter que l'une d'elles n'a pas bénéficié du prêt ce cycle pour marquer un temps de repos.

Momy, l'emprunteur vedette est âgée de 54 ans, elle est mariée mère de six enfants majeurs qui ont entre 33 et et 20 ans.Elle pratique le petit commerce et achète ses produits ( arachide, "niébé", oseille, sump fruits sauvages comestibles....)dans les marchés hebdomadaires et revend dans la capitale. Elle a une bonne expérience. Sur la photo elle est debout tout à fait à droite habillée en grand boubou, un châle noué autour des épaules et a affiché un beau sourire.

Pour chaque voyage elle convoie au minimum 100 kilogrammes d'arachide, 100 kilogrammes de "niébé", beaucoup d'oseille et surtout plusieurs kilos de "sump" (fruit sauvage comestible destiné à la transformation en huile et sirop)

Une partie des bénéfices constituera le renforcement des épargnes et l'autre partie ira à la consommation et aux besoins courants de la famille.
texts.en:
The "Banc Villageois" was created on April 9, 2011 and consists of 34 working women who live in the same village.  Fattening up livestock and small retail business are their main activities.  It is worth noting that one of these women is not taking a loan during this cycle, as she is choosing to take a break.

Momy, the featured borrower, is 54 years old.  She is married and the mother of six adult children whose ages range between 20 and 33 years.  She is a retailer and buys her goods (groundnut, cowpea, sorrel and the edible wild fruit "sump" or "desert date") at weekly markets, before reselling her goods in the capital city.  She is quite experienced in her field.  In the photo, she is standing at the far right, dressed in a large boubou with a shawl wrapped around her shoulders.  She is also smiling broadly.

Each time Momy takes a trip [to the capital city], she transports a minimum of 100 kilos of groundnut, 100 kilos of cowpea, large quantities of sorrel, and most importantly, several kilos of sump (an edible wild fruit also called "desert date" which is used for processing into oil and syrup).

Her profits will be used in part to strengthen her savings while the rest will be used to cover daily expenses and to meet the family's day-to-day needs.

loans.use: to buy groundnut, cowpea, sorrel and desert dates.

loans.name: Daisy Rosemie

texts.en:
Daisy Rosemie is 25 years old and lives in Libertad Bajo, Sinacaban. Daisy Rosemie is married with one child.

Daisy Rosemie has a general store that sells a variety of products. Daisy Rosemie has had this business for two years. Daisy Rosemie requested a loan of 7000 PHP to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages and detergents.

Daisy Rosemie has been a member of PMPC for six months. In the future, Daisy Rosemie hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages and detergents.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio tiene 51 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad desde hace muchos años.  Él se dedica  al cultivo de los principales granos básicos como: maíz y maicillo que son los cereales mas cosechados en su zona. Vive en condiciones muy humildes las cuales poco a poco quiere ir mejorando.  El señor Antonio es un hombre que se caracteriza por su entrega en el trabajo,es muy responsable y honesto. Gracias a su experiencia en esta actividad y a su carisma ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas en la zona donde habita. Cada año repite la misma activad dado que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos más  que el cultivo de la tierra. Como todo hombre emprendedor y visionario ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comenzar a preparar la   tierra en donde realizara la siembra de los granos básicos. El credito lo necesita para la compra de los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, venenos para plagas, etc.  Ya que espera que de esta forma logrará mejorar sus ingresos y podrá mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Antonio is 51 years old and has lived in his own house for years. He makes a living cultivating major basic grains such as corn and sorghum, which are the most commonly harvested cereal grains in his region. He lives in very humble conditions that he wants to improve little by little.

Antonio is characterized by his work ethic: he is very responsible and honest. Thanks to his experience in this activity and his charisma, he has been able to win the trust of many people of his region. 

Every year Antonio repeats the same work since he does not have other sources of income besides the harvesting of the land. As a hard-working and visionary man, he has decided to request this loan with INTEGRAL in order to begin preparing the land where he will harvest the basic grains. He needs the loan in order to purchase agricultural inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc. Antonio hopes that in this way he will be able to increase his income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Ricky's Group

texts.en:
Ricky is 33 years old and lives in Matugas Bajo, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is married and has 1 child. 

Ricky has a store that sells groceries and other consumable products. He has had this business for 3 years. He requested a loan to purchase more stock for his general store.

Ricky has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Ricky hopes to expand his business. Ricky is the leader of a 2-person group. Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for his general store

loans.name: Felisa

texts.en:
Felisa is 46 years old and lives in Mialem, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has 6 children. 

Felisa has a store that sells groceries and other consumable products. She has had this business for 1 year. She requested a loan of 14,900 to be used in purchasing additional groceries to sell.

Felisa has been a member of PMPC for almost 4 years. In the future, Felisa hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell

loans.name: Shella Marie

texts.en:
Shella Marie is 26 years old and lives in Sibaroc, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has 1 child. 

Shella Marie has a coconut buying and selling business and earns approximately PHP 1,500 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 3,000 to be used in purchasing feed for her hog-raising activity. 

Shella has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Shella Marie hopes to purchase more pigs.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her hog-raising activity

loans.name: Rosalindo

texts.en:
Rosalindo is married with 4 children. He is 65 years old and lives in Canicapan, Clarin.
Rosalindo is a farmer and grows rice crops to earn a living. He has been doing this for 30 years. Rosalindo has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase additional fertilizers such as inorganic fertilizer. 
Rosalindo has been a member of PMPC for 2 mos. In the future, Rosalindo hopes to send his children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizers such as inorganic fertilizer

loans.name: Bebita

texts.en:
Bebita has a general store business and earns approximately 3,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. She is 44 years old and lives in Locsoon, Tudela. Bebita is married with five children. 

Bebita has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store. Bebita has been a member of PMPC for 8 years. In the future, Bebita hopes to expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: María Leticia

texts.es: María Leticia habita junto con su esposo en casa de su propiedad. Debido a las necesidades las cuales cada día son mayores se decidió en establecer una tortillería, la cual tiene establecida en su hogar de residencia. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantenerla activa por muchos años, lo cual le ha ayudado a ir paliando las necesidades más básicas.  Desde horas muy tempranas de la mañana comienza su trabajo para preparar los insumos necesarios para la venta de las ricas tortillas. Gracias a su buen desempeño en su servicio ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas de la comunidad donde habita. Además muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su persona y trabajo dado ya que es muy trabajadora, responsable e higiénica. Además de tener una actitud muy positiva, siempre recibe a sus clientes con una enorme sonrisa. Como toda mujer emprendedora ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de los insumos básicos como: maíz, cal, gas propano, etc. para continuar dado fuerza a su negocio y lograr un mayor movimiento, dado que espera que de esta forma su nivel de ventas aumente y pueda percibir mayores ingresos que le permitan mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
María Leticia lives with her husband in their own house. Because their needs are greater each day, she decided to start a tortilla shop in their home. With a lot of effort and dedication she has been able to keep the shop active for many years, which has helped her to alleviate their most basic needs. 

María Leticia's work begins very early in the mornings with the preparation of the ingredients necessary for selling the delicious tortillas. Thanks to her good performance in service, she has won the trust of many people in her community. Additionally, many people give good references as to her character and work since she is very hard-working, responsible, and hygienic. Not only does María Leticia have a very positive attitude, but she also always welcomes her customers with a huge smile.

Like any entrepreneurial woman, María Leticia has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in her business and to purchase the basic inputs such as corn, lime, and propane gas, etc. With this loan, she will continue to strengthen her business and achieve greater sales. She hopes that her sales will increase and provide greater income that will allow her to improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to purchase corn, lime, and propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Ana Vilma

texts.es: Ana Vilma tiene 49 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su unidad familiar la cual está integrada por su esposo y 4 hijos. Su esposo y uno de sus hijos se dedican a la albañilería, dos de sus otros hijos se encuentran estudiando ya que desean superarse y poder convertirse en todos unos profesionales. En cambio, el mayor de los hijos  ayuda a Ana con el negocio de panadería que tiene ubicado en su hogar de residencia. Es así como logra llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar dado que aparte de los ingresos de su esposo y de los ingresos que percibe de su negocio no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Es por esta razón que trabaja duramente para poder dar a su familia estabilidad económica y ayudar en lo que le sea posible a sus hijos en el estudio. Es muy conocida en la zona como una persona trabajadora, responsable y honrada. Gracias a su carisma y buen servicio a logrado establecer algunos clientes fijos que cada día la prefieren más. Su deseo es poder mantener su negocio por mucho  más tiempo para continuar colaborando con la economía del hogar. Es por esto que solicita este préstamo ya que desea invertir en los insumos básicos como: harina, azúcar, levaduras, aceite, colorantes, y de más insumos necesarios para la preparación del delicioso pan. Con dicha decisión espera poder lograr su objetivo de contar con una mayor oferta, la cual le permita fortalecer la panadería y llevar el sustento al hogar. Expresa estar muy agradecido con esta institución ya que en el pasado le ayudaron cuando solicito un crédito, espera que en esta ocasión no sea la excepción.
texts.en: Ana Vilma is 49 and lives in her own home with her family, which is made up of her husband and 4 children.  Her husband and one of her sons make a living through brick laying.  Her other children are in school.  They want to better themselves and become professionals.  Her oldest son helps Ana with her bakery business that is located in her home.  This is how she manages to provide the daily bread for her home given that apart from her husband's income and the income she makes from her business, she doesn't have another source of income.  This is why she works hard to be able to give her family economic stability and to help with what is possible with her children's education.  She is very well-known in the area as a hard-working, responsible, and honorable person.  Thanks to her charisma and good service, she has been able to establish some fixed customers who prefer her more every day.  Her wish is to be able to maintain her business for a long time to continue contributing to her family's income.  This is why she is requesting this loan since she wants to invest in basic supplies like: flour, sugar, yeast, oil, food coloring, and other necessary items to make her delicious bread.  With this decision, she hopes to be able to accomplish her goal of having a larger supply, which will let her strengthen her bakery and support her home.  She expresses that she is very grateful with the institution since in the past they helped her when she requested a loan.  She hopes that this time will not be an exception.

loans.use: to buy wholesale flour, sugar, and trays.

loans.name: Jerralyn's Group

texts.en:
Jerralyn is 25 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 1 child. 
Jerralyn has a window grills fabrication business and earns approximately PHP 5,000.00 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to be used in purchasing a new welding machine unit. 
Jerralyn has been a member of PMPC for almost 1 year. In the future, Jerralyn hopes to build her own grills shop. She is the leader of a 2-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: To purchase a new welding machine unit

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is 52 years old and lives in Centro Napu, Tudela. She is married and has three children. 

Irene has a shop that sells clothes and dressmaking supplies. She has had this business for 20 years. Irene requested a loan of PHP 50000 to purchase additional ready to wear clothes.

Irene has been a member of PMPC for seven years.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional ready to wear clothes.

loans.name: Ruth Lily

texts.es: Ruth Lily, de 31 años de edad, vive en casa familiar junto a su hermano menor de 21 años. Ruth ha emprendido su negocio con una pequeña tienda instalada en su hogar, mientras su hermano es empleado de autos. Los deseos de lograr superarse económicamente para obtener mejores condiciones de vida, hicieron que Ruth iniciara vendiendo productos de limpieza e higiene, granos básicos, golosinas y otros alimentos de bajo costo que son adquiridos por sus vecinos y personas con acceso cercano a la tienda. La tienda es atendida por Ruth principalmente, pero también su hermano, al regresar cada tarde del trabajo, se ocupa de la atención de los clientes que visitan la tienda, ya que es un esfuerzo familiar por mantener una fuente de ingresos tan importante para los dos. Debido al carisma y motivación, de Ruth y su hermano, la tienda se mantiene funcionando pero necesitan acceder a un préstamo que les permita adquirir productos para la venta como: frijoles, azúcar, huevos, arroz, detergentes y otros bienes de primera necesidad para la tienda y así ser un negocio que ofrezca mayor atractivos para los clientes, por contar con más variedad de productos para la venta.  De esta forma espera darle estabilidad al negocio e incrementar sus ingresos que le permitirán accesar a mejores condiciones de vida para ella y su hermano.
texts.en:
Ruth Lily is 31 years old and lives in a family house with her 21 year old brother. Ruth launched her business with a small shop in their home while her brother is an auto employee. Driven by the desire to get ahead economically to achieve a better quality of life, Ruth began selling cleaning and hygiene products, basic grains, candies, and other low-cost foods. These products are purchased by their neighbors and others who have close access to the store.

Ruth is the primary attendant in the store but her brother also helps the customers each afternoon when he returns from work. The store is a family effort to maintain a source of income that is so important for the two of them. 

The store continues to run thanks to the charisma and motivation of Ruth and her brother, but they need a loan that will allow them to acquire more products to sell, such as beans, sugar, eggs, rice, detergents, and other essential goods. The business will offer more attractions to the customers and will have a greater variety of products for sale. In this way, Ruth hopes to give more stability to the business and increase their income, which will allow the two of them to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase beans, sugar, eggs, rice, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Telesia

texts.en:
Telesia is 22 years old and single. She would like to start a small garden where she will grow assorted vegetables that she can sell in her community or at the market. Telesia needs a loan to buy supplies to start her plantation. 

Telesia has been a member of SBPD since 2012. She will use the profits from her sales to develop her family and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals and farm supplies for growing vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making viands and snacks.

loans.name: Jiparkul

texts.ru:
Жыпаркул  36 лет, воспитывает одна 3 детей. Жыпаркул   на протяжении 15 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 20,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Жыпаркул  в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 1 корова, 1 лошадь, 8 коз и 8 овец. Продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит около 18,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жыпаркул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов на откорм.  Доходы от кредита Жыпаркул  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en: Jiparkul is 36 years old. She is a single parent, brining up three children on her own. For 15 years, Jiparkul has been raising livestock, having launched this business with a starting capital of 20,000 KGS. Thanks to Jiparkul's hard work, her farm at present includes one cow, one horse, eight goats and eight sheep. Sales of milk and dairy products bring about 18,000 KGS monthly. In order to develop her business further, Jiparkul has turned to "Bai Tushum& Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS in order to buy additional farm animals for fattening. Jiparkul plans to use the revenues derived thanks to this loan for a further expansion of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Jules Sètondji

texts.fr: Jules Sètondji est âgé de 39 ans et vit au Benin. Jules Sètondji a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Jules Sètondji est marié à une revendeuse du nom Noellie. Le couple a six enfants à leur charge dont cinq enfants constituent leurs propres enfants. Certains enfants sont scolarisés. Jules Sètondji vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Jules Sètondji mène comme activité la couture depuis dix huit ans à son atelier au Benin. Jules Sètondji s’approvisionne en fournitures de couture dans une ville du Benin. Jules Sètondji désire mieux équiper son atelier par l'acquisition d'une nouvelle machine à coudre ; ce qui lui permettra de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle. Pour ce faire, Jules Sètondji sollicite un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé
texts.en: Jules Sètondji is 39 years old and lives in Benin. He has stopped his formal education at the primary school level. He is married to Noellie, a vendor. They have six children in their care, five of whom are their own children. Some of the children attend school.Jules Sètondji lives together with his wife and children. The spouses joinlty provide for various family needs. For eight years, Jules Sètondji has been working as a tailor in his shop in Benin. He stocks up on sewing supplies in a town of Benin. He would like to upgrade his equipment by buying a new sewing machine; this will allow him to better meet customer demand. In order to to this, Jules Sètondji is seeking his first loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Claudette

texts.en:
Claudette is 35 years old and lives in Macabayao, Jimenez. She is married with three children. 

Claudette has a store that sells a variety of products. She has had this business for ten years. She has requested a loan of 30000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc. 

Claudette has been a member of PMPC for six years.  In the future, Claudette hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Aracelia Nohemy

texts.es: Aracelia Nohemy tiene 21 años de edad y habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está constituido por su abuela de 78 años de edad y pequeño hijo de 6 años. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer un pequeño puesto el cual vende variedad de frutas y verduras, ubicado en el mercado Municipal de la zona donde ella habita.  Aracelia es una joven muy admirable dado que a pesar de su corta edad tienen muchas ideas de negocio, las cuales poco a poco va poniendo en marcha. Tiene 6 años aproximadamente de dedicarse  al comercio de frutas y verduras. Todo este tiempo de experiencia en dicha actividad le ha  permitido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas las cuales cada día la prefieren más. Su deseo es incrementar el inventario de su negocio para cubrir una mayor demanda que le permite incrementar sus ingresos y por consecuencia mejorar su calidad de vida. Esto la ha motivado a acercarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito  que le permita invertir en la compra de variedad de frutas y verduras como: manzanas, guineos, piñas, naranjas, papas, tomates, cebollas y de mas productos que ayuden a mantener surtido el negocio y atractivo para los clientes. Confía en Dios que con la ayuda de esta institución y con su trabajo logrará darle mayor estabilidad al negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos y el que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Aracelia Nohemy, 21, lives with her family which consists of her 78 year old grandmother and her young 6 year old son.  With much effort, she has established a small stall, located in the town market in the zone where she lives, where she sells a variety of fruits and vegetables. 

Aracelia is a very admirable young woman given that although she is young she has many business ideas which she has been able to implement little by little.  She has been making her living in the fruit and vegetable business for approximately 6 years.  All of her experience in this activity has allowed her win the confidence of many people which prefer her business more every day. 

Her wish is to increase her inventory to meet a larger demand which would allow her to increase her income and as a result improve her quality of life.  This has motivated her to approach this institution to request a loan that will allow her to buy a variety of fruits and vegetables such as apples, bananas, pineapples, oranges, potatoes, tomatoes, onions, and more products that will help keep her business stocked and attractive to clients. 

She trusts in God that with the help of this institution and with her work she will be able to have greater stability in her business since it is her main source of income and allows her to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy apples, bananas, pineapples, oranges, potatoes, tomatoes, onions, etc.

loans.name: Mitche Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MITCHE est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier et appartiennent au même groupe de tontine. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Marthe Cholakounmi est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Marthe Cholakounmi est âgée de 24 ans et est mariée à un certain Félix. Marthe Cholakounmi a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Marthe Cholakounmi vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari et assure avec son mari les charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux différents besoins de ses enfants, Marthe Cholakounmi vend depuis deux ans, des sucettes (jus de bissap et autres) et de façon secondaire des mèches à son domicile. Marthe Cholakounmi s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Marthe Cholakounmi sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MITCHE, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: The Mitche group is composed of three individuals living in the same neighborhood and belonging to the same neighborhood savings group. This is the second time that the group is seeking financial support from ALidé, in order to expand its activities. The group’s representative, by the name of Marthe Cholakounmi, is the one raising her hand in the photo. Marthe Cholakounmi is 24 years old. Her husband’s name is Félix. Marthe Cholakounmi has stopped her formal education at the primary school level. The spouses have four children, some of whom are in school and all of whom are in their care. Marteh Cholakounmi lives together with her children and husband and, jointly with her husband, provides for different household needs. To provide for her children’s needs, for two years Marthe Cholakounmi has been selling lollipops (made with hibiscus juice etc) and, as a secondary activity, hair extensions, out of her home. Marthe Cholankounmi stocks up in a market of Benin. With the goal of meeting customer demand and increasing her sales volume and her revenues, Marthe Cholakounmi, together with the other members of the Mitche group, is seeking a second loan from ALIDé. Their first loan has been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy hibiscus leaves and hair extensions.

loans.name: Yanira Marilú

texts.es: Yanira Marilú de 34 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad, madre soltera, junto con sus dos hijos de 11, 9 años  y uno de 8 meses. Ella se dedica  al comercio de tienda desde hace muchos años. Se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora ya que tiene mucha facilidad para los negocios. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener su negocio en marcha el cual es su principal fuente de ingresos. Ha trabajado duramente para lograr sacar adelante a su familia y poco a poco va saliendo adelante y va dando lo necesario a sus queridos hijos, los cuales son su principal  fuente de inspiración. Tiene muchos deseos de superarse y de dar a su familia lo mejor ya que para ella ha sido muy difícil crecer llena de limitaciones y sabe que la única forma de cambiar esta situación es trabajando muy duro y capital fresco para invertir. Por todo lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su pequeño negocio en la compra de productos de tienda como: frijoles, arroz, azúcar, dulces, galletas, pan, sal, detergente, etc. para mantener surtido el negocio de tal forma que esto permita atraer a más clientes  que generen un aumento en las ventas como en los ingresos, de manera que estos resultados ayuden a mejorar su calidad de vida como la de sus hijos.
texts.en: Yanira Marilú is 34 years old and lives in her own home. She is a single mother of three children, ages 11, 9 and 8 months. She has made a living running her general store for many years. She is known for being an enterprising woman with a knack for business. With a lot of hard work and dedication she has been able to keep her business going as her main source of income. She has worked arduously to make headway for her family, and little by little she keeps making progress and providing for her beloved children, who are her inspiration. Yanira has a strong desire to move up in life and give her family a better life but it has been very difficult to grow amid the limitations she faces, and she knows the only way to change her situation is to work very hard and find fresh capital to invest. For all those reasons she has decided to request this loan from Kiva partner Apoyo integral to invest in her small business by purchasing products like beans, rice, sugar, candy, cookies, bread, salt, detergent and other items. This will keep her store stocked in a such a way to attract more customers, which will increase her sales and income, and these results will help her improve the quality of life for her and her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans, rice, sugar, candy, cookies, bread, salt, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Porfirio

texts.es: Porfirio tiene  54 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su compañera de vida  de 48 años y su hijo de 18 años, el cual se encuentra estudiando. Él se dedica al comercio de cocos. Además de su negocio cabe mencionar que también posee un empleo, dos actividades con las que logra cubrir las necesidades del hogar. Cuando él está trabajando su esposa se ocupa del negocio ya que se apoyan entre ambos para poder mejorar las condiciones en las que se encuentran. Además su hijo se encuentra estudiando y es su principal inspiración para continuar dando lo mejor de ellos para poder darle lo necesario y algún día poder verlo como todo un profesional con mejores oportunidades a las que ellos han tenido. Esto lo ha motivado a buscar la forma de mejorar el movimiento de su negocio dado que últimamente las necesidades de su hijo son mayores y necesitan contar con los recursos económicos que le permitan brindarle la ayuda necesaria. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de cocos al por mayor para poder cubrir una mayor demanda que le permita mejorar sus ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida. Vale la pena mencionar que está muy agradecido con esta institución ya que en el pasado le brindaron la ayuda para invertir en su negocio, espera que esta ocasión no sea una excepción.
texts.en:
Porfirio, 54, lives in the home he owns with his family - his wife, 48, and his son,18, who is in school. He sells coconuts. In addition to his business, it's worth mentioning that he also has a job, and with those two activities he is able to cover their household needs. When he is working his wife tends to the business; they support each other in order to improve their living conditions. His son, who is studying, is his biggest inspiration to keep giving them the best so that some day he can be a professional with better opportunities than his parents had. This has motivated him to look for the best way to improve his business, as his son's needs grow and they want to have the money to give him the help that he needs. 

For that reason he asks INTEGRAL for a loan to buy coconuts in bulk to meet the increased demand that will allow him to improve his profits, and thereby his quality of life. It's worth saying that he is very grateful to the institution because they have given him help with his business in the past and he hopes this time will not be an exception.

loans.use: to buy coconuts in bulk.

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es: Rosa Elena, de 53 años de edad, vive en un pueblo fuera de la capital con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 21 y 22 años. Rosa Elena y su familia viven de los ingresos que genera su vivero y el apoyo del hijo mayor. Debido a la necesidad de sostener a su familia y brindar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida de las que ella ha tenido, Rosa Elena se ve en la necesidad de cultivar plantas en su hogar y trasladarse de lunes a domingo a diferentes colonias y mercados de la capital del país y en ocasiones a petición de sus clientes realiza entregas a domicilio. Gracias al empeño y dedicación con que atiende el negocio, goza del respeto y preferencia de sus clientes y vecinos. Para lograr mantenerse en el negocio de las plantas, Rosa Elena requiere adquirir semillas, abonos, fertilizantes y otros materiales necesarios para el funcionamiento del vivero, es por ello que, ha decidido acercarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar un préstamo que le permita invertir en materias primas e insumos básicos como un empuje para mantener funcionando y fortalecer su vivero para continuar dando sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Elena, 53, lives in a town outside of the capital with her husband and their two children, ages 21 and 22. Rosa Elena and her family live on the income from her plant nursery and the support of her elder son. Due to the need to take care of her family and give her children better living conditions, Rosa Elena grows plants in her home and takes them every day to different neighborhoods and markets in the capital. Occasionally she also makes home deliveries by request.  Thanks to the determination and dedication with which she runs her business, she enjoys the respect and preference of her customers and neighbors. 

In order to stay in the plant business, Rosa Elena needs to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers and other materials to run her nursery. For that reason she has come to INTEGRAL to ask for a loan that will let her invest in inputs and basic materials as a push to keep her running and strengthen her business so that she can continue to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Ana Gloribel

texts.es: Ana Gloribel, no logró terminar sus estudios básicos, pero sus deseos de superación la impulsaron a   aprender el oficio de cosmetóloga. A sus 31 años de edad, tiene un hijo de 10 años, cuyo padre la apoya solventar algunos gastos del hogar. Además de mantener a su hijo, ella es el apoyo económico y afectivo de su madre, quien vive con ella. Ana, inició con una sala de belleza en la sala de su casa. Este negocio le permite obtener los ingresos necesarios para brindar a su familia la seguridad y estabilidad necesaria para vivir, a la vez que le permite permanecer cerca de su hijo para educarlo. Ana Gloribel necesita acceder a este préstamo  que le permita adquirir artículos necesarios para el funcionamiento de su negocio tales como: tintes, tratamientos, maquillaje, planchas de cabello, secadoras,  y otros materiales básicos para la sala de belleza, como un impulso para obtener solvencia económica para ella y su familia.
texts.en: Ana Gloribel was never able to finish school, but her desire to move up in life compelled her to learn cosmetology. She is 31 years old and has a 10-year-old son, whose father helps her cover some household expenses. Along with caring for son, she is also the financial and emotional support for her mother, who lives with her. Ana started her beauty salon in a room in her home. The business allows her to earn the necessary income to provide for her family's security and stability while at the same time stay near her son. Ana is requesting this loan to acquire necessary items for her business like dyes, hair treatments, makeup, curling irons, hair dryers and other basic materials for her salon, to help her and her family have financial solvency.

loans.use: to purchase dyes, hair treatments, makeup, curling irons, hair dyers, etc.

loans.name: José Daniel

texts.es: José Daniel tiene 58 años de edad y habita  en una de las colonias de los alrededores de la capital del país. El vive en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y dos hijos de 23 y 19 años de edad. Él se dedica al comercio de compra y venta de variedad de lentes, los cuales comercializa en el mercado central de la  capital. Tiene  16 años de experiencia en esta actividad por lo que ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas, las cuales cada día la prefieren más. El negocio está ubicado en una zona muy estratégica puesto que es muy concurrido y transitado en especial el puesto de José, ya que siempre ofrece calidad en sus productos a los precios más accesible. Junto con su esposa, que es una mujer luchadora,  trabajan en el comercio para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y poder dar el último impulso a sus hijos, ya que se encuentran en la universidad  y están muy orgullosos de saber que con sacrificio sus hijos pronto se convertirán en unos profesionales.  Ya que los estudios universitarios de su hijos demandan mayores gastos han tomado la decisión de aumentar el inventario de su negocio dado que necesitan un poco mas de ingresos para poder dar a sus hijos lo necesario. Es por esta razón que solicitan este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad de lentes para todos los gustos y preferencias, con el fin de incrementar la oferta que le permita seguir estabilizando su negocio de lentes y pueda generar un poco mas de ingresos que le permitan llevar el sustento a su hogar y ayudar con los gastos universitarios de  sus hijos. Expresa estar muy agradecido con esta institución ya en el pasado también le brindaron la mano cuando necesitaba invertir en su negocio.
texts.en: José Daniel is 58 years old and lives in the outskirts of the El Salvadoran capital in his own home along with his wife and two children, ages 23 and 19. He makes a living buying and selling a variety of glasses, which he sells in the capital's central market. He has 16 years of experience in this activity, which has allowed him to gain the confidence of many people, who prefer him more each day. His sales post is located at a very strategic area in a very busy section of the market, particularly at his post, since he always offers quality products at very affordable prices. Along with his wife, a hard-working woman, they work every day for the their household's daily bread and to be the driving force behind their children, who are attending college. They are very proud of knowing that with their sacrifice their children will soon become professionals. Since his children's education means more expenses, José decided to increase his inventory to grow his income a little to be able to provide his children what they need. It is for this reason he is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Apoyo Integral to purchase glasses for all tastes and preferences, with the goal of increasing his offerings to keep his business stable and to generate a little more income to provide for his household and help with his children's college expenses. He says he is very grateful for the support of this institution, which lent a hand in the past when he also needed to invest in his business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of glasses.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.en:
Saturnina is married and she has 3 children. She is 55 years old and lives in Poblacion, Sinacaban.

Saturnina is a farmer and raises pigs to earn her living. She has been doing this business for 10 years. Saturnina has requested a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase additional feed for her pigs. 

Saturnina has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Saturnina hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of fire wood for making charcoal.

loans.name: Cherry Mae

texts.en:
Cherry Mae is married has no children. She is 35 years old and presently lives at Gawad Kalinga, Nazareth, Buenavista, Pagadian City.

She sells rice to earn a living and she has had this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns PHP 6,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan amounting to PHP 40000 to purchase more inventory for her general store.

She has been a member of PMPC for almost 2 years. In the future, she hope to be a very successful businesswoman with PMPC as her partner-inspiration.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, soap and beverages.

loans.name: Abbie

texts.en:
Abbie is a 23-year-old single woman. She catches and sells fish in her community to earn a living. She has 3 years of experience with this business. 

Abbie needs a loan to buy new equipment. She plans to use her profits to help out with her family's weekly expenses. Abbie has been a member of SPBD since 2009.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, hooks, bait, and fishing boat

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es: Roberto Antonio de 34 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y sus hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como: maicillo y maíz.  Cabe mencionar que no solo cultiva los granos básicos si no que después de obtener la cosecha, pone a la venta una parte de la cosecha. La venta la realiza en los principales mercados de la zona donde habita.  Tiene 10 años de experiencia en esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con muchos conocimientos en el desarrollo de la misma. Debido a que la temporada para realizar la cosecha  ha comenzado, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este préstamo, dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos para realizar la inversión por su cuenta. El credito lo invertirá en la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos y fertilizantes que son necesarios para tener una buena cosecha. Tiene mucha confianza que con la ayuda de esta institución podrá comenzar la siembra de la tierra y podrá obtener una buena cosecha ya que de esta forma es como logra llevar el pan de cada día a su familia.
texts.en: Roberto Antonio is 34 years old and lives in his own home along with his wife and children. He makes a living growing basic grains like corn and sorghum. It is worth mentioning that not only does he grow the basic grains, but he also sells the products after the harvest at the main markets in his area. He has 10 years of experience in this activity, so he has gained a lot of knowledge about the trade. He is requesting the loan because the harvest season has begun but he does not have the means to invest in his crops on his own. He plans to use the loan to purchase agricultural supplies like seeds, manure and fertilizers, which are necessary in order to have a good harvest. He has a lot of confidence in the support of this institution, with which he will be able to start sowing his land and obtain a good harvest, and in this way he can continue bringing home the daily bread for his family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Potoae

texts.en:
Potoae is 41 years old and married. She has 6 children. Potoae runs a small business selling drinks, cupcakes, cookies and boiled eggs in her community. She has been running her business for 2 years. 

Potoae has requested a loan to renew her house. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Potoae will use her profits to ensure the betterment of her service.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, candy, snacks, soft drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for the repair shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cell phone load from GLOBE and SMART

loans.name: Greta

texts.en:
Greta, 43, lives with her partner and two children. She is a fifth grade teacher, but she has also been working as a moneylender for the past year. Greta gives small loans to other people in her community, such as friends and neighbors who need emergency funds or who are investing in machinery. Greta makes a profit by charging interest on the loans. 

A loan will help Greta continue her business of loaning capital to those who may not otherwise have access to financial services. Greta loves working with children. In the future she would like to open a small business selling toys, especially since her husband makes wooden toys.

Greta is receiving an individual loan as a member of the village bank "Hatunchaskas" in Cusco, which is located in the South Andean region of Peru. The bank is in its third cycle with Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to give microloans to friends and neighbors.

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has no children. 

Liza has a food/retail shop (or sari-sari store) from which she buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She had this business for 5 years. She has requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Liza has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Liza hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap and beverages.

loans.name: Tusiga

texts.en:
Tusiga is a 43 year old married woman. She has 4 children. She catches and sells fish in her community to earn her living. She has 3 years of experience with this business. 

Tusiga needs a loan to buy new fishing gear such as nets, fishing boats, hooks and bait. She plans to use her profits to renew her house. Tusiuga has been a member of SPBD since 2010.

loans.use: to buy new equipment for fishing.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.en:
Luz Marina, 48, works as a cashier in the restaurant of a hotel. She has had this job for 12 years. Luz is married and has two children. 

A loan will help Luz to pay for her daughter’s university education. Her daughter is studying psychology and has one more year left until graduation. Luz Marina dreams of having her own business one day, perhaps a jewelry store.

Luz Marina is receiving an individual loan as a member of the village bank "Hatunchaskas" in Cusco, which is located in the South Andean region of Peru. The bank is in its third cycle with Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's university tuition.

loans.name: Litia

texts.en:
Litia is 48 years old and married. She has 3 children. She makes and sells elei (printed material) to earn her living. She has been doing this for 4 years. 

Litia has requested a loan to buy fabric paint, wooden designs, brushes, and new material. She plans to use her profits to expand her business. Litia joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making elei (Samoan printed cloth).

loans.name: Henrry

texts.en:
Henrry, 38, is a mineworker. He has been doing this job, on and off, for the last three years at a gold mine, about seven hours away from Cusco. He is requesting a loan to invest in his mother’s business. His mother sells artisan crafts that she handknits, including hats and sweaters. A loan will allow her to buy more yarn. Henrry says that, in the future, he would like to finish his engineering degree.

Henrry is receiving an individual loan as a member of the village bank "Hatunchaskas" in Cusco, which is located in the South Andean region of Peru. The bank is in its third cycle with Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to buy yarn for his mother's knitwear business.

loans.name: Leonora's Group

texts.en:
Leonora is married and has two children. She is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines.   

Leonora is a farmer and grows corn and palay to earn a living. She has been doing this for 4 years. She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase farm inputs.               

Leonora has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Leonora hopes to harvest more crops. Leonora is the leader of a 2 person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase more fertilizers for her farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of herbal products to sell.

loans.name: Israel Hernández

texts.es: Israel de 51 años de edad, vive en una casa que cuida desde hace muchos años junto con su esposa.  Piensa trabajar muy duro para poder comprar esta casa en el futuro dado que no cuenta con casa propia.  Sus hijos ya hicieron sus propios hogares, razón por la cual habita solo con su esposa. Él y su esposa se dedican al comercio de compra y venta de camisas de vestir y deportivas para caballero. Tiene muchos años de trabajar en  este negocio, por lo que ya cuenta con clientes fijos. Muchas personas lo prefieren ya que es un hombre trabajador, positivo, responsable y honrado. Siempre ha mantenido su negocio muy surtido, esto le ha permitido que muchas personas lo visiten y demanden sus productos. En vista de que son muchas las personas que solicitan su negocio y cada vez demandan nuevos estilos ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad de nuevos estilos de camisas de vestir y deportivas para surtir su negocio de venta de camisas para caballero. Considera que de esta forma logrará mejorar sus ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida y la de su esposa.
texts.en: Israel is 51 years old and lives in a home he has shared with his wife for many years. He plans to work very hard in order to buy this house in future since they don't own a home. His children already have their own homes, which is why he only lives with his wife. He and his wife make a living buying and selling men's shirts and jerseys. They have had this business for many years, so they have regular customers. Many people prefer Israel's store because he is hard-working, positive, responsible and honorable. He has always kept his business well-stocked, which has allowed many people to visit and request products. Given that many people make requests, and each one is for a new style, he decided to seek out this loan from Kiva partner Apoyo Integral to purchase a variety of new styles of shirts and jerseys to stock his store. He thinks that in this way he will increase his income, which will in turn improve he and his wife's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of men's shirts and jerseys.

loans.name: Dolores' Group

texts.en:
Dolores is married with five children. She is 49 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is a farmer and grows hogs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase more feed for her hog-raising business.

Dolores has been a member of PMPC for 6 years. In the future, she hopes to become a successful businesswoman.

Dolores is the leader of a 2-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase more feed for her hog-raising business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
The member is 45 is married and has three children. She works as a kindergarten teacher. Her husband has a postcard business. He is a photographer who designs postcards, which he then sells in various touristic sites around Cusco and near Macchu Picchu, the famous Incan ruins. 
The member is requesting a loan to buy postcard materials, such as cardstock, and to pay for printing expenses. In the future, the member and her husband would like to buy a printer in order to reduce the costs of making the postcards.

The member is receiving an individual loan as a member of the village bank "Hatunchaskas" in Cusco, which is located in the South Andean region of Peru. The bank is in its third cycle with Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to purchase materials for the production of postcards that her husband makes.

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is married and has 4 children. She is 40 years old and lives in Farmington, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Cynthia sells rice to earn a living and had this business for 4 years. Each month, she earns PHP 3000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 8000 to purchase more sacks for her retail business.

Cynthia has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Cynthia hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks for her retail business.

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Salvacion works hard to support her family. She has a meat vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her sari-sari (variety) store.  Salvacion is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to purchase additional meat to sell for her meat vending business.

Salvacion has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional meat to sell

loans.name: Fuarosa

texts.en:
Fuarosa is 32 years old and married with 2 children. She runs a small business selling snacks, fries, and soft drinks in her community and has been doing this for 2 years.

 Fuarosa has requested a loan to buy snacks, soft drinks, cups, forks and knives, and fries. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Fuarosa will help pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy additional stock for sale at her food stall

loans.name: Emperatriz

texts.en:
Emperatriz, 57, has been in the sportswear manufacturing business for twenty years. Her clients are mostly sports teams and schools. She is married with three children. A loan will help Emperatriz buy more fabric. Currently she produces the sportswear on shared equipment and in the future she would like to buy her own machinery and run her business independently.

Emperatriz is receiving an individual loan as a member of the village bank "Hatunchaskas" in Cusco, which is located in the South Andean region of Peru. The bank is in its third cycle with Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to buy fabric to produce sportswear

loans.name: Jundee Basilides

texts.en:
Jundee Basilides is 37 years old and married with three children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Jundee Basilides is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and farm equipment for her business.

Jundee Basilides has been farming rice for 5 years and also earns additional income from electronic re-loading.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and farm equipment for her business

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en:
Rosenda is 44 years old and lives in Lopoc, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married and has 6 children.

To earn a living, Rosenda has a business selling a variety of viands. She earns about PHP 5000 each month doing this type of work. Rosenda has requested a loan of PHP 7000 to purchase raw ingredients for her viand business.

Rosenda has been a member of PMPC for 20 years. In the future, Rosenda would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her viand business.

loans.name: Mafoe

texts.en:
Mafoe is a 36 year old married woman who has 4 children. She has a small plantation and grows taro, yams and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years. 

Mafoe has requested a loan to buy weed killers, other chemicals, chemical sprayers and crops. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Mafoe hopes to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy more crops, equipment, and chemicals.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.en:
Carlos is 56 years old and married. He has 4 children. He earns a living farming rice in the Philippines. Carlos is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Carlos has been farming rice for 5 years and also earns additional income from food vending. He is working tirelessly toward the attainment of his dream, which is to save enough money so he can afford to send his children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
The member is in her mid-50s, married and has three children. She alternates her daily activities between selling artisanal crafts and buying and selling sweaters, t-shirts, and ceramics, among other things. 

The member is an ambulatory vendor. She used her last loan to buy a printer for her son who is in high school. Now, she is requesting a loan in order to help her daughter finish her university degree. The member's daughter is working on her thesis. In order to graduate from university, she must also complete fieldwork outside of the city of Cusco. The member will use the loan to pay for her daughter's fieldwork expenses (i.e., travel, accommodation).

The member is receiving an individual loan as a member of the village bank "Hatunchaskas" in Cusco, which is located in the South Andean region of Peru. The bank is in its third cycle with Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to support her daughter's university education.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap and beverages.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is married and has 1 child. She is 39 years old and lives in Villa Sudiacal, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Marilou owns a general store to earn a living and she has had this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns PHP 1500 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 7000 to purchase more stocks for her general store.

Marilou has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Marilou hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her general store.

location.town: Liloy-Villa Sudiacal, Liloy, ZAmboanga Del Norte

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 31 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Rose has a shop in her community that sells vegetables like squash, "camote" tops (sweet potato leaves) and carrots. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy vegetables to sell like bitter melon, cucumbers and beans.

Rose has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Rose hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Flor Del Carmen

texts.en:
The member is Flor del Carmen. She is in her mid-60s and she is married. She has four children. She has a hotel, which she has been administering for various years. She works everyday and has staff who help her in different areas of the hotel. A loan will help Flor del Carmen to buy bedspreads for her hotel. She used her last loan to maintain her hotel and to buy cleaning supplies.

Flor del Carmen is receiving an individual loan as a member of the village bank "Hatunchaskas" in Cusco, which is located in the South Andean region of Peru. The bank is in its third cycle with Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads for her hotel.

loans.name: Sifaga

texts.en:
Sifaga is a 54 year old married woman who has 6 children. She has a small plantation and grows bananas, yams, taro and breadfruit to earn a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. 

Sifaga has requested a loan to buy more weed killers, chemical sprayers, crops and a new chainsaw. She has been a member of SPBD since 2008. With her profits, Sifaga hopes to buy a pick-up truck for the betterment of her business.

loans.use: to purchase more farm supplies and equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional stocks of shoes, bags and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, soap, beverages and cell phone loads from GLOBE and SMART.

loans.name: Ruth Yanira

texts.es: Ruth Yanira de 35 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su hermana y por sus tres hijos de 18, 16 y 13 años de edad. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace varios años.  La señora Ruth es una mujer increíble la cual trabaja duramente para sacar adelante a su querida familia. Es muy conocida en la zona y tiene muy buenas referencia de parte de sus vecinos los cuales expresan estar muy satisfechos con el servicio que reciben de su parte.  Gracias a su carisma ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas por lo que cuenta con muchos clientes fijos los cuales cada día la  prefieren más, ya que es  una mujer muy emprendedora, trabajadora y responsable. Para la señora Ruth lo más importante es su familia, la cual es su principal inspiración para trabajar duramente y poder cubrir  sus necesidades. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad productos de tienda como: azúcar, frijoles, arroz, café, leche, golosinas, macarrones y de más artículos que permitan atraer a más clientes, dado  que su deseo es aumentar su oferta de tal forma que esto le permita aumentar sus ingresos y por consecuencia  su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ruth Yanira is 35 years old and lives in a house on her property together with her family, which is composed of her sister and her three sons aged 18, 16 and 13.  She has had a store for several years.  Ruth is an incredible woman who works hard to raise her beloved family.  She is well known in the area and has many good references from her neighbors who say that they are very satisfied with the service that she provides them.  Due to her charisma she has succeeded in gaining the confidence of many people, so that she has regular customers who prefer her more each day.  This is because she is an entreprising, hard-working and responsible woman.  For Ruth the most important thing is her family, which is her main inspiration for working hard and being able to afford the necessities.  SHe decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business to buy various store products such as: sugar, beans, rice, coffee, milk. sweets, pasta and other items that will allow her to attract more customers.  Her wish is to increase the products she offers so as to increase her income and as a result her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy: sugar, beans, rice, coffee, milk, sweets,  pasta.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase wholesale corn, basic grains, sweets, bread, instant products, and drinks

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 23-year-old who lives in Gaza in a very commercial city. He has a grocery store and earns approximately $464 each month doing this type of work. He has requested a youth loan in the amount of $1750 to help him cover the cost of purchasing a variety of products and groceries for sale such as: rice, milk, sugar, and cooking oil and to purchase a refrigerator. Ahmad hopes to improve his living conditions with his additional profit.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator and to help him cover the cost of purchasing a variety of products and groceries for sale.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: La señora Marlene oriunda de la Colonia  San Carlos a unos 15 kilómetros de la  localidad de San Jose, tiene casa propia que con mucho trabajo consiguió comprarse, su actividad ahora es la venta de carbón  ella vende en el mercado de la Zona,  convive con el Sr.  Luis el cual es motosierrista tienen 3 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, con el dinero del crédito la Sra. Marlene comprara carbón por mayor para poder vender al por menor, la Sra. es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, su deseo es el de ver a sus hijos profesionales y personas de bien,  agradecida con la institución por el apoyo económico que le brinda para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sra. Marlene is originally from the residential area of San Carlos, which is about 15 kilometers from the town of San Jose. She has her own home that she purchased through hard work. Her current business is selling charcoal at the local market. She is in a common-law relationship with Sr. Luis, who is a chainsaw operator. They have three children who are of school age.

With the money from this loan, Sra. Marlene will buy charcoal in bulk so that she can sell it in smaller amounts. She is a hardworking and responsible person. Her wish is to see her children become professionals and good people. Marlene is grateful to Emprender for the financial support it has provided so that she can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy charcoal in bulk.

loans.name: Segia

texts.en:
Segia is a 29-year-old married woman with three children.
