She has a small plantation and grows vegetables to earn a living. This is the first year she has been doing this. Segia has requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, gloves, etc.
 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Segia hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies and equipment

loans.name: Anabel

texts.en:
Anabel is 28 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with one child. 

Anabel has a dried fish vending business and earns approximately 3,500.00 Philippine pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase more stocks of dried fish for her retail business.

Anabel has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Anabel hopes to build her own dried fish stall.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of dried fish for her retail business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 50 years old and lives in Sumadat, Dumalinao ZDS. She is married with ten children.

To earn a living, Norma has a business selling viand (chicken joy). She earns about 8000 Philippine pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. Norma has requested a loan amount of 10,000.00 PHP to purchase more chicken for her chicken joy/viand business.

Norma, has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Norma would like to have her own restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase more chicken for her chicken joy/viand business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fruits to sell, like bananas and mangos

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, soap, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Alaifue

texts.en:
Alaifue is 39 years old and married with five children.
 
She has a small garden where she grows and sells coconuts that she can sell in her community or at the market. This is her first year with this business. Alaifue needs a loan to buy more coconuts to sell to the villagers

She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. Alaifue will use the profits from her sales to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more coconut plants

loans.name: Devorah

texts.en:
Devorah is 64 years old and lives in Gil Sanchez, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 4 children.

To earn a living, Devorah has a business selling a variety of viands (tasty dishes). She earns about 4000 PHP each month doing this type of work. Devorah has requested a loan of 3000 PHP to purchase raw ingredients for her viand business.

Devorah has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Devorah would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her viand business

location.town: Liloy-Gil Sanchez, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Geralda's Group

texts.en:
Geralda is 62 years old and lives in Nacional, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has no children. 

Geralda has a general store. She has had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan of 3000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store.

Geralda has become a member of PMPC just this year.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business. Geralda is the leader of a 3-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has her own business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Carmen Magdalena

texts.es: Carmen nos cuenta su historia desde Playas. Es bachiller y tiene 26 años. Posee una tienda de abarrotes la cual inicio en agosto del 2011. Su iniciativa comenzó porque le gusta ser independiente y se dio cuenta que por su sector no había tiendas como tenía un capital pequeño lo invirtió. Hasta el momento a tenido acogida ya que su tienda esta surtida. El trabajo lo realiza de lunes a sábado desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 11 de la noche con la ayuda de una sobrina. Camen nos indica que no a tenido inconveniente pero que si hay delincuencia en su sector. Actualmente está soltera y tiene 2 niños de 8 y 1 año de edad. Con el crédito va a comprar víveres, aceite, arroz. Su sueño es ampliar su tienda, comprar una camioneta para realizar ella misma sus comprar y así brindarle a sus hijos todo lo que necesiten.
texts.en:
Carmen relays her story from the city of Playas. She is 26 years old and a high school graduate. Carmen has a grocery store that she started in August 2011. She took the initiative to start this business because she likes being independent and there were no other stores in her area. However, she only had a small amount of capital to invest. At the moment, her store has gained acceptance since it is stocked. Carmen works Monday through Saturday from 7am to 11pm with the help of a niece. She says that she has not had to face any problems, but there is crime in her area. Carmen is currently single and has two children (ages 8 and 1).

With this loan, she will buy provisions, oil, and rice. Her dream is to expand her store, to purchase a truck for picking up merchandise for her store, and to provide her children with everything they need.

loans.use: to buy provisions, oil, and rice.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 

Myrna has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Myrna has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Myrna hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice, soap, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her stock of canned goods, soap, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and RTW clothing to sell

loans.name: Erenia

texts.en:
Erenia is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Erenia has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks and personal care products. She requested a loan for 7,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Erenia has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Erenia hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana is married with four children. Ana is 35 years old and lives in Punta, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Ana owned a general store to earn a living and has had this business for one year. Each month, she earns 10,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase more stocks for her general store.

Ana has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Ana hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Sombang Lestari Group

texts.en:
As a housewife taking care of two children and her husband, Ni Kadek works day-to-day as a pig farmer and developed the business in her home. With her husband, who works as a farmer, Ni Kadek is doing the pig business with the help of loans from MUK incorporated with the Sombang Lestari group. This group consists of 10 people and Ni Kadek is the head of the group.

Having managed to pay off their previous loans, Ni Kadek and the group of Sombang Lestari continues borrowing with a fixed loan of 1.2M IDR per member. The loan will be used to buy two piglets at 450.000 IDR per head and the rest for pig feed.

Ni Kadek hopes by maintaining these pigs, she can benefit more than ever,  to increase the family economy and to support the children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy two piglets for fattening and pig feed.

loans.name: Triwana Sari Group

texts.en: Ni Komang and the whole group of Triwana Sari received a fifth loan. This time, two members could not be in the photograph because of religious ceremonies, namely Ni Sayu and Ni Komang. These loans were used to buy four piglets. Ni Komang, as well as the housewives who keep pigs at home, also works to help her husband in the fields. She has two children. Her first child is in elementary school and the second is a toddler. She pursues this effort to provide additional income for the family and to be able to save for the future of her children. Ni Komang spends 20,000 IDR per day for the kitchen, 5,000 IDR for the provisions for her children and 50,000 IDR per month for electricity.

loans.use: To buy four piglets

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.en:
Eulalia is 64 years old and lives in Dansalan, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with eight children.

Eulalia works in the fish industry and sells/catches fish for a living. She has been doing this for two years. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fishing net.

Eulalia has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Eulalia hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.en:
Alfonso is 41 years old, single, and lives in the Philippines. He has a shop that sells bananas and has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of green and yellow bananas to sell.

Alfonso has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Alfonso hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of banana to sell

loans.name: Pedro Emperador

texts.es: Pedro Emperador de sesenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida; él se dedica a la compra de cartón de colonia en colonia de forma ambulante en un camión, y luego de recolectado lo vende por mayor a industrias recicladoras que lo vuelven a ocupar. Ya tiene varios años con este negocio  y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, los vecinos afirman que es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, el servicio que ofrece es el mejor de la zona, quiere aumentar la venta pero para ello necesita hacer nuevas inversiones, quiere aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presentan pues piensa que hay que esforzarse al máximo para poder traspasar nuestros límites, es con este pensamiento que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cartón por mayor y para hacer algunas reparaciones al vehículo, las ganancias que obtienen en el día le dan la certeza para pagar su financiamiento y de la misma forma darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Pedro Emperador is 63 years old and lives with his life partner.  He makes his living buying cardboard by traveling from neighborhood to neighborhood in his truck.  After he collects the cardboard, he sells it wholesale to recycling industries who recyle it.  He has spent many years in this business and he has gotten many clients.  His neighbors state that he is a very hard-working and responsible person.  The service he provides is the best in the area.  

He wants to increase his sales, but to do that he needs to make a new investment.  He wants to take every opportunity presented to him because he believes he has to make a maximum effort to be able to to surpass his limits.  It is with this way of thinking that he decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy cardboard in bulk and to make some repairs to his vehicle.  The earnings he makes assure him that he will pay off his loan and in the same way give his family a better quality of life and financial security.

loans.use: to buy cardboard in bulk and make repairs to his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of beverages and snacks to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seafood to sell, tools for the motorela and gasoline

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora de 49 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus hijos. Ella se dedica a la agricultura principalmente al cultivo de maíz y maicillo. Además de esta actividad también se dedica a la elaboración y venta de artesanías. Es una mujer muy sencilla la cual vive en condiciones muy humildes. Todo lo anterior le da fuerza a trabajar duramente para poder dar el pan de cada día a su familia. Se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora, solidaria  y responsable. Gracias a su buen desempeño en el trabajo ha logrado ganarse la confianza y el respeto de sus clientes y vecinos.  Dado a que el ciclo de producción ya comenzó  ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar un credito que la impulse a comenzar con la siembra de los principales granos básicos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de: semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. No pierde las esperanzas que con  la ayuda de Dios y de esta institución logrará salir adelante y mejorará sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Teodora, 49, lives in her own home with her children.  She makes her living as a farmer, specifically cultivating corn and sorghum.  In addition to this activity, he also makes a living making and selling handcrafts.  She is a simple woman who lives in humble conditions.  All this gives her strength to work hard to be able to provide for her family.  She is known as a hard worker, supportive, and responsible.  Thanks to her good performance at work, she has managed to gain the trust and respect of her customers and neighbors.  

Given that the production cycle has started, she has made the decision to approach this insitution to request a loan that will give her a push to start sowing the basic grains.  She will use to loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost.  She is still hopeful that with the help of God and this institution she will get ahead and improve her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and compost.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for the maintenance of his motorcycle and pay for gasoline

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools to maintain his motorcycle and pay for gasoline

loans.name: Thoy

texts.en:
Thoy is a 43-year-old woman living in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She is married with three single children, one of whom works for TELA Company as a driver. Thoy devotes her time to her rice farming business, earning an income accordingly and tries hard to support her family. Besides rice, she also plants potatoes to sell on her own farmland of about three or four hectares. She has been in the farming business for six years and she enjoys doing this type of business.

To improve her business, Thoy would like to take out a loan of USD 1,000 to pay for the process of planting potatoes this coming season. She hopes that she will obtain a good outcome from her investment and better her living conditions. In the future, she plans to purchase extra land to further expand her business.

loans.use: to pay for planting potatoes this coming season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the rice farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap and beverages

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita works hard to support her family. Anita is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Anita requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her business.

Anita has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Anita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, "balot" & beverages

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 31 years old and married with three children.

Leah works hard to provide for her family. She runs a grocery store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

Leah has borrowed and paid back 20 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the grocery store for 15 years and earns additional income from raising pigs.

Leah aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks to sell

loans.name: José Alberto

texts.es: José Alberto de 49 años de edad, vive de manera muy humilde en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa y sus 4 hijos. Él se dedica  a la agricultura desde hace muchos años. Cultiva maíz y frijoles, los cuales comercializa en los principales mercados o puntos de venta de la zona donde habita.  Es un hombre muy sencillo el cual depende totalmente de la agricultura. Para él lo más importante es que su familia cuente con lo necesario para ir sobreviviendo. Es un hombre muy trabajador, responsable y dedicado a su familia. Tiene muy buenas referencias en la zona donde habita ya que gracias a su carisma a sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas. Desea comenzar la siembra de los granos básicos lo antes posible debido a que es el tiempo para comenzar con la cosecha. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas como: abonos, fertilizantes y semillas. Con este préstamo podrá seguir realizando esta actividad que es muy importante para el sostenimiento económico de la familia.
texts.en:
José Alberto, 49, lives very humbly in his own house with his family, comprised of his wife and four children.  He has been working in agriculture for many years, growing corn and beans which he sells at the main markets and sales points where he lives.  He is a very simple man and totally dependent on agriculture.  The most important thing for him is for his family to have everything they need to survive.  

He is a very hard-working, responsible man who is dedicated to his family.  He has very good references in the area where he lives, thanks to his charisma and ability to gain peoples' trust.  He wants to begin sowing basic grains as soon as possible because harvest time is here.  He is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to buy farm supplies such as fertilizers and seeds.  With this loan he will be able to continue in his activity, which is important for the economic support of his family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: José Luis de 50 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual es muy numeroso.  Toda su vida ha trabajado en el cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Con los ingresos que obtiene de la venta de la cosecha lleva el sustento a su hogar. De esta forma es como se gana la vida. El y su familia viven en condiciones muy humildes y sencillas, pero vale recalcar que gracias a su arduo trabajo logra cubrir las necesidades más básicas de su hogar. Es un hombre luchador el cual hace todo por su familia.  Muchas personas lo conocen y dan buenas referencias tanto de su trabajo como de su persona, ya que es un hombre respetuoso, responsable y muy solidario.  Dado que cada año necesita repetir la actividad de la siembra, solicita este crédito a esta institución para comprar los insumos agrícolas como: abonos, insecticidas y semillas para comenzar a preparar la tierra para la cosecha, ya que necesita un impulso para poder emprender dicha tarea que es muy importante para él y su numerosa familia.
texts.en:
José Luis, 50, lives in his own house with his family, which is quite numerous.  All his life he has worked growing corn and beans.  The income he earns from selling the crops is what supports his household, and this is how he earns a living.  He and his family live in humble, simple conditions; but it is important to state that thanks to his hard work his is able to cover the most basic household needs. 

He is a man who strives to do everything for his family.  Many people know him and give good references about his work and his character, as he is a respectful, responsible, very supportive man.  Since he needs to repeat the sowing activity yearly, he is requesting a loan from the institution to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, insecticides and seeds to begin preparing the land for the crops.  He needs this impulse to start the work which is every important for him and his large family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, insecticides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Vladimir

texts.es: Carlos Vladimir tiene 20 años de edad y habita en casa de su habitación junto con su esposa y su pequeña hija de un año. Él se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace algunos años. Vende variedad de productos como jabón, detergente, aceite, pan, café, golosinas y de más artículos de tienda que son solicitados por los clientes. Cuenta con buena clientela dado que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales expresan estar muy satisfechos con el servicio que ofrece. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer este negocio, y lo más importantes que ha logrado sobrevivir a la cantidad de competencia que existe ya que él siempre trata de estar un paso delante de la misma. Es así como ha logrado llevar el sustento a su hogar y dar lo más necesario a su familia. Para lograr un mayor movimiento de su negocio ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería de tienda como: arroz, frijoles, golosinas, leche, arroz, aceite, etc. para incrementar su inventario de tal forma que pueda percibir mayores ingresos y poder así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos Vladimir, 20, lives with his wife and small, one-year-old daughter in his own home.  He has been running a general store for several years, selling a variety of products such as soap, detergent, oil, bread, coffee, sweets and other articles as requested by his customers.  He has a good customer base because he has been able to gain the trust of neighbors who are very satisfied with the service he offers.

With much effort he has been able to establish his business and survive all the competition that exists, because he always tries to stay one step ahead.  This is how he has been able to support his household and give his family everything they need.  In order to increase business activity, he has decided to request a loan through INTEGRAL to buy goods for the store such as rice, beans, sweets, milk, rice, oil, etc. to increase his inventory and income.  This will allow him to improve his and his family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, sweets, milk, rice, oil, etc.

loans.name: Roberto De Jesús

texts.es: Roberto de Jesús es un hombre trabajador el cual habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa e hijo. Habita en condiciones muy humildes en las afueras de la ciudad del municipio.  Es un hombre con mucha fuerza y deseos de superarse, ya que a pesar de sus  59 años de edad continua trabajando  duramente para sacar adelante a su familia. Desde muy pequeño aprendió  a cultivar la tierra y es así como se ha ganado la vida y ha dado el sustento a su familia. Cada año cultiva los principales granos básicos como: maíz y frijoles. Solicita este crédito para comenzar con la siembra que corresponde a este  año, ya que los cultivos son por temporada y es necesario comenzar lo antes posible cuando el ciclo de producción se hace presente. Solicita este crédito para comenzar con la preparación de la tierra y luego  continuar con la siembra.  Desea adquirir los principales insumos agrícolas (semillas, abonos y fertilizantes) para comenzar dicha actividad y continuar manteniendo activo el negocio que por años le ha ayudado  a llevar el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en:
Roberto de Jesús is a hard-working man who lives in his own house with his wife and son.  They live in very humble conditions on the outskirts of town.  He is a man who is very determined to get ahead; and despite being 59 years old, he continues working hard to provide for his family.  When he was young he learned to cultivate the land and earn a living this way to cover household expenses.

Every year he grows basic grains such as corn and beans.  He is requesting a loan to beging this year's sowing, since the harvest season is at hand and the new production cycle is beginning soon.  The loan will be used to begin preparing the land and continue with the sowing.  He wants to buy his main farm supplies (seeds and fertilizers) to begin activity and keep working in the business that has provided his household with an income for so many years.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Victor Raul

texts.es: Víctor Raúl de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo en casa propia; él se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarra, hierro, aluminio entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio, y tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro, es muy buen comprador y vendedor a la vez, y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, el visita toda la zona de la capital y sus alrededores comprando cantidades pequeñas y al recolectarla después de cubrir toda la ruta la lleva a vender a las empresas que funden hierro para reutilizarlo, tiene más demanda y quiere hacer una inversión más grande, de esta forma no decepcionara a sus clientes, las personas con las que comercia saben que él es un hombre responsable muy entregado a su labor y siempre les paga el justo precio, el piensa que para empezar un gran proyecto se necesita de valentía y para terminarlo se necesita mucha perseverancia, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar chatarra hierro, aluminio, plástico, etc. Víctor tiene la confianza que lograra obtener buenas ganancias para responder al pago de su financiamiento y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Víctor Raúl, 36, lives with his common-law wife and son in his own house.  He earns a living buying and selling metal, iron, aluminum and other scrap materials; and has been in business for several years, having gained much experience in this sector.  He is both a good buyer and seller, and has a fixed customer base.  He visits all the areas in and around the capital city, buying small quantities which he puts together and takes to companies who buy iron to recycle it.  There is much demand and he wants to invest more money to keep customers happy.  

The people he deals with know he is a responsible person and very committed to his work, always paying a just price.  He believes that in order to start a large project, one needs courage, and to finish it ones needs perseverance.  Therefore, he has requested a loan through INTEGRAL to buy iron, aluminum and plastic scrap.  Víctor is confident he can obtain a good profit and be able to pay back the loan responsibly.  Also he will be able to give his family a good lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy iron, aluminum and plastic scrap.

loans.name: José Alfredo

texts.es: José Alfredo de 55 años de edad, habita en su sencilla casa localizada en zona semiurbana cerca a la capital del país, junto con su esposa y sus dos hijos. Él se dedica a cultivar la tierra desde hace muchos años.  Cultiva los principales granos básicos como: maíz y frijoles. Esta actividad la realiza año con año dado que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy dinámico el cual ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos. Después de sacar la cosecha la comercializa en los principales mercados de la zona donde habita. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya está presente, solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios (insecticidas, abonos y semillas) para comenzar el cultivo ya que es necesario comenzar lo antes posible para aprovechar la temporada y poder tener acceso a una buena cosecha. Confía que logrará sacar una buena cosecha y podrá comercializarla de la mejor manera, lo cual le ayudará a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: José Alfredo is 55 and lives in his simple house in a semi-urban zone near the country’s capital. He lives together with his wife and two kids. He has worked cultivating the land for many years. He grows basic grains such as corn and beans. He does this year after year since it’s his main source of income. He is a hardworking, responsible and dynamic man; he knows how to earn the trust of his neighbours. After bringing in his harvest, he sells it in the main markets of the area where he lives. This is how he earns a living and supports his family. Since it is already planting time, he is requesting the loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the necessary agricultural inputs, such as insecticide, fertilizer, and seeds. To sell the crop, it is necessary to start as early as possible to take advantage of the season and be able to have a good harvest. He is confident that he will be able to pull in a good harvest and will be able to sell his goods in the best way possible, which will help improve the quality of life of him and his family.

loans.use: to purchase insecticide, fertilizer, and seeds

loans.name: Consuelo Yamileth

texts.es: Consuelo Yamileth  de treinta y dos años de edad es casada y vive junto a su padre que es agricultor, su madre y su hija en casa propia,  ella se dedica a la venta de pan y a la crianza de cerdos que es su principal fuente de ingresos, su negocio está ubicado en el mismo lugar donde reside, es muy conocida en esa zona  y tiene mucha clientela, pues todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es único siempre recibe a las personas con una sonrisa en el rostro; Consuelo es una mujer muy activa dedicada al cien por ciento a su trabajo, siempre aprovecha todas las oportunidades que se le presentan y su más grande secreto para llegar al éxito es el amor y la perseverancia que le pone a su labor, necesita que la financien para poder invertir, tiene muy buenas recomendaciones es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar, sal, levadura, dulce y cerdos. Las ganancias promedio que obtiene le dan el respaldo para saldar la deuda  y para regalarle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Consuelo Yamileth is thirty two years old, she is married and she lives with her father, who is a farmer, her mother and her daughter in their own home. Consuelo makes a living selling bread and breeding pigs, which is her main source of income.  Her business is located in the same town where she resides, she is very well known in that area. She has many customers because everything she sells is of good quality and accessible prices, plus she always provides service with a big smile. Consuelo is a very active woman, she is one hundred percent dedicated to her work and she always takes advantage of the opportunities that present themselves. Her greatest secret to achieve success is her love and perseverance for her business. She needs to be financed so she can invest, she has good recommendations, and that is why she is requesting a loan to INTEGRAL so she can buy flour in bulk, sugar, salt, yeast, sweets and pigs. The earnings she will make will provide the backing to settle the debt and to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy flour in bulk, sugar, salt, yeast, sweets and pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics, perfumes and creams

loans.name: Ana Elizabeth

texts.es: Ana Elizabeth tiene 29 años de edad y ha vivido desde hace mucho tiempo junto con su esposo e hijo en casa de su propiedad. Ella se dedica  a la venta de pan francés, el cual fabrica desde tempranas horas de la mañana en su hogar de residencia. Además también se dedica a la venta de calzado para todos los gustos y preferencias. Con mucho esfuerzo logra cubrir tantos las tareas de su hogar como las de sus negocios ya que no cuenta con la ayuda de nadie para poder cubrir dichas actividades.  Ana es una mujer emprendedora  ya que no deja pasar ninguna oportunidad de negocios, siempre está  buscando la forma de generar ingresos de manera honrada. Dado a que su negocio genera gran parte de los ingresos, con los cuales logran cubrir muchas de las necesidades del hogar, ha tomado la decisión de incrementar la oferta con el objetivo de mejorar sus ganancias y poder ayudar de mejor manera a su familia. Solicita este préstamo para hacer dicha inversión dado que no puede hacerlo por sus medios. Necesita adquirir la materia prima necesaria para la elaboración de pan francés ( harina) y comprar variedad de zapatos, para lograr su objetivo de incrementar su inventario y  ganancias, de tal forma que pueda mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ana Elizabeth is 29 years old and has lived for some time with her husband and son in their own house. She sells French bread which she makes beginning in the early morning hours in her home. She also sells shoes for all types of tastes and preferences. She puts all her strength into covering all her household chores as well as her businesses and does not have help with these activities. Ana is an entrepreneur that never lets a business opportunity pass by, she is always looking for an honorable way to earn income. Since her business generates most of her earnings which covers most of the household necessities, she has decided to increase her supply with the objective of improving her profits to be able to better help her family. She is asking for this loan in order to make this investment because she can not do it by herself. She needs to buy raw materials for making French bread (flour) and to buy a variety of shoes, to achieve her objective of increasing her inventory and earnings, so that she can improve the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy flour to make French bread and to buy a variety of shoes

loans.name: Magdalena Del Rosario

texts.es: Magdalena del Rosario tiene 40 años de edad, y habita junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos. Sus deseos de superación la motivaron, a establecer un negocio de corte y confección en el cual  elabora variedad de prendas de vestir.  Ha acomodado su negocio en su hogar de habitación dado que no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para alquilar un local. A pesar de que no cuenta con las instalaciones adecuadas para su negocio, ha logrado atraer a muchas personas a solicitar sus servicios dado que ese detalle no le impide hacer un trabajo de calidad. Es muy emprendedora dado a que al ver que los ingresos de su esposo no lograban satisfacer las necesidades de la familia decidió colaborar con la economía del hogar. Solicita este crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de materia prima como: telas, hilos, tijeras, elásticos, botones, etc. Para impulsar su negocio y lograr tener una mayor oferta de productos, que le permitan aumentar sus ganancias y dar un mayor soporte a su familia.
texts.en:
Magdalena del Rosario is 40 years old, lives with her husband and two sons. Her desire to get ahead motivated her to establish a dressmaking’s business, which produces variety of clothing. Her business is located inside her home because she does not have the resources to rent a place.

In spite of the fact that does not have adequate facilities for her business; she has managed to attract many customers. The lack of facilities has not prevented her from doing a quality job. She is a very entrepreneurial person and because her husband's income was not enough to meet the needs of her family, she decided to help with the household economy.

She is requesting this loan to purchase raw materials such as: fabric, thread, scissors, elastics, buttons, etc. to boost her business and have a larger product choice, which allow her to increase her profits and give further support to her family.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as: fabric, thread, scissors, elastics, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Verónica

texts.es: Verónica tiene 22 años y  vive en condiciones muy humildes junto con su familia la cual está conformada por su esposo y dos hijos.  Debido a que la situación económica no es nada fácil en estos tiempos,  hace algunos años decidió dedicarse a la elaboración y venta de artesanías como comales, jarrones y macetas de barro,  las cuales elabora en su hogar de residencia.  Esta decisión la tomo  a partir de que las necesidades no  eran cubiertas con los ingresos percibidos por el esposo en el trabajo de albañilería. Además de este negocio también se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles ya que sus condiciones son muy sencillas  y necesitan buscar la forma de ganarse la vida.  La familia es la principal fuente de inspiración para Verónica, ya que su mayor deseo es poder darles mejores condiciones de vida, diferentes a las que ella y su esposo han tenido.  Solicita este préstamo para invertir en el negocio en la compra de la materia prima para la elaboración de las artesanías (agua, barro, leña, etc.) y para comprar insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc.), desea seguir manteniendo activo su negocio por lo que espera que de esta forma pueda darle mayor estabilización a su negocio y poder seguir percibiendo los ingresos que le den mejores oportunidades de vida.
texts.en:
Verónica is 22 years old and lives in humble conditions with her family which consists of her husband and two children. Because of the economical situation it is not easy in these times. Some years ago she decided to work making and selling handicrafts such as griddles, vases, and flowerpots which she makes at home. She made this decision because her husband’s income as a mason was not sufficient to meet the household expenses.

In addition to this business she also works growing corn and beans as their living conditions are very basic and they need to find a way to make a living. Her family is the main source of inspiration for Veronica, and her greatest desire is to give them a better quality of life, different from what she and her husband have had. 

She is asking for this loan in order to invest in the business buying raw materials for the making of the handicrafts (water, clay, wood, etc.) and in order to buy farming supplies (compost, seeds, fertilizers, etc.). She wants to continue working in her business as she hopes that in this way she can stabilize her business and continue to receive earnings that will provide better life opportunities.

loans.use: to buy water, clay, wood, compost, seeds, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Rubie

texts.en:
Rubie is a married and has two children. Rubie is 33 years old, and resides at Dela Paz, Clarin, Misamis Occidental: Philippines. Rubie owns and operates farm land where she plants and harvests rice for sale to earn a living. She's been 8 years in this business. 

Each month, she earns PHP 8,761 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000.00  to purchase fertilizer and pesticides. In 2012, Rubie joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Rubie wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and  pesticides.

loans.name: Akhtar Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Akhtar Bibi is a 32-years-old married woman and by this relationship she has three children: one son and two daughters. Her son reads in 4th standard while her eldest daughter is in kindergarten. Her youngest daughter is not of school going age yet.
 
Akhtar’s husband is a building constructor. Akhtar herself is involved in a animal sales business. She purchases young animals from the animal markets and sells to the required customers after raising them up. She loves doing her work. Akhtar has been in this business for over 10 years and in these years she has acquired a good reputation among her customers. 

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her animal sales business. She will invest the loan in buying animal feed in a larger quantity so she can provide healthy feed to her animals so they become healthy and she gets good income on sales. 

She is very confident about the positive financial growth of her business after the loan investment. 

Note: “One of the members has a sewing business that’s why she is showing her sewing work in the picture”.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 56 years old and married with one child.

Teresita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell.

Teresita has borrowed and paid 20 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Teresita aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: La Sra. Martha tiene 62 años y es casada con un hijo que tiene la edad de  32 años, ya es independiente, ella se dedica a la confección y arreglo de prendas de vestir y también tiene una  tienda bazar donde ofrece variedad de productos como cintas, encajes y botones que también le sirven para la confección de sus prendas, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Martha va a usar este préstamo para compra de telas y así de esta manera  incrementar su capital de trabajo,  la Sra. Martha enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia, la Sra. Martha va a utilizar los beneficios compra de mercadería para su bazar y así de esta manera generar más ingresos.
texts.en:
Sra. Martha is 62 years old and married. She has a son who is 32 years old and independent. Martha is a seamstress and mends articles of clothing, but she also has a retail bazaar where she offers a variety of products such as ribbons, lace, and buttons, that she also uses in making garments. This loan is her first cycle with Emprender.

Sra. Martha will use this loan to buy fabrics so that she can increase her operating capital. She confronts challenges in her business, such as dealing with the competition. Sra. Martha will utilize the benefits of this loan by purchasing merchandise for her bazaar, thus enabling her to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Reinelda

texts.es: Reinelda de 49 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia con rumbo occidente del país y en zona rural. Ella se dedica a la agricultura principalmente al cultivo de maíz y maicillo. Realiza esta actividad desde hace muchos años y es la que le ha permitido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Esta es su  principal fuente de ingresos dado que no conoce otra forma de ganarse la vida de manera honrada. Parte de su cosecha la vende en los principales mercados de la zona donde ella habita y otra la guarda para consumo de su familia en los graneros que se logran observar en la imagen. Es así como logra cubrir los principales gastos del hogar. Debido a que la temporada para la cosecha ya comenzó ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a esta institución, ya que para comenzar la siembra necesita invertir en la semilla, abonos y fertilizantes. Razón por la cual solicita dicho credito. Tiene confianza que al igual que en años pasados obtendrá una buena cosecha con la cual podrá llevar el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en:
Reinelda is 49 years old. She lives in her own home with her family in the western part of the country in a rural area. She works in agriculture, mainly growing corn and millet. She has been doing this activity for many years and it has permitted her to meet the daily expenses of the home. This is her main source of income as she knows no other way of earning an honest wage. She sells part of her harvest in the major markets of the area where she lives and she saves a part for consumption by her family as you can see in the photo. This is the way she covers the main household expenses. 

Because the harvesting season has begun she has made the decision to ask for this loan from this institution so she can begin planting, so she can invest in seed, compost and fertilizers. This is the reason for the loan. She is confident that as in past years she will obtain a good harvest which will provide sustenance for her home.

loans.use: to buy seed, compost and fertilizers

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is a woman with 3 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Maricel is 24 years old and has 2 children who are in school.

Maricel has a farming vegetables business in the Philippines. Maricel requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Maricel has been in this business for one year. In the future, Maricel would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Susan Mary

texts.es:
Susan Mary tiene 21 años de edad, vive en unión libre y su esposo se dedica a hacer trabajos de pintura y ebanistería, tiene 2 hijos de 2 años y medio y otro de 7 meses de edad, vive con su familia en la ciudad de San Pedro Sula, Cortes.
Susan tiene un negocio de una pequeña pulpería. La mayor parte de sus ingresos dependen de la venta de productos de primera necesidad para el consumo diario, como el arroz, sal, manteca, azúcar, frijoles, y golosinas etc. Esta pulpería la estableció hace 7 meses aproximadamente debido a la necesidad de ingresos económicos. Anteriormente trabajaba en un restaurante pero no le quedaba tiempo de atender a su familia y decidió trabajar en lo propio. Se siente satisfecha porque ahora puede coordinar su tiempo atendiendo a su familia y administrando al mismo tiempo su negocio. 
Ha solicitado un préstamo con ODEF, de 8,000 lempiras para  invertir en el negocio de pulpería en compra de productos de consumo diario. Con sus ganancias mantendrá una mejorar calidad de vida.
Sus metas en el futuro es tener la mejor pulpería de la zona, mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir beneficiándose con los financiamientos que la Institución le facilite.
texts.en:
Susan Mary is 21 years old and in a common-law relationship. Her husband performs painting and woodworking jobs. They have two children, ages 2½ and 7 months. Susan lives with her family in San Pedro Sula, Cortes.

She has a small grocery business. A large part of her income depends on selling basic necessity products for daily consumption such as rice, salt, lard, sugar, beans, candy, and other items. Her store was established approximately seven months ago because she needed to generate income. Susan previously worked at a restaurant, but she quit because she wanted to spend more time taking care of her family. Therefore, she decided to work on her own. She feels satisfied because now she is able to manage her time between looking after her family and managing her business.

Susan is requesting a loan from ODEF in the amount of 8,000 HNL in order to invest in her grocery business by purchasing everyday consumer products. With her earnings, she will be able to maintain a better quality of life. Her goals for the future are to have a better store in the area, to improve her family's quality of life, and to continue utilizing the benefits of the credit services provided by ODEF.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to restock her business.

loans.name: Eduardo Salvador

texts.es: Eduardo Salvador de sesenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a al cultivo de elote en un terreno arrendado en la misma zona donde reside, tiene varios años dedicándose a la agricultura y estos le han regalado mucha experiencia en el rubro, siempre obtiene buenas cosechas pues sabe el tiempo perfecto para la siembra, tiene mucha clientela pues lo que comercia es de primera calidad y los precios son realmente accesibles además el servicio es excelente Eduardo se caracteriza por su amabilidad; él es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo, luchador dispuesto a salir adelante para tener un futuro más próspero, piensa que somos dueños de nuestro destino, y quiere tomar el camino correcto, la última cosecha perdió casi el 100% de su siembra, debido a un fenómeno climático, por lo que perdió sus ganancias y para volver a sembrar necesita capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, fertilizante, insecticida etc. Eduardo tiene la certeza que con las ganancias podrá cubrir el pago del financiamiento, pero también tiene el respaldo de una pequeña tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad. Así podrá al mismo tiempo darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Eduardo Salvador, 64, lives with his life partner and their children.  He makes his living cultivating corn on rented land in the same area in which he lives.  He has spent many years making his living by farming and these years have given him a lot of experience in this field of business.  He always gets good crops because he knows the perfect time to sow.  He has many clients because what he sells is of high quality and his prices are very affordable and his service is excellent. 

Eduardo is known for his kindness; he is very dedicated to his work and is a fighter ready to get ahead to have a more prosperous future.  He believes we are the masters of our fate and he wants to take the correct path.  His last crop lost nearly 100% of what he sowed due to a weather phenomenon.  Because he lost his earnings and in order to continue to sow he needs capital which is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy corn, fertilizer, insecticide, etc.  Eduardo is confident his earnings will cover the payments of the funding.  He also has backing of a small shop where he sells basic staple products.  In this way he will be able to give his family a better quality life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy corn, fertilizer, and insecticide.

loans.name: Jose De Jesus

texts.es: José de Jesús vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos los cuales aún asisten a la escuela, habitan en casa propia, él se dedica a la venta  y reparación de radiadores para vehículos, ventiladores, escapes entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio, el local el cual alquila está ubicado a la orilla de una carretera, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues es muy buen vendedor y las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles para conservar los carros en excelentes condiciones; José es una hombre confiable y trabajador con muchas ganas de sobresalir en un futuro, piensa: nada sobre esta tierra puede detener al hombre que posee la correcta actitud mental para lograr su meta, y él tiene una actitud positiva quiere ampliar el negocio y surtir con más mercancía es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar radiadores, escapes, ventiladores, silenciadores, etc. José sabe que con las ganancias que obtendrá podrá saldar la deuda del financiamiento, además tiene muy buenas referencia y es muy responsable, al mismo tiempo espera que podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: José de Jesús lives with his life partner and three children who still attend school. They live in their own home. He sells and repairs auto radiators, fans, and exhaust pipes among other items. He has been in this business for some years. He rents the premises which is located on the side of a road. He has many clients because he is a good salesman and people know that everything is of good quality and he sells it at an affordable price in order to keep the cars in good condition. José is a reliable and hardworking man eager to get ahead in the future, he thinks: nothing in this world can stop the man that has a positive attitude from achieving his goal, and he has a positive attitude and wants to expand his business and to stock it with more merchandise which is why he is asking for a loan through Integral which will permit him to buy radiators, tailpipes, fans, silencers, etc. José knows that with the profits he can repay the financial debt. He has good references and is very reliable and at the same time he hopes to be able to give his family an abundant life.

loans.use: to buy radiators, tailpipes, fans, and silencers

loans.name: Rosa Maura

texts.es:
La señora rosa tiene 55 años de edad es casada y tiene dos hijos. Desde hace 15 años se dedica a la crianza de cerdas reproductoras, este trabajo lo aprendió junto con su esposo, ya que compraban leche para elaborar queso y con el suero que quedaba engordaban uno o más cerdos. Al ver los buenos resultados comenzaron a criar cerdas reproductoras y fue así que iniciaron los esposos con el negocio. Hoy en día están dedicados por completo a la reproducción y venta de cerdos. 

Doña Rosa sale de su casa a pie durante quince minutos a abordar un autobús en el que viaja durante cuarenta minutos hasta llegar a la ciudad y comprar sus insumos agrícolas. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 39 quintales de concentrado para alimentar sus cerdos a fin de que puedan desarrollarse muy bien. Pues ella debe viajar cada ocho días a comprar el concentrado y en ocasiones se le termina y tiene que retrasar un poco la alimentación, por lo que con el préstamo comprara una buena cantidad asegurando la alimentación de los cerdos y se ahorrara el viaje al pueblo.  

La señora Rosa desea terminar de construir su casa, ya que solo ha construido las paredes y le falta el techo que esta muy deteriorado.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa is 55 years old, married, and has two children. She has been breeding pigs for 15 years. Rosa learned this trade by working with her husband. They would buy milk for making cheese and use the whey to fatten one or more pigs. Having seen the good results that occur from breeding pigs, they decided to start their own business. Today they are devoted full-time to breeding and selling pigs.

Doña Rosa leaves her house and walks 15 minutes so that she can get aboard a bus. She then travels 40 minutes before arriving in the city so that she can buy farm supplies. The loan she is requesting from Fundación Campo will be used to buy 39 "quintales" (1 quintal = 46 kg) of concentrated feed for her pigs so that they will develop properly. She has to travel every eight days in order to buy concentrated feed and sometimes she runs out and has to delay feeding the pigs for a short time. By purchasing a large quantity of feed, she can guarantee that the pigs will be fed and will be able to save on trips to the city. Sra. Rosa wants to finish the construction of her house. Only the walls have been built and the roof is missing since it has deteriorated.

loans.use: to buy 39 units of concentrated feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.es:
Doña Leonila, de 63 años, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos mayores de edad y vive con uno de ellos en una colonia suburbana de San Pedro Sula.
Ella todo el tiempo se ha dedicado al comercio para la manutención a sus hijos, vende en casa ropa nueva y usada, sandalias, zapatos y otros artículos que le solicitan los clientes. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo el cual es por 22,000.00 Lempiras para comprar la mercadería solicitada por los clientes en esta temporada del dia de las madres, este préstamo le ayudara a ofrecer más variedad de productos con la idea de aprovechar la temporada para incrementar sus ventas.
Su meta es ahorrar las ganancias para lograr comprar su propia casa en un lugar estratégico y establecer su negocio en mejores condiciones. Agradece a ODEF y a Kiva por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Doña Leonila, age 63, is a single mother with two grown children. One child lives with her in a suburban section of San Pedro Sula. This entire time she has engaged in the retail trade in order to support her children. Leonila sells merchandise from her home such as new and used clothing, sandals, shoes, and other items that are requested by her customers.

She is requesting her second loan in the amount of 22,000 HNL so that she can buy merchandise requested by her customers in time for Mother's Day. This loan will help her to offer a greater variety of products since she plans to take advantage of this season to increase her sales. Her goal is to save her profits toward buying a house of her own in a strategic location and establishing her business under better conditions. She is grateful to ODEF and Kiva for the support they have provided.

loans.use: to buy clothing, sandals, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, and beverages.

loans.name: Byambadorj

texts.en: Byambadorj, age 35, has been working as an IT specialist since 2007. He lives with his wife and his three-year-old son in his brother’s house, which is in the ger district (a ger is a Mongolian nomad's yurt, or portable dwelling) in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. Living in a ger is uncomfortable and cold, especially in winter. Byambadorj has always wanted to have his own apartment in the city. Recently he put in an order for an apartment with a construction company, but he needs money to cover the advance payment. This is a very important thing for his family, because they have never lived together in an apartment before. The loan Byambadorj is taking will be used to cover the advance payment for the apartment.

loans.use: To cover the cost of an advance payment on an apartment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, soap, and beverages for her store.

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
Mateo, es un campesino honrado y muy responsable, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y siembra de granos básicos, vive acompañado de su esposa y una hija de dos años de edad, él esta dedicado a las actividades agropecuarias, como la siembra de maíz y frijol, la crianza de ganado y cerdos, inicia las labores desde las 5:00am, hasta que termina la tarea, lleva 11 realizando esta actividad.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes agrícolas como el abono y los herbicidas para sembrar en una manzana de terreno la milpa. Esta compra le ayudara a facilitarle y poder incrementar sus cosechas, libre de plagas y enfermedades para poder comercializarlos, su riesgo en la milpa es la variación en el ambiente.
Sus sueños son muchos, entre ellos tener un mejor rendimiento con las cosechas del maíz, que le permita tener una mejor rentabilidad para cambiar las condiciones tanto de su vida personal como familiar.
texts.en:
Mateo is a country dweller who is honest and responsible. He raises pigs and grows basic grains. Mateo lives with his wife and two-year-old daughter. He occupies his time with farming activities, such as growing corn and beans, as well as raising cattle and pigs. Mateo begins his duties at 5am and quits when all of his tasks are completed. He has been in this business for 11 years.

Mateo is requesting a loan to buy farming supplies and fertilizers, specifically compost and herbicides, so that he can sow one plot of farmland. The purchase of these supplies will help to facilitate and increase his harvest. Since his crops will be free of pests and diseases, he will be able to sell them. The risks to his farmland include the changing conditions.

Mateo has many dreams, such as obtaining better output from his corn crop, that will enable him to have better profitability so that he can transform the conditions of his own life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and herbicides.

loans.name: Shirzana

texts.en: Shirzana, age 37, is a nurse. She lives with her husband and three children in Darkhan, the second-largest city in Mongolia. She has been working as a nurse for 14 years nonstop. Her husband, Sukhbaatar, age 39, transports passengers in his minivan. Shirzana says her husband’s income is currently her family's main income source because a nurse's salary is not enough for a family's necessities in Mongolia. Now she needs a loan to repair her husband’s minivan because it is damaged. She and her husband believe that his vehicle will work well and increase his earnings after the repair because customers enjoy being served by good and safe vehicles.

loans.use: To repair her husband’s minivan.

loans.name: Chin

texts.en:
Chin is a married woman who lives with her family in the Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province. She is responsible for five children. Chin earns her living from rice cultivation, which she has done for almost 22 years. She has the support of her husband, who also manages the business to ensure high production each year. 

Chin is asking for a loan from HKL, a Kiva partner, to supplement her capital to buy seeds, fertilizer, and herbicides. This loan will enable her to make improvements to her business. Chin hopes to produce a satisfactory harvest through her effort and patience. She wants to send her children to a good university after they finish 12th grade, so she will save a part of her income for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and herbicides for rice growing.

loans.name: Marga Damai Group

texts.en:
Because they already have a sow, this loan will be used to purchase superior quality piglets and feed and to repair cages. This pigs business has been shown to supplement the family incomes.

Ni Ketut will use the loan to buy two superior piglets and super quality feed so the pigs can grow fast. She plans to save money to develop their business, because their daily needs are met by her husband. Her husband was very supportive of the efforts made by Ni Ketut.

loans.use: To buy two superior quality piglets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for motorcycle maintenance and pay for the gasoline.

loans.name: Battulga

texts.en:
Mr. Battulga, 37, changed his job to electrician in a gas station since last year. He lives with his wife, son and mother in his mother’s apartment, which is in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

His apartment was built in the early 1960s and has never been renovated since then. Now it is old and it is uncomfortable to live there. In winter time, it gets very cold in due to the heat loss through the windows and doors, etc. 

So he decided to make renovations to his home. It costs about 1,200,000 MNT as he calculated. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to buying the building materials to make repairs to his apartment.

loans.use: To buy the building materials to make repairs to his apartment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of  fish to sell like milk fish and flying fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for motorcycle maintenance and pay for gasoline.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for motorcycle maintenance and pay for gasoline.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for motorcycle maintenance and pay for the gasoline.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, soap, shampoo and beverages.
